news: Mayi wina wa zaka 18 zakubadwa wa m’boma la Kasungu, ali m’manja mwa apolisi kaamba komuganizira kuti wataya mwana wakhanda yemwe anabereka. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho, msungwanayu ndi Bertha Chipeta ndipo wapalamula mlanduwu lachiwiri pa 25 October chaka chino pomwe anataya  khandalo m’chimbudzi  pafupi ndi nyumba yake. Iye wati izi zadziwika pomwe eni nyumbayo (landlord) anamva kulira kwa khandalo zomwe zinachititsa kuti awuze anthu ozungulira malowo. Anthuwo atafika pa malopo akuti anakwanitsa kuchotsa khandalo m’chimbudzimo ndipo anathamangira nalo kuchipatala komwe mpaka pano likulandirabe thandizo la mankhwala. Mayi woganiziridwayu naye anamutengera ku chipatala cha Kasungu komwe atamuyeza, zotsatira zawonetsa kuti khandalo labadwa mwa iye. Pakadali pano mayiyu akusungidwa m’chitokosi cha apolisi pomwe akudikira kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlandu wotaya mwana wakhanda zomwe ndi zosemphana ndi gawo 232 loweruzira milandu m’dziko muno. Mayi Bertha Chipeta amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chiwale m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Mwase m’boma la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Kuti Nkhondo Zithe M’maiko Osiyanasiyana
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha kuti nkhondo zomwe zikuchitika m’maiko osiyanasiyana, zithe. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wapereka pempholi lachiwiri mu mzinda wa Rome m’dziko la Italy pa mwambo wa mapemphero omwe anachita ndi atsogoleri a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana opemphelera mtendere m’maiko onse momwe mukuchitika nkhondo. Msonkhanowu unali wa nambala 36 ndipo unakonzedwa ndi bungwe la mpingo wa Katolika la Saint Egidio. Papa Francisco ndi atsogoleri a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana omwe adali nawo pa mapempherowa agwirizana kuti dziko la pansi padakali pano silikusowa nkhondo ndipo pa chifukwa ichi atsogoleriwa apempha kuti nkhondo zosiyana-siyana zomwe zikuchitika m’maiko osiyana-siyana zithe. Atsogoleri a zipembedzowa apemphanso atsogoleri a maiko osiyana-siyana kuti achitepo kanthu ndi kuthandiza kuti nkhondozi zithe. Iwo ati zotsatira za nkhondo ndi imfa ndi kuzunzitsa anthu osalakwa. Atsogoleriwa anenanso kuti mikangano ndi nkhondo zonse zingathe povomera kuchita zokambirana. Atsogoleriwa adzudzulanso m’chitidwe wopanga ndi kusungira zida zowopsa za nyukiliya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chiwerengero Cha Ogula Fetereza Wotsika Mtengo Chatsika Ku Dedza
news: Chiwerengero cha anthu omwe apindule ndi ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo chaka chino m’boma la Dedza, akuti chatsika. Mkulu owona za ulimi m’bomalo a Micheal Chimatiro anena izi poyankhula Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati izi zili chomwechi kaamba koti anthu ena alowetsedwa mu ndondomeko zina za boma monga Mtukula pakhomo. “Boma lili ndindondomeko zingapo zomwe likugwiritsa ntchito pothandiza anthu ake monga za Social Cash Transfer komanso Climate Smart Public Works. Anthu amene ali mu ndondomeko ziwirizi sapindula nawo ndi ndondomeko ya zipagizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo,” anatero a Chimatiro. Chaka chatha, alimi omwe anapindula ndi ndondomekoyi m’boma la Dedza analipo okwana 209,556 koma chaka chino alimi okwana 169,760 ndi omwe apindule ndi ndondomekoyi chaka chino. Malinga ndi a Chimatiro njalanso yavuta m’bomalo ndipo mzigawo zonse za ulimi zomwe zilipo khumi m’boma la Dedza, mwa anthu 100 aliwonse anthu asanu okha ndi omwe ali ndi chakudya padakalipano. Padakalipano Inkosi Kachindamoto ya m’bomalo yati yakonza dnongosolo labwino kuti mdera lawo musakhale chinyengo pa nkhani yta zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ulaliki
news: Ulaliki wa pa 25 October 2022 – Tikuyenera kuvomera mmoyo mwathu kulandira Mzimu Woyera komanso Mawu a Mulungu kuti amere mizu mmitima mwathu ndikukhala ndi makhalidwe abwino omwe angathe kukopa anthu ena ndikuyamba chikhristu. Podcast: Play in new window | Download
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Zokambirana Ndi President Waku France
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la France, Emmanuel Macron. Papa Francisko ndi President Macron Ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican yati zokambirana za atsogoleri awiriwa zidatenga pafupifupi ola limodzi ndipo atsogoleri awiriwa akambirana nkhani zosiyana-siyana kuphatikizapo za kufunika kwa mtendere pa dziko la pansi makamaka pano pomwe nkhondo ya m’dziko la Ukraine ili mkati. Pambuyo pa zokambirana zawo atsogoleri awiriwa adasinthana mphatso. President Macron anachitanso zokambirana ndi mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika, Cardinal Pietro Parolin komanso mlembi wa mkulu wa mu ofesi yowona za ubale wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika ndi maiko ena, Archbishop Paul Richard Gallagher. Kameneka ndi kachitatu kuti atsogoleriwa akumane chikhalireni Papa Francisco pa mpando wa u Papa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Arkidayosizi Ya Lilongwe Ikhazikitsa Bungwe La Mafumu Achikatolika
news: Arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe, ikuyembekezeka kukhazikitsa bungwe la mafumu achikatolika pa 19 November chaka chino. Ambuye Tambala: Bungwe limeneli libereka zipatso zochuluka mu mpingo Malinga ndi arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosiziyo, Ambuye George Tambala, mwambo wokhazikitsa bungweli udzachitikira ku Kasiya ku tchalitchi la St. Bernadette Chitula mu arkidayosiziyo pa tsiku lomwe tchalitchili lizakhazikitsidwe kukhala Parishi. Ambuye Tambala ati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti bungwe limeneli likakhazikitsidwa libweretsa mafumuwa pamodzi komanso kuzamitsa chikhulupiliro chawo. “Ndikupempheni mafumu nonse kuno ku arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe kuti tiyeni tidzapite ku St. Bernadette Chitula pa 17 November komwe kukakhalenso mwambo wotsekulira Parish imeneyi ya tsopano. Ndikukhulupilira kuti bungwe limeneli libereka zipatso zochuluka mu mpingo,” anatero Ambuye Tambala. Mwazina, Ambuye Tambala apempha mafumu kuti akhale patsogolo kupereka upangiri ndi malangizo awo ku mpingo pofuna kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za mu mpingo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Apeza Matupi 25 A Anthu Akufa ku Mzimba
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mzimba apeza matupi 25 a anthu akufa mu nkhalango ya Mtangatanga m’bomalo. Anthuwa akuganiziridwa kuti ndi mzika za maiko a Ethiopia ndi Somalia. Kalaya: Anazindikira manda amenewa ndi anthu a m’mudzi Poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, m’neneri wa apolisi mdziko muno Senior Superintendent Peter Kalaya ati apolisi akufuzabe kuti apeze chomwe chapha anthuwa. “Nkhaniyo ndi yowona. Tapeza anthu ochuluka omwe ali akufa. Anazindikira manda amenewa ndi anthu a m’mudzi omwe anazatidziwitsa ife apolisi ndipo ife tikufufuza kuti tidziwe kuti anthuwa analipo angati nanga amachokera kuti kupita kuti ndipo iwowa afa chifukwa chani,” anatero a Kalaya. Iwo ati padakali pano apolisi mogwirizana ndi nthambi zina za boma monga yowona zolowa ndi kutuluka, ya za ndende, a chipatala ndinso akuluakulu ochokera ku khonsolo afika ku maloko kugwilira ntchito limodzi. Pamenepa a Kalaya ati nthambizi zitulutsa tsatanetsatane wa zomwe zinachitika kuti anthuwa afe, akatsiriza kafukufuku wawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watulutsa Mlozo Wa Ulendo Wake Waku Bahrain
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kukacheza m’dziko la Bahrain kumayambiliro a mwezi wa mawa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa akacheza m’dzikolo atayitanidwa ndi a episkopi a mpingo wa Katolika ndi boma la dzikolo. Mlozo omwe likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse latulutsa wati Papa Francisco akakhala nawo pa msonkhano wolimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu, Bahrain Forum for Dialogue: East and West for Human Coexistence. Iye akachitanso nkumano ndi akuluakulu a chipembedzo cha chisilamu, mkumano ndi mipingo yonse ya chikhristu ya m’dzikolo, kuyankhula kwa a kazembe oyimira maiko awo, atsogoleri a ndale, atsogoleri a ma bungwe omwe si a boma, kuyankhula kwa a episkopi, ansembe, asisitere, a bulazala, asemino ndi a Katekisiti, mkumano ndi achinyamata a m’dzikolo komanso kuchita Misa. Papa Francisco akhala Papa woyamba kukacheza m’dziko la Bahrain ndipo ulendowu ulipo kuyambira pa 3 mpaka pa 6 November.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mwana Wafa Khitchini Itayaka Moto
news: Mwana wina wa zaka zitatu wafa moto utatentha khitchini yomwe iye amaseweramo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi ku Mponera m’boma la Dowa, Sergeant Macpatson Msadala, lachiwiri mwanayu Promise Staliko amasewera mu khitchiniyi momwe munali udzu ndipo anatenga moto kulowa nawo mu khitchinimo omwe unagwira udzuwo ndi kutentha khitchini yo. Pamenepa mwanayu analephera kuthawa ndipo anakomoka ndi utsi ndi kupsera momwemo. Achipatala cha Mponera atapima thupilo, apeza kuti mwanayu wafa kaamba ka mabala a moto komanso kubanika. Padakalipano apolisi apempha makolo kuti adzikhala ndi chidwi ndi ana awo pamene akusewera. Promise Staliko amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mtseketana mdera la mfumu yaikulu Dzoole m’boma lomwelo la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Madzi A Ukhondo Ndi Othadiza Pa Chitukuko Cha Dziko – Nduna
news: Unduna owona za maboma ang’ono wati maphunziro abwino komanso kukhala ndi madzi a ukhondo kungathandizire kupititsa patsogolo chitukuko cha dziko lino. Daudi: Madzi awa ndi a m’mipopi osati m’mijigo Wachiwiri kwa nduna mu undunawu, mayi Halima Daudi ayankhula izi lachinayi mdera la mfumu yaikulu Chauma m’boma la Dedza pa mwambo wopereka nyumba ziwiri za aphunzitsi pa sukulu ya pulaimale ya Kanyerere komanso kupereka madzi a m’mipope kwa anthu a m’derali. Mayi Daudi ati ndi cholinga cha boma kuwonetsetsa kuti madera onse mdziko muno akulandira zitukuko zosiyanasiyana monga zipinda zophunzilira, nyumba za aphunzitsi komanso madzi a ukhondo. “Kwa Kanyerere ndi kovuta kumapita koma nyumba zimene tamangazi zithandiza kwambiri. Madzi amene tatsekulira lero ndi aukhondo ndipo anthu a kuno ndi osangalala kwambiri chifukwa madzi awa ndi a m’mipopi osati m’mijigo,” anatero mayi Daudi. Poyankhulapo phungu wa derali a Savel Kafwafwa wati kumangidwa kwa nyumba za aphunzitsizi, kuthandiza kupititsa patsogolo maphunziro m’deralo. “Kumeneko aphunzitsi amakhalira kutali kwambiri koma tsopano tamangako nyumba za makono zomwe zatenga ndalama zokwana 56 million kwacha,” anatero a Kafwafwa. Patsikuli wachiwiri kwa ndunayi anatsogolera ntchito yosesa pa msika wa Mayani mdera la mfumu yaikulu Tambala m’boma la Dedza.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akulu a Dambwe Akagwira ukayidi kwa zaka 14 kaamba kogwililira
news: Bwalo loyamba la milandu kwa Santhe m’boma la Kasungu lalamula akuluakulu awiri a dambwe kuti akakhale ku ndende zaka khumi ndi zinayi (14) kaamba kopezeka olakwa pa mlandu wogwlilira amayi awiri a m’deralo. Malinga ndi woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sub Inspector Ulemu Botha, awiriwa omwe ndi a Ngelezi Kasalika komanso a Chimwemwe Chibwe anapalamula mlanduwu pa 26 September chaka chino ku dambwe la Gulewamkulu m’mudzi mwa Kanyenda pomwe amayi awiriwo anapita ku dambweko ndi cholinga choti alowe Gulewamkulu. Akuluakuluwa akuti analamula amayiwa kuti apereka ndalama yokwana 2 sauzande kwacha ndipo amayiwa atalephera kupereka ndalamayo akuluakuluwa anawauza amayiwa kuti agone nawo kuti alowe guleyo mwaulere. Malinga ndi Sub Inspector Botha, akuluakuluwa anawopseza amayiwa kuti akakana kugona nawo ayiwala msanga zomwe aphunzira ku dambweko ndinso kuti achita misala. Atawonekera ku bwalo la milandu, anthuwa anawukana mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa kuti boma libweretse mboni zinayi zomwe zinachititsa kuti apezeke wolakwa. Popereka chigamulo chake, First Grade Magistrate Jones Masula anagwirizana ndi woyimira boma pa mlanduwu yemwe anati milandu ya mtunduwu ikuchulukira mderalo ndipo anati wapereka chilango chotere kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. A Ngelezi Kasalika ndi a Chimwemwe Chibwe onse amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kanyenda m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Chidzuma m’boma lomwelo la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Bungwe la PIFM Likhale Liwu la Osauka
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa bungwe la Pontifical Institute for Foreign Missions kuti lipitirize kukhala liwu la anthu osauka. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lachinayi ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi mamembala a bungweli pano pomwe bungweli likukondwerera kuti lakwanitsa zaka 150 chilikhazikitsireni. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti bungwelilipitirize kukhala liwu la anthu osauka, anthu ophysinjidwa, anthu omwe salabadiridwa, osaiwala anthu omwe ali m’maiko momwe muli nkhondo za m’gonagona. Pa m’maiko momwe muli nkhondo za mgonagona iye watchula maiko monga Syria, Yemen ndi Myanmar. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwanso ndi nkhondo ta m’dziko la Ukraine yomwe ikupitirira kuphetsa ndi kuvulaza anthu ankhaninkhani osalakwa. Iye wati sibwino kuyiwala anthu a m’maiko amenewa komanso kuyiwala nkhondo zimenezi ponena kuti kutero ndi tchimo. Papa Francisco sadayiwale kutsindika za kufunika kwa utumiki mu Mpingo womwe bungwe la Pontifical Institute for Foreign Missions limalimbikitsa kudzera mu magazini yomwe bungweli limasindikiza. Iye watsiriza ndi kudalitsa mamembala a bungweli komanso onse omwe amathandiza ndi kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za bungweli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Anayi Anjatidwa Atapezeka Ndi Nyanga Za Njobvu M’boma La Kasungu
news: Apolisi m’boma la Kasungu amanga anthu anayi kaamba kowaganizira kuti apezeka ndi nyanga za njobvu. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho, anthuwa ndi a Mercy Gerson a zaka 52, Steven Banda a zaka 51, Royned Chirwa a zaka 40 ndi a Bainet Chirwa a zaka 53 ndipo agwidwa lachinayi pa 13 October chaka chino pomwe amatsatsa malondawa kwa anthu pa nsika wina m’mudzi mwa Chiwato m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kaluluma m’bomalo. Nyanga za njovu zomwe zalandidwazo Potsatira kutsinidwa khutu ndi anthu akufuna kwabwino, ogwira ntchito ku nthambi yowona za nyama zakutchire ya National Parks and Wildlife anawasaka anthuwa ndipo anawapeza ndi nyanga za Njobvu zokwana 16 zomwe ndi zolemera ma kilo gram okwana 58.5 kilograms. Anthuwa akuyembekezereka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlanduwu. A Mercy Gerson amachokera m’mudzi mwa Chinkhande m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kalumo m’boma la Ntchisi, a Steven Banda ndi a m’mudzi mwa Mzungunika, pomwe a Royned Chirwa ndi a Bainet Chirwa ndi a m’mudzi mwa Chiwato m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kaluluma m’boma la Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mpingo wa Katolika Wati Upitiriza Kupereka Maphunziro Apamwamba
news: Mpingo wa katolika wati sukulu zake zipitirira kuchita bwino pa nkhani yotukula maphunziro mdziko muno popereka maphunziro a pamwamba. Mkulu woyang’anira ntchito za sukulu za chikatolika ku likulu la mpingowu mdziko munpo ku Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM), brother Pascal Mtuwana anena izi pothilirapo ndemanga pa zotsatira za mayeso a form 2 zomwe zawonetsa kuti sukulu za chikatolika zachita bwino kwambiri. Pa za dandaulo loti sukulu zachikatolika sizikupindulira anthu osauka, brother Mtuwana ati anthu akuyenera kuzindikira kuti ndi udindo wa boma kuthandiza ana omwe akulephera kupita msukulu zosiyanasiyana kukapitiriza maphunziro. “Chinsinsi ndi kusunga mwambo pakati pa ophunzira ndi aphunzitsi omwe. Pasakhalenso zachibwana koma kulimbikira sukulu ndi ntchito kuphatikizapo kulimbikitsa chikatolika chathu msukuluzi,” anatero brother Mtuwana. Malinga ndi zotsatirazi, mwa sukulu khumi ndi imodzi zomwe zakhonzetsa ophunzira onse mayeso a fomu 2 ndipo kuli ophunzira ochuluka omwe apeza grade A ndi B pa mayesowa sukulu khumi ndi za mpingo wa Katolika. Sukuluzi ndi za St. Kizito seminary (95%), Likuni boys (87%), Chaminade Marianist Pvt (82%), Ludzi Girls (81%), Nankhunda Seminary (81%), Loyola Jesuit (81%), Marist (79%), Chaminade (76%), Mtendere (74%) komanso Bakhita Pvt (74%).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Aepiskopi Ayike Chidwi Pa Achinyamata, Osauka
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha a episkopi a m’maiko a ku Asia kuti ayike mtima wawo kwambiri pa achinyamata ndi anthu osauka. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake omwe watumizira a episkopi’wa kudzera mu bungwe lao la Federation of Asian Bishops’ Conferences (FABC) omwe padakali pano akuchita msonkhano wao ku Bangkok m’dziko la Thailand. Iye watsindika za kufunika komvetsera Mzimu Woyera pamene akusinkhasinkha za kufunika kwa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu, za anthu osauka, achinyamata komanso za kufunika kolimbikitsa kukambirana ngati njira yothetsera kusamvana komwe kumakhalapo. Papa Francisco wati akukumbukira za momwe mpingo wa Katolika udafikira ku maiko a ku Asia komanso wati akukumbukira za ulendo wa Papa Paulo wa nambala 6 Woyera yemwe adakacheza ku deralo m’chaka cha 1970 komwe wati adakapeza kuti deralo pa nthawiyo kudali achinyamata ochuluka, zikhalidwe komanso zipembedzo zosiyana-siyana. Iye wati izi zikutanthauza kuti Mpingo ku deralo ukuyenera kuika maso pa achinyamata, anthu osauka komanso kulimbikitsa kukambirana ndi zikhalidwe komanso zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana. Pochita zimenezi, Papa Francisco wati a episkopi’wa akuyenera kumawunikiridwa ndi Mzimu Woyera. Papa Francisco sadayiwale kukumbutsa a episkopi’wa za kufunika kolimbikitsa akhristu eni ake ndi kuwazindikiritsa kuti mpingo uli m’manja mwawo. Iye watsiriza uthengawu ndi kupereka madalitso ake a upositoli kwa episkopi’wa ndipo wawapempha kuti azimupemphelera. Msonkhano wa a episkopi’wa omwe udayamba pa 12 October ufika ku mapeto pa 30 October.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alangiza A Chitetezo Cha M’madera Apewe Kutengera Malamulo M’manja Mwawo
news: Apolisi ku Kanengo, mu mzinda wa Lilongwe, alangiza makomiti a za chitetezo cha m’madera kuti akhale otsatira malamulo komanso kupewa kulanga okha anthu omwe akuganiziridwa kuti apalamula milandu. Mkulu wa polisi ya Kanengo, Inspector Chrissy Tambala wapereka langizoli lachitatu sabata ino pa mkumano wa akuluakulu apolisi ndi makomiti a za chitetezo cha m’madera ozungulira polisi ya Kanengo. Inspector Tambala, wachenjeza makomiti’wa kuti polisi siyidzaikira kumbuyo wina aliyense yemwe adzipita m’makomo ndi kumakachita chipikisheni komanso kulanda katundu woganiziridwa kuti ndi wobedwa mu dzina loti ndi wachitetezo cha ku dera, popeza kuti iyi ndi ntchito ya a polisi. “Anthuwa tawalangizadi kuti apewe kumapita mnyumba za wanthu kumakachita chipikisheni chifukwa imeneyo si ntchito yawo. Anthu atha kuwachita chipongwe choncho akapeza munthu asamumenye, angotidziwitsa ife,” anatero Sub Inspector Ngwira. Ngwira analangizanso anthuwa kuti apewe kulanga okha anthu omwe apalamula milandu yosiyanasiyana ponena kuti kutero kumasokoneza umboni oyendetsera milandu yomwe apalamulayo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Likusaka Ndalama Zokonzera Ndondomeko Ya Madzi
news: Unduna owona za madzi ndi ukhondo, wati ukusakasaka ndalama zoti upitirizire kupereka madzi aukhondo m’madera osiyanasiyana mdziko muno. Nduna mu undunawu mayi Abida Mia anena izi lolemba ku Liwonde m’boma la Machinga pomwe anapita kukayendera malo oteteza kayendedwe madzi mu mtsinje wa Shire a Kamuzu Barrage. Mia: Tikusaka ndalama Mwazina mayi Mia ayamikira ogwira ntchito pa malowa kaamba ka kudzipereka kwawo powonetsetsa kuti madziwa akusamaliridwa bwino ndipo kuti akuthandiziranso bungwe la EGENCO kumbali yobweretsa mphamvu za magetsi. “Ngati madzi sakupangidwa control ndiye kuti atha kumasefukira kunsi kwa mtsinje wa Shire. Padakalipano tikusaka ndalama kuti aliyense m’Malawi muno akhale ndi madzi a uklhondo,” anatero mayi Mia. Poyankhulapo wapampando wa nthambi ya boma mu undunawu ya Natural Water Resources Authority a James Mambulu ati nthambiyi iwonetsetsa kuti madzi opezeka pamalowa akusamaridwa bwino ndipo kuti sakupereka chiwopsezo chiri chonse kwa anthu. “Tilinso ndi ntchito yowonetsetsa kuti anthu asamawononge madzi mu njira zosiyanasiyana. Padakalipano pali zambiri zolakwika chifukwa panalibe ogwira ntchito koma tsopano tayamba kulemba anthu ntchito,” anatero a Mambulu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Atsogolera Chikondwelero cha Zaka 60 za Msonkhano Waukulu Wachiwiri wa Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsogolera a Katolika pa dziko lonse pochita chikondwerero cha zaka 60 kuchokera pomwe msonkhano wachiwiri wa Vatican udautsekulira. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, chikondwererochi chachitika lachiwiri ndi Misa mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican. Msonkhanowu omwe udayamba m’chaka cha 1962, udatha m’chaka cha 1965. Papa Yohane wa nambala 23 ndi yemwe adautsekulira pa 11 October m’chaka cha 1962 ndipo Papa Paulo wa 6 ndi yemwe adatsekera msonkhanowu pa 8 December m’chaka cha 1965. Mu malaliko ake pa Misa’yi, Papa Francisko wati pofuna kumvetsa m’mene mpingo uliri, akhristu akuyenera kumvetsa za msonkhano wachiwiri wa Vatican ponena kuti pali zambiri zofunika kuti akhristu azidziwe zokhudza Mpingo. Papa Francisco wati cholinga cha msonkhanowu chidali chofuna kuti anthu adziwe kuti mpingo ndi chiyani ndipo cholinga chake ndi chiyani, the nature and mission of the Church m’chingerezi. Iye wati cholinga cha mpingo ndiye kusaka nkhosa zotayika. Papa Francisco watsindikanso za kufunika kwa umodzi mu mpingo. Chimodzi mwa zipatso za msonkhano wachiwiri wa Vatican ndiye kupatsa akhristu umwini wa mpingo kuti mpingo uli m’manja mwawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amayi Awiri Anjatidwa Atapezeka ndi Mankhwala Owopsa
news: Apolisi mu mzinda wa Lilongwe amanga amayi awiri kaamba kowaganizira kuti apezeka ndi mankhwala owopsa a Ephedrine, popanda chilorezo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mu mzindawo Inspector Hastings Chigalu, anthuwa ndi a Beatrice Kaunda a zaka 19 a m’mudzi mwa Kande mfumu yaikulu Mankhambera m’boma la Nkhatabay ndi a Sekai Chiwala a zaka 46 a m’mudzi mwa Masaliyele m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Mkanda m’boma la Mchinji. Amayi omwe anjatidwawo Iye wati amayiwa amafuna kutumiza mankhwalawa kwa munthu wina mdziko la Phillipines ndipo anawakutira mu katoni ina yomwe amati muli mesh. “Amayiwa titawafunsa akuti anapatsiridwa katunduyu ndi munthu wina wa nyumba yoyandikana nayo yemwe ndi mzika ya mdziko la Nigeria kuti akamutumizire katunduyu ku Phillipines kudzera ku kamopani ina ya za mtengatenga mu tawuni ya Lilongwe. Ogwira ntchito ku kampaniyi anafunsa chomwe chili mu katoniyi ndipo anthuwa atanena kuti muli mesh zinawadabwitsa ndipo ataphwasula ndi pomwe anapeza mankhwalawa atakutiridwa bwino,” anatero Inspector Chigalu. Pakadali pano mankhwalawa awatumiza ku nthambi yowona za mankhwala m’dziko muno ya Pharmacy Medicine and Regulatory Authority (PMRA). Anthuwa akuwasunga m’chitokosi cha apolisi podikira kuti akawonekere ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlandu wopezeka ndi mankwala owopsa popanda chilorezo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa Ya Anthu Khumi Mdziko La Ireland
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu kaamba ka imfa ya anthu khumi m’dziko la Ireland. Malinga ndi malipoti a Catholic News Agency, anthuwa afa m’dera la Donegal potsatira kuphulika kwa gas pa malo ena osungira gas a m’dzikolo. Malo omwe aphulikawo Kudzera mwa mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Papa watumiza uthenga wopepesa kwa Ambuye Alan McGuckian omwe ndi episkopi wa ku dera lomwe kwachitika ngoziyi. Mu uthengawu, Papa Francisco wati ndi wachisoni chachikulu kaamba ka imfa ya anthu khumi, anthu ena omwe avulala komanso katundu yemwe wawonongeka ndipo wati kudzera m’mapemphero ali pafupi ndi anthu onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi. Iye wapepesa anamfedwa onse ndipo wati ndi pemphero lake kuti Mulungu awakhudze mwa njira ya padera ndi kuwathunzitsa mtima kaamba kotaya abale awo. Papa Francisco sadayiwale kuyikiza m’mapemphero onse omwe avulala kuti achire mwa msanga komanso onse omwe katundu wawo waonongeka. Iye watsiriza ndi kupereka madalitso ake kwa anthu onse a m’dziko la Ireland. Malinga ndi malipoti mwa anthu khumi omwe afa atatu ndi ana ndipo anthu asanu ndi atatu (8) ndi omwe avulala. Padakali pano apolisi m’dzikolo akufufuza kuti apeze chomwe chachititsa ngoziyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: NFRA Ayilamula Isamutse Chimanga Chake ku ADMARC
news: Komiti yowona za ulimi kunyumba ya malamulo mdziko muno yalamula nthambi ya National Food Reserve Agency (NFRA) kuti ichite machawi posamutsa chimanga ku ADMARC. Wapampando wa komitiyi a Sameer Suleman anena izi lachiwiri mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pa mkumano wa komitiyi ndi bungwe la NFRA. Ku mkumanowu kumayembekezekanso kufika akuluakulu aku unduna wa za ulimi komanso akuluakulu a bungwe la ADMARC koma sanafike. A Suleman (kumanzere) kuyankhula pa mkumanowo A Suleman ati ngati nthambi ya NFRA sichotsa msanga chimangachi izi zichititsa kuti a Malawi ambiri adzasowe chakudya kaamba koti m’chitidwe wa katangale kuphatikizapo wozembetsa chimanga ukupitilirabe ku bungwe la ADMARC. “Zomwe zikuchitika ku ADMARC ndi zosakhala bwino ndipo ndi zopha aMalawi chifukwa akuyitseka mosatsata malamulo. Nde tawauza a NFRA kuti akachotse chimanga ku ADMARC chifukwa kwalowa mbava kumeneko,” anatero a Suleman. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe la National Food Reserve Agency (NFRA) kuno ku Malawi a Brenda Kayongo ati amva za pempholi koma iwo atsutsa zoti anthu ena akumagula chimanga ku ADMARC ndi kumakagulitsa ku bungwe la NFRA. “Chiyambireni kugula chimanga chaka chino tagula ku magulu a alimi nde zinazo ndi zabodza,” anatero mayi Kayongo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akhazikitsa Anthu Awiri Kukhala Oyera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati pali khate la mitundu yosiyanasiyana m’mitima ya anthu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi laMulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican pa Misa yomwe adatsogolera pomwenso adakhazikitsa anthu awiri kukhala oyera. Anthu okwana 50 sauzande ndi omwe adasonkhana pa mwambowu. Anthu awiri omwe mpingo wawakhazikitsa kukhala oyera ndi Giovanni Battista Scalabrini yemwe adali episkopi ndi Artemide Zatti. Mu malaliko ake, Papa Francisco adakhazikika pa Uthenga Wabwino wa tsiku laMulungu la 28 mu nyengo ya pa chaka omwe ukufotokoza za anthu khumi akhate omwe Ambuye Yesu adawachiritsa koma ndi munthu m’modzi yekha adakumbukira kuthokoza atalandira machiritso. Iye wati mkhristu aliyense akuyenera kuzindikira khate lomwe lili mu mtima mwake ndi kupempha chifundo komanso machiritso a Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati masiku akalewo nthenda ya khate idali kuwalekanitsa odwalawo ndi abale awo komanso anthu ena onse. Pamenepa iye wati tsankho la mtundu uliwonse silikuyenera kupeza malo mu mpingo wa Katolika ndipo wadzudzula khalidwe la anthu ena mu mpingowu lomadziyesa kuti iwo ndiwofunikira kuposa ena. Papa Francisco wati munthu aliyense akuyenera kupeza malo ake mu Mpingo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: President Chakwera Watsekulira Chipatala cha Phalombe
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wati boma lake ndi lodzipereka kuwonetsetsa kuti zitukuko zomwe maboma a m’mbuyomu anayamba, zimalizitsidwe. President Chakwera wayankhula izi lachiwiri pa mwambo wotsekulira chipatala chachikulu cha boma la Phalombe. Chipatalachi chomwe chizikwanitsa kugoneka odwala okwana 265, chamangidwa ndi ndalama zoposa 24.7 million US Dollars ndipo chinayamba kumangidwa mchaka cha 2017 ndi mtsogoleri wakale wa dziko lino Professor Peter Mutharika, ndipo chimayembekezeka kutha pofika m’chaka cha 2019. Chipatala cha boma la Phalombe President Chakwera wati zitukuko zomwe maboma osiyanasiyana amamanga amagwiritsa ntchito ndalama za misonkho ya a Malawi ndipo kupitiliza zitukukozi ndi njira yokhayo yowonetsetsa kuti ndalama za misonkho ya a Malawi zikugwira ntchito moyenera. “Zitukuko zonse zomwe maboma a m’mbuyomu analekezera panjira zimalizidwa kuti anthu alandire zitukuko zowayenera. Pali zitukuko zambiri monga misewu, zipatala ndi sukulu m’maboma a Phalombe, Neno, Chikwawa ndi ena,” anatero Dr. Chakwera. Poyankhulapo wogwirizira mpando wa mfumu yaikulu Kaduya ku Phalombe komanso phungu wa dera lapakati m’boma la Phalombe, a George Million anagwirizana poyamikira boma kaamba komalizitsa ntchito yomanga chipatalachi chomwe ati chithetsa mavuto omwe anthu ofuna thandizo la zachipatala amakumana nawo. Komabe, mfumu yayikulu Kaduya yapempha boma kuti lilumikize chipatala cha Phalombe ku madzi a ma paipi chifukwa madzi omwe alipo pano ndi okumba pansi ndipo ndi osadalirika. Chipatala chachikulu cha m’boma la Phalombe achimanga ndi ndalama zochokera ku mabungwe a Arab Bank for African Development, Saudi Fund for Development ndi gawo lina la ndalama kuchokera ku boma la Malawi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu 127 ku Parishi ya Rumphi Alandira Ulimbitso
news: Lamulungu pa 9 okotobala chaka chino, ndi tsiku losaiwalika kwa akhristu omwe alandira sakramenti la Ulimbitso m’parishi ya St. Dennis ku Rumphi mu dayosizi ya Mzuzu. Poyankhula pa mwambowu, episikopi wa dayosiziyi, Ambuye John Ryan anati ndi okondwa ndi kuchuluka kwa akhristu omwe alandira sakramenti-li ndipo apempha anthuwa kuti akhale zida zodzetsa mtendere pakati pawo. Ambuye Ryan: Sakramenti la Ulimbitso ndi lofunika kwambiri Iwo anati kulandira sakalamenti la Ulimbitso ndiye kuti akhristuwa alandira Mzimu Woyera yemwe adziwathandiza pamene akutumikira Mulungu mu njira zosiyanasiyana. “Sakramenti la Ulimbitso ndi lofunika kwambiri kwa akhristu achikatolika chifukwa choti limapereka udindo kwa akhristuwa wochitira umboni Yesu Khristu,” anatero Ambuye Ryan. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa akhristu omwe alandira sakramenti-li mayi Tereza Mhango ati chisangalalo chawo ndi chosefukira kaamba koti akwaniritsa maloto awo polandira sakramenti-li ndipo alonjeza kuti akhala m’m,odzi mwa akhristu odalirika mu mpingo wa Katolika. Sakalamenti la Ulimbitso ndi limodzi mwa ma sakramenti asanu ndi awiri omwe Ambuye Yesu adapanga ndipo polandira sakramenti-li akhristu amalandira Mzimu Woyera ndi mphatso zake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ma episkopi Adzudzula Boma Kaamba Kokolezera Umphawi
news: Maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno adandaula kaamba ka kukula kwa umphawi omwe anthu mdziko muno akukumana nawo. Maepiskopiwa anena izi kudzera mu kalata yomwe alemba yomwe yafotokoza zina mwa zinthu zotsamwitsa zomwe akuti zikulepheretsa dziko lino kupita patsogolo yomwe yalembedwa pa mutu woti; “Pempho lakuti timvetsetse ndiponso tikhudzidwe ndi madandaulo akulira kwa aMalawi osauka.” Tsamba loyamba la kalatayo Iwo atinso ndi okhumudwa kwambiri kuti umphawi ukukulirakulirabe pakati pa anthu mdziko muno pamene boma likulephera kukwaniritsa malonjezo ake. “Ngakhale dziko lino likukumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana monga ngozi zogwa mwadzidzidzi, nthenda ya COVID-19, nkhondo yaku Ukraine ndi zina, boma likanatha kuchita bwino pa zinthu zina potsata ndondomeko zowonetsetsa kuti umoyo wa anthu ukuyenda bwino,” yatero kalatayo. Maepiskopiwa ati kuchepa mphamvu kwa ndalama ya Kwacha, kukwera kwa mitengo ya chakudya, kusowa kwa ntchito, kusowa kwa mafuta a galimoto, kusowa kwa ndalama zakunja komanso kusowa kwa ndondomeko zotetezera anthu ogula, ndi zina mwa zizindikiro zoti zinthu mdziko muno sizikuyenda bwino ndipo boma la Tonse Alliance lalephera kutumikira a Malawi monga lidalonjezera. Kalatayi yadandaula za kusowa kwa mgwirizano pakati pa nthambi za boma zosiyanasiyana zolimbana ndi katangale ndi ziphuphu komanso kuchedwa kwa milandu ya katangale yokhudza anthu akuluakulu m’boma. Padakakalipano m’mene ndondomeko ya zipangizo za ulimi zotsika mtengo iyendera chaka chino siyinadziwike ndipo maepiskopiwa ati izi ndi zomvetsa chisoni poganizira kuti nyengo yamvula yayandikira ndipo zimenezi zili ndi kuthekera kodzetsa njala ya dzaoneni. Mwazina maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolikawa, adzudzulanso momwe boma la Tonse Alliance likuyendera ponena kuti mwachuluka miseche, mikangano ndi mpikisano wapansipansi pofuna kutchuka komanso kukonderana. Iwo ati kusowa kwa mgwirizano pa zipani zomwe zili mu mgwirizano wa Tonse kukukhudza anthu osauka ndi amphawi ati kaamba koti zipanizi zili kalikiliki kulimbana m’malo momaganizira zosowa za anthu ndi chitukuko cha dziko lino. Padakalipano boma silinayankepo kanthu pa nkhaniyi kaamba koti mneneri wa boma a Gospel Kazako sanayankhe lamya yawo kuti ayankhulepo pa nkhaniyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Mkumano Ndi Alangizi A Sukulu Za Chikatolika ku Switzerland
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita mkumano ndi alangizi a chi Katolika m’sukulu za m’dziko la Switzerland. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mkumanowu wachitikira ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican.  Iye wayamikira ntchito yotamandika yomwe alangizi a chi Katolika (Catholic chaplains) m’sukulu za m’dziko la Switzerland akugwira ndipo wati ulangizi wawo ndi wofunika kwambiri. Papa wawapempha kuti azigwira ntchito yawo molumikizana ndi akhristu a mipingo ina pofuna kupititsa patsogolo ntchito yosula achinyamatawa komanso ngati njira yopititsira patsogolo ubale wabwino pakati pa mipingo ya chikhristu. Iye wati akuzindikira kuti ntchito ya ulangizi kwa achinyamata ndi yovuta komabe wati ngakhale izi zili chomwechi, ntchitoyi ndi yobweretsa chimwemwe maka powaona achinyamatawa akukula ndi kumakhala anthu odalirika. Iye watsindika za kufunika kokhala pafupi ndi achinyamatawa, pomawamvetsera ndi kuwalondolera kuti amudziwe Mulungu. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kuthokoza alangiziwa poganiza kuti abwere ku Vatican ndipo wawafunira zabwino zonse pa ntchito yawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Imfa Ya Anthu 34 Ku Thailand
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu kaamba ka imfa ya anthu 34 omwe aphedwa pa sukulu ina m’dziko la Thailand. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopepesa potsatira imfa’yi. Matupi a ena mwa anthu ophedwawo Munthu wina yemwe apolisi a m’dziko la Thailand ati adali wapolisi, lachinayi pa 6 October adapita pa sukulu ina ya ana aang’ono kwambiri yopezeka mu mzinda waukulu wa dzikolo wa Bangkok atanyamula mfuti komanso mpeni, ndi kupha anthu 34 ndipo mwa anthuwa 23 ndi ana. Malipoti akuti munthu wa upanduyu atafika kunyumba kwake, adaphanso mkazi wake ndi mwana wake womupeza asadadziombere yekha. Apolisi afotokoza kuti munthuyu yemwe ndi wa zaka 34 amazengedwa mlandu wina wogwiritsa ntchito mankhwala ozunguza bongo. Iwo ati kwa nthawi yaitali tsopano za upandu ngati izi sizidachitikepo mu mbiri ya dzikolo. Potsatira nkhani yomvetsa chisoniyi, Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wake wopepesa. Iye watumiza uthengawu kudzera mwa mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika, Vatican Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin. Papa Francisco wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu kaamba ka imfa ya anthu ochuluka chotere. Iye wapepesa anamfedwa onse ndipo watsimikiza za mapemphero ake kwa anamfedwawa ndi ena onse omwe akhudzidwa ndi imfayi mu njira zosiyana-siyana. Papa watsiriza ndi kunena kuti ndi pemphero lake kuti pa nthawi yovutayi anamfedwa onse athe kupeza chilimbikitso kuchokera kwa anthu akufuna kwabwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Msonkhano wa WUCWO Uli Mkati M’dziko la Greece
news: Nsonkhano wa nthumwi za gulu la amayi achikatolika pa dziko lonse la World Union Catholic Women, ukuchitika m’dziko la Greece. Malinga ndi m’modzi mwa nthumwizi, mayi Catherine Nyangulu, omwe ndi ochokera kuno ku Malawi mu dayosizi ya Mzuzu, nsonkhanowu wayamba lachinayi pa 6 October 2022 ndipo utha lamulungu pa 9 October 2022. Amayi a WUCWO kuchita msonkhano wawo Mayi Nyangulu ati nthumwizi zikuwunika mfundo zinayi zomwe bungweli linapereka kwa amai akatolika pa dziko lonse mu m’chaka cha 2019. Iwo ati mwa zina ku nsonkhanowu kusankhidwa ena mwa maudindo a atsogoleri a bungweli. “Ku msonkhano wathu m’chaka cha 2019 omwe unachitikira m’dziko la Senegal, tinawunikira zinthu zinayi zomwe amai akatolika tikuyenera kumazichita makamaka tinamuyang’ana kwambiri mmayi yemwe akuvutika kwambiri komanso anthu okalamba, ana osayiwala za chilengedwe,” anatero mayi Nyangulu Msonkhanowu ukuyembekezeka kupindulira kwambiri amayi akatolika m’dziko muno pamenenso akuyembekezeka kukhala ndi ulendo woyera wopita m’dziko la Italy.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Atolankhani Athandiza Anthu Odwala Khate
news: Atolankhani pansi pa bungwe lothana ndi matenda a chifuwa chachikulu cha Tuberculosis (TB) komanso Khate la National TB and Leprosy Elimination, apereka katundu osiyanasiyana wa ndalama zosachepera 500 sauzande kwacha ku mudzi wa anthu odwala nthenda ya Khate ku Utale 2 m’boma la Balaka. Sonani (wavala malaya akuda) kupereka katunduyo kwa m’modzi mwa anthuwo M’modzi mwa atolankhaniwa Doreen Sonani wati ganizo lothandiza ku malowa linadza potsatira kuwona mavuto omwe anthu odwala nthendayi akukumana nawo mdziko muno. Iye anati anthuwa amakumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana pa moyo wawo kaamba ka nthenda yawo. “Kupatula kugwira ntchito yathu yolemba nkhani, tinaganiza zoti tizagwireko ntchito ya chifundo yothandiza anzathu amene akudwala nthenda ya Khate amene akupezeka kuno ku Utale chifukwa tuikudziwa kuti anthu amenewa akukumana ndi mavuto ochuluka,” anatero Sonani. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa odwala nthenda ya Khate a Tobias Mofolo wayamikira atolankhaniwa kaamba kowathandiza ndi katundu kuwonjezera pa ntchito yomwe amagwira yomemeza ena kudzathandiza pa malowa. Pakadali pano, bambo mfumu wa Parish ya Utale 2 yomwe imayang’anira malowa, bambo Samuel Malamulo apempha thandizo la mayendedwe omwe angathandize oyang’anira malowa kumatengera odwala ku chipatala chachikulu pomwe pasowekera kutero.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Aliyense Amayitanidwa Kukhala Woyera
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati munthu aliyense amayitanidwa ndi Mulungu kuti akhale woyera. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pa mkumano wake ndi nthumwi za ku msonkhano womwe wakonzedwa ndi bungwe lomwe limawona za anthu oyera mu Mpingo. Kukhala anthu oyera m’masiku ano, Holiness Today ndi mutu wa msonkhanowu. Iye wati ngakhale kuti mpingo uli ndi anthu ambiri omwe adatchulidwa kuti ndi oyera, anthu akuyenera kuzindikira kuti palinso anthu ena ambiri oyera omwe mpingo sudawatchulebe mpaka lero kuti ndi oyera. Papa Francisco wati anthu oyera mu mpingo ndi zitsanzo zosilirika ndipo za mtengo wa patali za moyo wa chikhristu. Iye wati pamene mpingo umatchula munthu kuti ndi woyera umafuna kuzindikiritsa ndi kuphunzitsa akhristu ankhaninkhani kuti ndi zotheka kukhala mkhristu weniweni ndipo pa nthawi yomweyo Mpingo umafuna kuti anthu oyerawa akhale nyale kwa akhristu ena onse kuti naonso potsatira moyo wokoma wa anthu oyerawa athe kukhala anthu oyera. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti ndi chikhulupiriro chake kuti msonkhanowu uthandiza kuonanso zizindikiro za moyo wa anthu oyera m’masiku ano a makono.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akacheza mdziko la Bahrain Mwezi wa Mawa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kukacheza m’dziko la Bahrain kumayambiliro a mwezi wa mawa. Ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican, yatsimikiza za ulendowu omwe ukhalepo kuyambira pa 3 mpaka pa 6 November.  Likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse lati Papa Francisco akacheza m’dzikolo atavomera pempho la a episkopi a mpingo wa Katolika komanso boma la dzikolo. Mlozo omwe likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse latulutsa wati Papa akakhala nawo pa msonkhano wolimbikitsa ubale wabwino pakati pa anthu, Bahrain Forum for Dialogue: East and West for Human Coexistence. Koma si pokhapo, iye akachita mkumano ndi akuluakulu a chipembedzo cha chisilamu, nkumano ndi mipingo yonse ya chikhristu ya m’dzikolo, kuyankhula kwa a kazembe oyimira maiko awo, atsogoleri a ndale, atsogoleri a mabungwe omwe si a boma, kuyankhula kwa a episkopi, ansembe, asisitere, a bulazala, asemino ndi a Katekisiti, mkumano ndi achinyamata a m’dzikolo komanso kuchita Misa. Papa Francisco akhala Papa woyamba kukacheza m’dziko la Bahrain.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Litumiza Alenje M’madera Osautsidwa ndi Nyama Zotetezedwa
news: Unduna wa zokopa alendo, chikhalidwe ndi nyama zakutchire walamula kuti madera onse omwe ali pafupi ndi nkhalango yotetezedwa ya Kasungu, mukhale alenje a boma pofuna kuteteza mbewu ndi miyoyo ya anthu a m’maderawa. Nduna mu undunawu Dr. Micheal Usi anena izi lachitatu m’dera la Sub T/A Nthunduwala m’boma la Kasungu pomwe amayendera ndi kupepesa maliro ku mabanja a anthu omwe anaphedwa ndi njobvu mderalo Dr. Usi: Posachedwapa ntchito yomanga mpanda iyambika Iwo ati posachedwapa ntchito yomanga mpanda wa nyesi ya magetsi iyambika mozungulira madera onse komwe nyamazi zikusautsa ndipo atsimikizira anthu a m’deralo komwe nyama zakhala zikuwononga madimba, mbewu ndi ziweto zawo kuti boma liwathandiza powapatsa thandizo la chakudya. Pomaliza ndunayi yati kuponyedwa kwa asilikali a nkhalangowa m’maderawa kuchepetsa nkhawa ya anthu komabe alangiza anthuwo kuti adzikhala tcheru kaamba koti nyama zosiyanasiyana zikhala zikubwera kuchokera nkhalango zosiyanasiyana m’dziko muno. “Pali chikonzero choti posachedwapa ntchito yomanga mpanda iyambika ndipo kuti mpandawo ukatha kumangidwa, nyama zina monga mikango, akambuku ndi zina zochuluka zikhala zikubweretsedwanso mu nkhalango ya Kasungu National Park,” anatero a Usi. Poyankhulapo mfumu yaikulu Nthunduwala anathokoza ndunayi pofika ku deralo kudzawalimbikitsa ndi kupepesa mabanja okhudzidwa omwe anataya achibale awo pamene anaphedwa ndi njobvu. M’modzi mwa anamfedwa a Josophat Chikwawa Chirwa anati imfa ya m’bale wawo yawasiya m’mavuto aakulu kaamba koti malemuwa anasiya ana omwe akufunika thandizo pa moyo wawo wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Pa 16 September chaka chino, njobvu zolusa zomwe zinathawa mu nkhalangoyi zinapha anthu awiri m’maderawa. Izi zikuchitika pangodutsa miyezi iwiri nthambiyi itasamutsa nyama zoposa 600 kuchoka ku malo otetezedwa a Liwonde kupita nazo ku Kasungu National Park.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mapemphero Amapatsa Ufulu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati mapemphero komanso kuzindikira chomwe munthu ali, zimathandiza akhristu kukhala afulu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco wayankhula izi lachitatu ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pamene akupitirizabe kuphunzitsa anthu za kufunika kosinkhasinkha ndi kuchita ziganizo zolondola. Papa wati mkhristu aliyense angathe kudziwa chomwe ali ngati apeza nthawi yomasinkhasinkha. Iye wati kawiri-kawiri anthu amavutika kuchita ziganizo zolondola kaamba koti sadzidziwa iwo eni. Papa Francisco wati kulephera kupemphera bwino komanso kulephera kuchita ziganizo zolondola ndi zotsatira za kusadzidziwa umo m’mene munthu uliri. Iye wafotokoza kuti monga m’mene munthu amasowekera kuti adziwe nambala ya chinsinsi kuti athe kuchita zinthu pa makina a kompyuta ndi kosowekeranso kudziwa zinsinsi zodzamitsira moyo wa uzimu. Ndipo chimodzi mwa zinsinsi za moyo wa uzimu ndiye kudzidziwa iwe mwini m’mene uliri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsindika Za Mpingo Wochitira Zinthu Limodzi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kokhala ndi mpingo wochitira zinthu limodzi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi posinkhasinkha cholinga cha mapemphero ake a mwezi uno wa October. Iye wati ndi pemphero lake kuti mpingo ukhale wokhulupirika, wopanda mantha polalika Uthenga wa Chipulumutso, wogwirizana, wokonzeka kulandira munthu aliyense ndipo woyendera limodzi. Kudzera mu uthenga wa pa kanema, Papa Francisco wafotokoza tanthauzo la liwu loti Sinodi lomwe wati ndi lochokera ku chiyankhulo cha chi Giriki kutanthauza kuyendera limodzi. Iye wafotokoza kuti ndi cholinga cha Mulungu kuti mpingo mu nyengo ino ya makono udziwonetsa umodzi wake poyendera limodzi. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati mpingo ungathe kumayendera limodzi ngati utamamvetsera ndipo pa nthawi yomweyo ngati mpingowo ukhala wokonzeka kutsekula zitseko kwa awo omwe adakali kunja kwa mpingo. Iye wachenjeza kuti anthu akuyenera kusiyanitsa Sinodi ndi momwe zinthu zimakhalira mu nyumba ya malamulo. Papa Francisco wafotokoza kuti Sinodi siikutanthauza kuchita kafukufuku koma m’malo mwake Sinodi ndi nthawi yomvetsera zomwe Mzimu Woyera afuna kuti zichitike. Iye waonjezeranso Sinodi ndi nthawi yopemphera kaamba koti popanda kupemphera palibe Sinodi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anjatidwa Kaamba Kopezeka Ndi Mfuti, Zipolopolo
news: Apolisi m’boma la Chiradzulu, amanga bambo wina yemwe dzina lake ndi Prince Bwanali, wa zaka 28 kaamba kopezeka ndi mfuti ya F92 komanso zipolopolo, opanda zikalata zoyenera. Bwanali atanyamula mfuti ndi zipolopolo Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani ku polisi ya Chiradzulu, Innocent Moses, lolemba sabata ino, apolisi a pansewu omwe amachita chipikisheni anayimitsa njinga yamoto yomwe Prince ndi anzake ena anakwera ndipo anawona mfuti ili mu lamba wake. Atamufunsa bwino za mfutiyo, iye analephera kuwonetsa mapepala a mfutiyo, ndipo apo anamumanga ndi kukamusiya mchitolokosi. Bamboyu akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa kuti akayankhe mulandu wopezeka ndi mfuti yopanda chilorezo. Prince Bwanali, amachokera m’mudzi wa Nkonde, m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kadewere m’boma la Chiradzulu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Achita Zokambirana ndi Mkulu wa Kampani Yopanga Lamya
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi mkulu wa kampani yopanga lamya za m’manja ya Apple, a Tim Cook. Papa kukambirana ndi Cook Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, awiriwa achita zokambirana zao m’kachipinda komata kunyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace. Cook adafika m’dziko la Italy pa 28 September kugwira ntchito zosiyana-siyana monga kukhazikitsa sukulu ya pamwamba yotchedwa Apple Developer Academy komanso walandira degree ya ulemu, honorary degree ku sukulu ya ukachenjede yodziwika kuti University of Naples Federico II. M’mbuyomu Papa Francisco wachita zokambirana ndi akuluakulu a ma company odziwika bwino monga mkulu wa company ya Tesla ndi SpaceX, Elon Musk, Eric Schmidt yemwe adali mkulu wa company ya Google osaiwala muyambitsi wa Facebook, Mark Zuckerberg. Papa Francisco wakhala akunena kuti zipangizo za makono zikuyenera kutumikira anthu osati anthu kutumikira zinthuzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kuyenda ndi Mofolo Woyera
news: Program ya kuyenda ndi Mofolo Woyera yomwe ikufotokoza zimene Mofolo Woyera anaphunzitsa kudzera mu kalata yomwe analembera a chipani chake ndipo akupanga ndi bambo Joseph Kimu Podcast: Play in new window | Download

news: Program yoyamba  ya  Mpingo ndi Anthu yomwe ikufotokoza cholinga cha programyi  ndipo akupanga  ndi Bambo Medric Mlava. Podcast: Play in new window | Download

title: ECM Yapempha Akhristu Achilimike Pofalitsa Mthenga Wabwino
news: Akhristu mdziko muno awapempha kuti achilimike pa ntchito yawo yofalitsa Mthenga Wabwino posatengera mavuto osiyanasiyana omwe akukumana nawo pa moyo wawo wa tsiku nditsiku. Bishop Stima: Mwezi wa Chibalalitso ndi ofunikira kwambiri Wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno Ambuye Montfort Stima ndi omwe anena izi lachiwiri pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe unachitikira mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Ambuye Stima ati ngakhale kuti dziko lapansi kuphatikizapo dziko la Malawi likukumana ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana, koma ati Akhristu akuyenera kulimbika pa ntchito yawo yofalitsa Mthenga Wabwino. “Mwezi wa Chibalalitso ndi ofunikira kwambiri. Mkhristu aliyense awonetsetse kuti ali ndi udindo wothandiza pofalitsa mthenga wa Mulungu kuti ena amudziwe Yesu,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Zina mwa zinthu zomwe zimachitika mu mwezi wa October ndi monga kupemphelera ntchito zofalitsa Mthenga Wabwino pa dziko lonse, kuphunzitsa za kufunika kotumikira ena komanso kusonkhetsa ndalama zomwezimagwiritsidwa ntchito polalika Mthenga Wabwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Apempha Achinyamata Kutumikira Modzipereka
news: M’mawu ake kwa achinyamata 1, 000 a bungwe la Shalom mu Hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6 ku Vatican, Papa Francisco wawalimbikitsa kutumikira Mulungu mosacheuka ndi modziyiwala. Iye wati ndi kofunika kuti apeze njira za tsopano zopititsira patsogolo bungweli lomwe cholinga chake ndikuti achinyamata azitumikira achinyamata anzawo. Koma si pokhapo, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti achinyamatawa azimvetsera Mzimu Woyera ndi zomwe Mpingo umaphunzitsa. Iye wati ndi Mzimu Woyera yemwe amawongolera Mpingo ndi kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za Mpingo. Bungwe la Shalom Catholic Community lidayamba m’chaka cha 1982 m’dziko la Brazil ndi cholinga chofuna kulimbikitsa achinyamata kukhala zida zobweretsa kusintha komanso kukhala zida zodzetsa mtendere potengera chitsanzo cha Yesu Khristu. Bungweli padakali pano likupezeka m’maiko 33.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bishop Stima Asankha Bambo Mambo Kukhala Vicar General
news: Episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi, Ambuye Montfort Stima asankha bambo Davie Mambo kukhala Vicar General wa dayosiziyo. Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe episkopi wa dayosizi ya Mangochi Ambuye Montfort Stima alemba, iwo asankha bambo Mambo pa udindowu kulowa m’malo mwa bambo Frank Chingale omwe akupita kukapitiriza maphunziro a Philosophy ku Arrupe Jesuit University mdziko la Zimbabwe. Vicar General watsopano wa dayosizi ya Mangochi Bambo Mambo analowa unsembe pa 25 September, 2004 ndipo pamene akusankhidwa pa udindowu anali akutumikira ngati bambo mfumu wa parishi ya Namalaka mu dayosiziyo. Poyankhulapo pa nkhaniyi bambo Mambo athokoza Mulungu kaamba kosankhidwa pa udindowu ndipo apempha akhristu mu dayosisiyi kuti awapemphelere kuti atumikire bwino pa udindowu. “Ndikuthokoza Mulungu pa zimene wandichitira. Udindo uliwonse umakhala ndi zoyenera kuti ukwaniritse ndiye monga ndakhala ndikugwilira ntchito m’mbuyomu ndipitiriza kugwira ntchito modzipereka. Chimene ndingapemphe ndi mapemphero kwa akhristu a dayosizi ya Mangochi kuti tithe kukwaniritsa zomwe Mulungu watisankhira pa udindowu,” anatero bambo Mambo. Ambuye Stima asankhanso alangizi awo atsopano omwe ndi bambo Medrick Chimbwanya, bambo Menas Mukaka, bambo George Nyanga, bambo Danasio Malajira, bambo Tito Bayani komanso bambo Isaac Mpokwe. Episkopiyu wasankhanso maudindo ena monga mlembi wa episkopi yemwe tsopano ndi bambo Medrick Mlava, bambo Steven Namame asankhidwa kukhala mkulu owona za chiyitanidwe, bambo Steven Kamanga kukhala mkulu owona za ma katekisti, bambo Paul Kumwenda kukhala mkulu owona za baibulo mu dayosiziyo ndipo episkopiyu wasankhanso bambo Frank John Chiwaula omwe adzodzedwa unsembe pa 13 August chaka chino, kukhala mlembi wa zofalitsa mauthenga mu dayosiziyo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: PMS Slovakia Yakhutira Ndi Ntchito Za PMS ku Malawi
news: Bungwe lowona ntchito za mabungwe a Utumiki wa a Papa la Pontifical Mission Societies (PMS) mdziko la Slovakia layamikira momwe bungwe la PMS mdziko muno likugwilira ntchito zake zotukula miyoyo ya akhristu mu njira zosiyanasiyana. Mkulu wa bungwe la PMS mdziko la Slovakia bambo Ivan Knaze ndi omwe anena kwa atolankhani lachinayi mu nzinda wa Lilongwe pambuyo poyendera ntchito zomwe bungwe la PMS mdziko muno likugwira mu dayosizi ya Dedza. Akuluakulu a bungwe la PMS mdziko la Slovakia anafika mdziko muno loweruka pa 19 September ndipo mwazina iwo ayendera chipatala cha mpingo wa katolika cha Nzama, Dedza Parish komanso ntchito yomanga tchalitchi latsopano la parish ya Dedza ndi zina zambiri. Alendo a PMS ku Slovakia atafika mdziko muno ndi aMalawi ena Iwo ati ndi okhutira ndi momwe mpingo wa katolika muno ukugwiritsira ntchito bwino thandizo la ndalama zomwe umalandira kuchokera ku Slovakia potukula miyoyo ya ana. “Tayendera ntchito zambiri zomwe zikutukula miyoyo ya ana ndipo takhutira ndi momwe ntchitozi zikuyendera. Koma tawona kuti pakufunika tithandize ku mbali ya maphunziro chifukwa sukulu zambiri zilibe zipinda zabwino zophunzilira,” anatero bambo Ivan. Poyankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe la PMS kuno ku Malawi bambo Vincent Mwakhwawa ati mwazina alendowa awonanso kufunikira kotukula magawo ena komanso kuwunikira bwino mavuto omwe akhristu mdziko muno akukumana nawo. “Ndine okondwa kuti awona kuti ndalama zomwe amapereka zikugwiradi ntchito. Komabe iwo amva chisoni ndi mavuto amene alipo powona kuti akhristu ambiri ndi ovutika ndipo atilimbikitsa kuti tizithandizana ngati ana a banja limodzi,” anatero bambo Mwakhwawa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Apita Mu Tauni Ya Asisi Loweruka Likudzali
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco loweruka likudzali akuyembekezeka kupita mtauni ya Assisi m’dziko la Italy. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa apita mtauni’yi kukakhala nawo pa msonkhano wa achinyamata wokambirana nkhani za chuma. Msonkhanowu omwe ndi wa masiku atatu ndipo ukudziwika kuti The Economy of Francisco ubweretsa pamodzi achinyamata ochokera m’maiko 100. Awa ndi achinyamata omwe akuchita mabizinesi osiyanasiyana komanso omwe chidwi chawo chili pa nkhani za chuma. Nthumwi ku msonkhanowu mwazina zikakambirana ndondomeko zomwe maiko angamatsate poyendetsa nkhani za chuma ndi cholinga chofuna kuti chuma chizifikira anthu onse osati kagulu ka anthu ochepa. Achinyamatawa akhala akugwira ntchito kwa zaka ziwiri ndipo aka kakhala koyamba kuti akumane pa maso ndi pa maso ndi kukambirana nkhani za chuma mowunikiridwa ndi moyo wa Francisco Woyera wa ku Assisi. Poyankhulapo pa za msonkhanowu, Archbishop Domenico Sorrentino wa ku Assisi m’dziko la Italy wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti ndi anthu ochepa omwe ali a mponda matiki pamene anthu ochuluka ali mu umphawi wadzaoneni.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akufuna Mfundo Za Ku Msonkhano Wa Zipembezo Zonse Zikwaniritsidwe
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi pemphero lake kuti mfundo zomwe msonkhano wa atsogoleri a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana za dziko la pansi udamanga, zikwaniritsidwe. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lachitatu kwa anthu omwe adasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square pamene amafotokoza za ulendo wake wokacheza m’dziko la Kazakhstan. Ulendowu omwe udali wa nambala 38 kunja kwa dziko la Italy chikhalireni pa mpando wa u Papa, iye adakachita nawo msonkhano wa atsogoleri a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana za dziko lonse la pansi, the 7th Congress of Leaders of World and Traditional Religions. Papa Francisco wati adapita m’dziko la Kazakhstan ndi cholinga chofuna kukalimbikitsa nthumwi ku msonkhanowo za kufunika kwa mtendere pa dziko la pansi komanso za kufunika kozindikiritsa maiko kuipa kwa m’chitidwe wogwiritsa ntchito zida zowopysa za nyukiliya. Iye wati ndi pemphero lake kuti mfundo zomwe nthumwi ku msonkhanowo zidamanga zikwaniritsidwe ndi kuyamba kubereka zipatso. Papa Francisco wati adali wokondwa kuona anthu a msangala a dzikolo ndipo mwa njira ya padera a Katolika a dzikolo omwe wati akuchita zazikulu potukula Mpingo. Asadalankhule kwa anthu pa tsikuli monga achitira kawiri-kawiri, Papa Francisco adayamba wazungulira pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square mgalimoto ya mpanda denga yotchedwa popemobile kupereka moni kwa anthu komanso kudalitsa ana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Tidziwe za Bible
news: Kusinkhasinkha mawu a Mulungu kuchokera m’buku la Amos 3 – 6, motsogozedwa ndi mutu wa chaka chino cha Baibulo woti Kumvetsera ndikusinkhasinkhasinkha mawu limodzi Podcast: Play in new window | Download
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Aepiskopi Akhale Bwenzi La Osauka
news: Lolemba, Papa Francisco adalandira gulu la episkopi okwana 200 kunyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace. Awa ndi a episkopi omwe angosankhidwa kumene pa udindowu m’chaka chapitachi ndipo ndi ochokera mbali zonse za dziko la pansi. Chochititsa chidwi pa nkumanowu ndi chakuti a episkopi’wa limodzi ndi Papa Francisco adakhala mozungulira kotero kuti amawonana bwino lomwe komanso padali kukambirana za kukhosi mwa ubale. M’mawu ake pa mkumanowu Papa Francisco wapempha a episkopi’wa kuti akhale abwenzi a anthu osauka. Koma si pokhapo iye wawapempha kuti akuyenera kumalimbikitsa kukambirana ngati njira yothetsera kusamvana pakati pa anthu. A episkopi atsopanowa ali ku Rome kuchita maphunziro a ntchito yao ndipo maphunzirowa akonzedwa ndi dipatimenti yoona za a episkopi ndi mpingo wa ku M’mawa, Dicastery for Bishops and for Eastern Churches ndipo maphunzirowa akuchitikira ku malo otchedwa Regina Apostolorum Atheneum.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Brother Makolija a Chipani cha OHF Amwalira
news: A ku likulu la chipani cha Oblates of the Holy Family (OHF) alengeza za imfa ya Brother Vincent Makolija a chipanichi omwe amwalira lolemba pa 19 September ku chipatala cha Chiradzulu District. Mkulu wa chipanichi Brother Gerald Manjamkhosi afotokozera Radio Maria Malawi kuti brother Makolija amwalira kaamba ka nthenda ya shuga. Malemu Brother Makolija Iwo ati mwambo woika m’manda thupi la malemu Brother Makolija uchitika lachitatu pa 21 September likulu la chipanichi ku Nguludi. “Talandira uthenga dzulo kuti ali ku chipatala shuga wangokwera mosayembekezera ndiye amwalira chifukwa cha zimenezo. Lero titenga thupi kupita nalo ku likulu la chipani chathu ku Nguludi komwe kukakhale kuchezera maliro ndipo mawa ndi pomwe atayikidwe m’manda ayikidwa ku Mother House ya OHF komweko ku Nguludi,” anatero brother Manjamkhosi. Brother Makolija amwalira akugwira ntchito ku sukulu yosulira aphunzitsi ya Chiradzulu Teachers Training College.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Khumi Afa pa Ngozi yapa Nsewu M’boma la Kasungu
news: Potsatira ngozi yomwe yachitika lolemba madzulo m’boma la Kasungu, zatsimikizika kuti anthu okwana khumi ataya miyoyo yawo ndipo ena makumi awiri ndi anayi avulala galimoto yomwe anakwera itachita ngozi m’boma la Kasungu. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Kasungu, Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati ngoziyi yachitika m’mudzi mwa Mkula pafupi ndi Nkhamenya mu nsewu waukulu wa Kasungu -Mzimba (M1). Bus yomwe yachita ngoziyo Malinga ndi a Kachikho, ngoziyi yakhudza bus ya mtundu wa Marcopolo ya kampani ya Matours nambala yake MN 6364 yomwe imayendetsedwa ndi a Macdonald Kumonda, ndiponso galimoto ya mtundu wa ERF truck, nambala yake KK4105/ KA2584. “Woyendetsa bus-yi amachokera mtunda wa Kasungu kupita cha ku Mzimba atanyamula anthu okwana 66. Pofika malo a ngoziwa oyendetsayu analephera kuiwongolera bwino chifukwa choti amathamanga kwambiri zomwe zinachititsa kuti iwombe galimoto ya mtundu wa truck yomwe inangodziyimira pamalopo. Ndipo izi zitachitika anthu okwana khumi (10) a chipatala cha Nkhamenya anatsimikiza kuti amwalira ndipo ena makumi awiri ndi anayi (24) avulala, pomwe oyendetsayu ndi anthu ena makumi Awiri (20) avulala koma mochepa,” anatero Sub Inspector Kachikho. Pakadali pano matupi a omwalirawa asungidwa ku nhyumba ya chisoni ya chipatala cha boma la Kasungu ndipo apolisi apempha anthu omwe abale awo anali pa ulendo ndipo akusowa kuti apite akazindikire matupi awo pa chipatalachi. Mwazina apolisiwa alangizanso anthu kuti adzitsatira malangizo a pansewu  pofuna kupewa ngozi za mtunduwu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Bata Pakati Pa Maiko A Azerbaijan, Armenia
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha bata ndi mtendere pakati pa maiko a Azerbaijan ndi Armenia. Papa wanena izi pambuyo potsogolera pemphero la Uthenga wa Mnjelo kwa Amayi Maria kwa anthu omwe adasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican. Iye wati wayikiza m’mapemphero anthu onse omwe akuvutika kaamba ka kumenyana komwe kukuchitika pakati pa maiko a awiriwa ndipo wapempha a Katolika kuti athandizane naye popemphelera bata ndi mtendere pakati pa maikowa. Papa Francisco wapempha maikowa kuti asiye kumenyana ndipo m’malo mwake athetse kusamvana kwawo kudzera mu kukambirana. Papa Francisco watsimikizira anthu a m’maiko awiriwa kuti ali nao pafupi kudzera m’mapemphero. Kupatula kupempherera maiko a Azerbaijan ndi Armenia iye wapemphanso anthu kuti asatope kupempherera bata ndi mtendere pakati pa maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine. Iye wamaliza ndi kutsindika kuti kusamvana kulikonse kungathe ngati anthu angasankhe kuchita zokambirana m’malo mochita nkhondo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akhristu Achilimike Pochita Zabwino – Papa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kochilimika pochita zinthu zabwino nthawi zonse. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati akhristu akuyenera kuchilimika pochita zinthu zabwino nthawi zonse popeza angakhale Mawu a Mulungu amene amatsindika za kufunika kochitira ena zabwino makamaka anthu osowa. Papa Francisco wati mphatso zosiyanasiyana zomwe Mulungu adapereka kwa anthu ake pa dziko la pansi zikuyenera kufikira ndi kuthandiza anthu onse popanda ka gulu kena ka anthu ochepa kuphangira zinthu zomwe zidayenera kuwafikira anthu ambiri. Pamenepa iye wati ndi kofunika kukhala anthu otha kupeza njira zothandiza anthu mwa msanga kuvuuka m’mavuto osiyanasiyana. Iye watsiriza ndi kudzudzula m’chitidwe woipa wa katangale omwe wati umawonjezera mavuto a anthu ovutika ndi kale.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ‘Dziko la Malawi Silikuchita Bwino pa Ufulu wa Democracy’
news: M’modzi mwa anthu omwe amayankhula pa nkhani zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno a Patrick Kombe ati kuchokera nthawi yomwe Malawi idayamba ufulu wa ulamuliro wa democracy, zinthu zambiri zinalowa pansi. Izi zikudza pamene dziko lapansi lidasankha pa 15 September chaka chilichonse   kuti lidzikhala loganizira za ufulu wa Democracy. Kombe: Zambiri sitinachite bwino M’mawu awo a Kombe ati kupatula zina zimene ngati dziko lachita bwino komanso magawo ngati ulimi, maphunziro, ndi za umoyo, boma likuyenera kuyikapo chidwi kwambiri kuti zipite pasogolo. Mwachitsanzo iwo ati akayerekeza nkhani za ulimi m’mene zimayendera m’mbuyomu, dziko limatha kukhala ndi chakudya chokwanira chakachonse zomwe akuti padakali pano ndo zovutirapo. “Ngati dziko pali magawo ambiri omwe silidachite bwino kuyerekeza ndi m’mene zidalili nthawi ya ulamuliro wa chipani chimodzi. Monga Malawi chuma chake chili mu nthaka koma ngati mzika zake zikulephera kukhala ndi chakudya chokwanira chaka chonse ndi chizindikiro choti ulimi wapita pansi kwambiri. Chachiwiri tiyeni tiwone maphunziro, mwana wa Standard 8 yakale ndi wapano simungafananize ayi. Pano angakhale waku college kuti ayankhule chingerezi zikuchita kumuvuta kuphunzira osapezanso ntchito pamene kale zidali pompopompo. Za umoyo, chitukuko zonse tasaliranso kwambiri chifukwa zambiri tikugwiritsanso ntchito zinthu zomwe zidaliko nthawi ya ulamuliro wa chipani chimodzi. Zonsezi gwero lake ndi katangale. Tiyeni tiyesense kuthana ndi katangale tikatelo tiwona kuti mwina tikhonza kuchita bwino,” anatero a Kombe. Mwazina iwo ayamikiranso mabwalo oweruza milandu kaamba ka kagwiridwe kawo ka ntchito kapamwamba potsata chilungamo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Parishi ya Holy Family Bowe Ikwanitsa zaka 25
news: Kunali chikondwelero choti parishi ya Holy Family Bowe mu dayosizi ya Mzuzu yakwanitsa zaka 25 kuchokera pomwe inakhazikitsidwa ndiponso kuti asisiteri awiri a chipani cha Sisters of Holy Rosary akwanitsa zaka 50 ndinso 25 akutumikira Mulungu ngati asisiteri. Asisiteriwa ndi Sister Jasinta Mkandawire omwe akwanitsa zaka makumi Asanu (50) ndi Sister Clementina Phiri omwe akwanitsa zaka 25 akutumikira Mulungu ngati sisiteri mu chipani cha Sisters of Holy Rosary. Mwambowu wachitika lamulungu pa 18 September 2022 ndipo amene anatsogolera mwambo wa nsembe ya Misa ndi Monsignor Andrew Chunda a mu dayosiziyi. Akhristu pa chikondwelero ku Bowe Parishi mu dayosizi ya Mzuzu M’mawu awo Monsignor Chunda anati ndi okondwa ndi momwe akhristu a m’parishyi agwilira ntchito yawo potumikira Mulungu. Iwo apempha akhristuwa kuti apitirize umodzi wawo omwe akhala akuwonetsa zaka 25 zapitazi. Kumbali ya asisiteri omwe achita chaka chawo, Monsignor Chunda apempha atumikiwa kuti apitirize kutumikira Mulungu mwa toto moyo. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa asisiteriwa Sister Clementina Phiri anathokoza Mulungu kaamba ka mphatso ya moyo ndiponso zaulere zochuluka zomwe iwo ndi anzawo akukumana nazo mu utumiki wawo. Potsiriza asisiteriwa apempha akhristu m’parishiyi kuti adziwapemphelera ndi cholinga choti Utumiki wawo uyende bwino. Wapampando wa akhristu eni ake mu parishiyi a Mose Nyirenda anathokoza Mulungu kuti mwambowu wachitika patadutsa zaka ziwiri potsatira mliri wa Covid-19. “M’malo mwa akhristu onse a mu parishi ino, chisangalalo chathu ndi chodzadza tsaya kuti chaka chino mwambowu watheka,” anatero a Nyirenda. Mwazina pa mwambowu akhristu okwana 120 alandira sacramenti la Ulimbitso. Parishi ya Holy Family Bowe ikupezeka m’mudzi mwa Mende m’dera la mfumu yaikulu M’nyanja m’boma la Kasungu. Parishiyi inakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha 1995 ndipo kufika pano ili ndi matchalitchi ang’onoang’ono okwana 29 ndi miphakati 255. Parishiyi ili ndi chiwerengero cha akhristu choposa 30 sauzande ndipo agulupa alipo asanu ndi awiri (7). Ansembe a chipani cha Missionary Society of St Paul ndi omwe akuyendetsa parishiyi ndipo bambo Charles Igibone ndi omwe ali bambo mfumu a parishiyi. Mwambowu unasonkhanitsa anthu osiyanasiyana monga andale, mafumu, akhristu eni ake ozungulira parishiyi ochokera m’madera a mafumu aakulu M’nyanja, Mphomwa, Simlemba ndiponso Sub T/A Chinsinga kuphatikizirapo ochokera m’maparishi a ma dayosizi ena.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kusowa Kwa Mafuta Kwasokoneza Ntchito Yomanga Ngalande Ya Ulimi Wa Mthilira Ku Chikwawa
news: Pamene vuto la kusowa kwa mafuta a dizilo omwe ndi ofunika kuyendetsera galimoto ndi makina ena, bungwe la Shire Valley Transformation Programme lati pakufunika kuti makampani maka a zomangamanga athandizidwe mwachangu kuti ntchito zawo zisamayime kapena kuchedwa. Izi zayankhulidwa pamene nduna ziwiri za maunduna okopa alendo ndi nyama za ku tchire Dr. Michael Usi ndi wachiwiri kwa nduna ya za ntchito ndi mayendedwe a Nancy Chaola Mdooko anakayendera ntchitoyi ndi kuwona mmene maunduna awo angathandizire kuti ntchitoyi iyende bwino.  Malingana ndi a Usi, unduna wokopa alendo uli ndi chikhulupiliro choti ngalande ya ulimi wa mthilirayi ikhala mbali imodzi yokopa alendo kaamba koti ndi yaikulu komanso yamangidwa mdera lomwe ndi mbali za nkhalango zikulu zikulu zosungira nyama zofunika ngati za Majete ndinso Lengwe National Park zomwe zithandize kubweretsa ndalama za kunja mdziko muno. “Anthu omwe amawononga chilengedwe cha nkhalangozi komanso kupha nyama amachita izi kaamba ka umphawi ndi kusowa ndalama, ndiye ntchito ya ngalande ya madziyi ikatha anthu omwe amalowa mu nkhalango ndi kuwononga nyama asiya kaamba koti akhala ndi zochita ku ulimiwu,” anatero a Usi. Nawo mayi Chaola Mdoko anati unduna wawo ukhala ukuwona magawo omwe ungagwire ntchito ndi bungwe la Shire Valley Transformation Programme ngati kumanga milatho yabwino ndinso misewu m’malo omwe ntchito za ulimiwu zikuchitika. Ntchito yokumba ngalandeyi ikazatha, izakhala yaikulu m’chigawo chonse cha mayiko akumwera kwa Africa kaamba koti izatenga ma hekitala pafupifupi 43,000 ndipo izathandiza alimi a m’maboma a Chikwawa ndi Nsanje kulima mbewu zisiyanasiyana pa ulimi wa malonda ndi chakudya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Njovu Yolusa Yapha Munthu M’boma La Kasungu
news: Njovu yolusa yomwe inathawa mu nkhalango ya Kasungu National Park, yapha bambo wina m’mudzi mwa Kalanga m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Nthunduwala m’boma la Kasungu. Malinga ndi yemwe waona izi zikuchitika, Jefule Chimpeni wati malemuwa ndi a John Kondiko omwe akuti atawona njobvuzi zinawapatsa chidwi ndipo anayamba kumazilondola koma mwatsoka anakumana ndi imodzi mwa njovuzi yomwe inawavulaza powapondaponda ndipo afera pomwepo. Poyankhulapo ndi wailesi ino a Brighton Kumchedwa omwe ndi mkulu wa nthambi yowona za nyama zakutchire ati iwo ndi okhudzidwa ndi imfayi. A Kumchedwa ati kuti atumiza kale alenje a boma kuti akachotse njovuzo ku deralo. “Padakalipano tatumiza kale alenje athu kuti akazisake njovuzo kuti zibwelere mu nkhalango,” anatero a Kumchedwa Izi zikudza pangodutsa miyezi iwiri nthambi yowona za nyama zakutchire itasamutsa njobvu zokwana 263 kuchoka ku nkhalango ya Liwonde National Park kupita nazo ku Kasungu National Park.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Azimangilira Atasemphana Maganizo ndi Mkazi Wake M’boma la Kasungu
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 48, Christopher Baloni wadzipha podzikhweza ndi chingwe m’boma la Kasungu. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub Inspector Joseph Kachikho watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati izi zachitika pa15 September chaka chino m’mudzi mwa Kajimtchi. Malinga ndi apolisi malemuyu anasemphana maganizo ndi mkazi wake pa nkhani za m’banja pomwe amadzudzula mkaziyu kuti amachita chibwenzi ndi mwamuna wina. Izi sizinasangalatse mkaziyu ndipo zinabweretsa mkangano pakati pawo zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkaziyu awuze mwamuna wakeyu kuti apite kwawo. Potsatira kusamvanaku bamboyu anaganiza zongochotsa moyo wake podzikhweza ndi chingwe mu mtengo. Achipatala atapima thupilo zotsatira zake zawonetsa kuti malemuyu wafa chifukwa chobanika. Padakalkipano apolisi ati ndi okhudzidwa ndi kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha imfa za anthu podzipha m’bomalo. Malemu Christopher Baloni anali a m’mudzi mwa Jeremani m’dera la mfumju yaikulu Kalolo m’boma la Lilongwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadzudzula A Ndale Posalabadira Miyoyo Ya Anthu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati kukhala munthu wa ndale woganizira anthu, si chinthu cha pafupi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco wayankhula izi dzulo pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu ndege pochokera m’dziko la Kazakhstan kupita m’dziko la Italy. Iye wati ndi a ndale ochepa omwe amaika ubwino wa anthu awo patsogolo asadayambe kudziganizira iwo eni. Papa Francisco wati ndi kosakwanira kungokhala ndi anthu a ndale koma chachikulu msinkhu ndiye kukhala ndi a ndale omwe ali ndi ukadaulo pochita ndalezo. Iye waonjezeranso kuti kuchita ndale zooneka ku maso kwa anthu ndi chiitanidwe cha paderadera kapena kuti vocation mu chingerezi. Papa Francisco wati anthu ali ndi udindo wothandiza anthu a ndale kuchita ndale zolozeka ndipo wati ndale zenizeni zikuyenera kuthandiza anthu kuvuuka mu umphawi ndi mavuto osiyanasiyana. Pa za ulendo wokacheza m’maiko a Democratic Republic of Congo ndi South Sudan omwe udalephereka mmbuyomu, iye wati pali chiyembekezo kuti ulendowu ukhalapo mwezi wa February chaka cha mawa. Pa msonkhano wa atolankhaniwu, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti ansembe azimveka fungo la nkhosa zao zomwe wati zingathandize kuti anthu adziwukonda Mpingo komanso kuti ntchito za Mpingo zipite patsogolo. Pa ulendo wokacheza m’dziko la Kazakhstan Papa Francisco adayenda ndi atolankhani makumi asanu ndi atatu (80) ochokera nyumba zosiyanasiyana zofalitsira nkhani.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Kalembera Wa Makomo Ayamba Posachedwapa M’maboma Ena Mdziko Muno
news: Anthu a m’maboma a Phalombe, Neno, Mwanza ndi Machinga awapempha kuti alembetse kalembera wa makomo yemwe ayambe sabata ya mawa. Mkulu wa nthambi ya yowona za kalembera, ya Unified Beneficiary Registry (UBR) a Kondwani Njumira ndi amene anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pomwe imafuna kumva zambiri za m’mene ntchito yolemba makomo mdziko muno ikuyendera. Kalembera wa makomo “Ndondomekoyi ikuyenda bwino. Talembera kale maboma 21 a mdziko muno ndipo padakali pano tikukonzekera kuyamba kalemberayu m’maboma anayi a Phalombe, Neno, Mwanza ndi Machinga,” anatero a Njumira Iwo anati kalemberayu ndi ofunika kwambiri chifukwa ndi amene akuthandiza boma pa nkhani ya zitukuko zosiyanasiyana choncho apempha anthuwa kuti apereke uthenga oyenera omwe boma lidzagwiritse ntchito. “Kalembera ameneyu cholinga chake ndi kuthandiza boma kukhala ndi kaundula amene adzigwiritsidwa ntchito popanga zitukuko zosiyanasiyana, choncho ndikupempha anthu kuti alembetse makomo awo chifukwa kutsogolo kuno boma lidzitenga mu kaundula ameneyu pogwira ntchito zake,” anatsindika motero a Njumira. Bungwe la Unified Beneficiary Registry, likugwiritsidwanso ntchito mu polojekiti ya M’bwezera Chilengedwe (Climate Smart Enhanced Public Works Programme yomwe ikulandira thandizo kuchokera ku bank yaikulu padziko lonse ya World Bank.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Imfa ya Queen Elizabeth Wachiwiri
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya Queen Elizabeth Wachiwiri wa ku Britain. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake wopepesa potsatira imfayi. Papa Francisko pa mkumano wake ndi Queen Elizabeth Wachiwiri Iye wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu ndipo wapepesa King Charles Wachitatu, anthu a m’dziko la Britain komanso anthu onse a m’maiko omwe akupanga bungwe la Commonwealth. Iye wati ali limodzi ndi anthu onse omwe akulira pa nthawi yovutayi. Papa Francisco wayamikira malemu Queen Elizabeth Wachiwiri ponena kuti adayetsetsa kutumikira bwino anthu a m’dziko lake komanso anthu a m’maiko omwe akupanga bungwe la Commonwealth. Koma si pokhapo iye waonjezeranso kuti Queen Elizabeth Wachiwiri adali munthu wa chikhulupiliro chosagwedezeka mwa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati ndi pemphero lake kuti Mulungu alandire mzimu wake mu ufumu wake. Iye watsiriza ndi kufunira King Charles Wachitatu mafuno abwino pa ntchito yake yotumikira anthu komanso wapereka madalitso ake. Queen Elizabeth Wachiwiri yemwe adabadwa pa 21 April m’chaka cha 1926 wamwalira lachinayi pa 8 September ali ndi zaka 96. M’moyo wake Queen Elizabeth Wachiwiri adakumana komanso kuchita zokambirana ndi a Papa asanu; Papa Pio wa 12 m’chaka cha 1951, Papa Yohane wa nambala 23 m’chaka cha 1961, Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera m’chaka cha 1980, 1982 komanso m’chaka cha 2000, Papa Benedicto wa 16 m’chaka cha 2010 ndipo potsiriza Papa Francisco m’chaka cha 2014.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mabanja 435,000 Apindula Ndi Ndondomeko Ya M’bwezera Chilengedwe
news: Mabanja okwana 435,000 ochokera m’maboma onse 28 a mdziko muno akuti apindula ndi ndondomeko yomwe boma likhazikitse mwezi wa October chaka chino ndi cholinga chofuna kutukula miyoyo ya anthu a mdziko muno. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu owona ntchito za chitukuko kuchokera ku bungwe la boma la National Local Government Finance Committee mayi Ina Thombozi ndi amene anena izi pa maphunziro a atolankhani ochokera m’chigawo cha kummwera amene anakonzedwa ndi boma pansi pa ndondomeko ya mbwezera chilengedwe ya Climate Smart Enhanced Public Works Programme (CS-EPWP), mu mzinda wa Blantyre. M’modzi mwa akuluakulu ku boma kufotokozera za ndondomekoyi Mayi Thombozi ati ndondomekoyi, ikulowa m’malo mwa ndondomeko ya MASAF IV imene imathandizidwa ndi banki yaikulu padziko lonse, ya World Bank, imene ati inayimitsidwa zaka za m’mbuyomu chifukwa choti sinachite bwino. Iwo ati padakali pano akonza ndondomeko zosiyanasiyana zomwe zithandize kuti ntchitoyi iyende bwino. Iwo ati mwazina ndondomekoyi iyang’anitsitsa nkhani zokhudza madera ang’onoang’ono omwe kumachokera mitsinje, kusamalira nthaka, kubwenzeretsa chilengedwe, kusamalira mphukira, komanso kulimbikitsa kutukula umoyo wa anthu ovutika. “Pofuna kuwonetsetsa kuti ntchitoyi ikuyenda bwino, boma lakhazikitsa njira zosiyanasiyana zomwe litsatire monga kupereka mwayi kwa anthu ogwira ntchito kugula okha zipangizo zogwilira ntchito, mothandizidwa ndi upangiri kuchokera kumakhonsolo, komanso kuchita kalondololondo wa ntchitoyi ndi cholinga choti anthu adziyikapo chidwi pogwira ntchitoyi,” anatero mayi Thombozi. Iwo ati pali chiyembekezo choti anthu amene asankhidwe kugwira ntchitoyi achokera m’mabanja ovutikitsitsa amene ali mu nkhokwe imene boma linakhazikitsa, amenenso ali ndi kuthekera kogwira ntchitoyi ndipo adzilandira malipiro awo pakutha pa masiku 24 m’miyezi iwiri iliyonse. Anthuwa adzilandira ndalama yokwana K900 patsiku ngati akwaniritsa kugwira ntchito imene anapatsidwa pasanathe sabata ziwiri mwezi wachiwiri ukangotha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Anjatidwa Kaamba Kogwilira M’dzukulu Wake M’boma la Dedza
news: Bambo wa zaka 52, Bruno Rodwell ali m’manja mwa apolisi kaamba komuganizira kuti wagwilira m’dzukulu wake wa zaka 12 m’boma la Dedza. Wachiwiri wa mneneri wa apolisi m’bomalo, Sergeant Cassim Manda wati bamboyu yemwe ndi oyendetsa galimoto ya boma mu unduna wa zamalimidwe, wapalamula mlanduwu  pa 20 August 2022 pomwe anakokera mwanayo ku chipinda chake ndi kumugwilirira. Atachita zoyipazi mkuluyu anaopseza mwanayu kuti asawuze munthu aliyense za nkhaniyi ponena kuti akatero amupha. Koma mwanayo sanabise za nkhaniyi koma kuwulura, zomwe zachititsa kuti apolisi amange mkuluyu. Bruno Rodwell akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku khothi komwe akayankhe mlandu ogwilira mwana wang’ono zomwe ndi zosemphana ndi gawo 138 ya buku loweruzira milandu m’dziko muno. Iye amachokera m’mudzi mwa sankhani m’dera la Mfumu yaikulu Chilooka Mboma la Ntchisi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Sukulu ya Holy Mother Montessori Ithandiza Chipatala cha Chirimba
news: Ophunzira achichepere a sukulu ya m’mera mpoyamba ku Chirimba mu mzinda wa Blantyre, athandiza ndi katundu osiyanasiyana ogwiritsa ntchito odwala ndinso ogwira nchito pa chipatala chaching’ono cha boma chomwe chili mderalo. Poyankhula atapereka thandizoli lomwe ndi ziwiya zotungira madzi, mankhwala a chlorine, masache ndinso zokolopera. A Twaibu kulandira zina mwa zipangizo kuchokera kwa anawo Mphunzitsi wamkulu pa sukuluyi mayi Vanessa Mponda anati anachita izi pofuna kukwaniritsa zolinga zawo zomwe ndi kusula anawa chidwi chokhala ndi mtima opatsa komanso kulimbikitsa ukhondo. Mayi Mponda anati ndi kofunika kusula anawa kuti azikula ndi chidwi chothandiza ndi zochepa zomwe alinazo. “Pali mawu omwe amati kuwongola mtengo n’kulinga uli waung’ono nde choncho anawa akakhala ndi mtima opereka ndinso kuthandiza azakula ndi moyo osamalira anzawo,” anatero mayi Mponda. Ndipo poyankhula m’malo mwa oyang’anira chipatalachi, a Twaibu Makunganya anathokoza sukuluyi ndinso kupempha anthu ndi magulu akufuna kwabwino kuti atengerepo chitsanzo kwa anawa. Motero iwo anati ngakhale zipatala za boma zimalandira thandizo kuchokera ku boma, ndi kofunikabe anthu a mdera kutenga nawo mbali yothandiza maka zinthu zing’ono zing’ono zomwe zimafunika pa moyo wa tsiku ndi tsiku. Sukulu ya Holly Mother Montessori ndi yoyima payokha yomwe ana amalipira pa maphunziro awo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapemphelera Mtendere M’maiko Onse Pa Dziko Lapansi
news: Ku mapeto a Misa yomukhazikitsa Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba kukhala wodala yomwe yachitika dzulo lamulungu pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square, Papa Francisco sadayiwale kupemphelera mtendere pa dziko lonse la pansi. Kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria, iye wapempherera mtendere ku Democratic Republic of Congo, Ethiopia, Mali, Nigeria, Mozambique, Somalia, South Sudan ndi Sudan ndi maiko ena onse. Pa mwambowu Papa Francisco sadayiwale kuthokoza anthu 25,000 omwe adafika ku mwambowu kuchokera mbali zosiyanasiyana za dziko lapansi kudzachitira umboni mwambo wochititsa chidwiwu. Mwa njira ya padera, iye wathokoza mtsogoleri wa dziko la Italy, Sergio Mattarella, nduna yaikulu ya dziko la Monaco, Pierre Dartout chifukwa chokhala nawo pa mwambo waukuluwu. Pa 13 October chaka chatha, Papa Francisco adawuza bungwe lomwe limawona za anthu oyera mu Mpingo motsogozedwa ndi Cardinal Marcello Semeraro yemwe ndi mkulu kapena kuti prefect wa bungwe la Congregation for the Causes of Saints, kuti lilengeze ku dziko lonse zakuti Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba ndi wodala. Apatu Papa’yu adali atavomereza mulakuli omwe udayenereza Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba kukhala wodala. Malipoti akulongosola za msungwana wina wa zaka 11 yemwe adadwala mwa kayakaya koma zidatsimikizika kuti kudzera mu uneneri wa Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba, msungwanayu adachira mosayembekezereka ndi modabwitsa.
