Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba adamwalira mwadzidzidzi pa 28 September m’chaka cha 1978 atangokhala Papa kwa masiku 33. Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba amadziwika kwambiri chifukwa cha msangala yake ndi chifukwa chake anthu amamutchula kuti “the smiling pope.”
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wayamikira Bungwe La Caritas La M’dziko La Spain
news: Poyankhula kwa mamembala a bungwe la Caritas la m’dziko la Spain kunyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace, Papa Francisco wayamikira bungweli kaamba ka ntchito yaikulu yomwe bungweli lakhala likugwira m’dziko la Spain kwa zaka 75. Iye walimbikitsa mamembala a bungweli kuti apitirize kupititsa patsogolo ntchito za bungweli maka powonetsera ena chikondi ponena kuti akhristu akuyenera kumadziwika pokhala a chikondi kwa ena monga ana a banja limodzi la Mulungu. Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kothandiza anthu osowa kuti nao athe kudziyimira pawokha. Iye wati kutumikira ena ndi kuwathandiza kuti athe kuima paokha ndiyo ntchito yotamandika. Papa Francisco wati pogwira ntchito za chifundo zosiyanasiyana akhristu anapitiriza ntchito za chifundo zomwe Yesu Khristu adali kugwira ali pansi pano. Iye wati kutumikira ena ndi kugwira ntchito za chifundo ndi chiyitanidwe chapadera. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kunena kuti akhristu akuyitanidwa kukhala a Samaria a chifundo. Bungwe la mpingo wa katolika la Caritas la m’dziko la Spain lidayamba kugwira ntchito zake m’chaka cha 1947 ndipo chaka chino bungweli likukondwelera kuti lakwanitsa zaka 75.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ophunzira Awiri a Fomu 4 Anjatidwa Kaamba Kobera Mayeso
news: Ophunzira awiri a fomu 4 pa sukulu ya Mzimba Open Distance Learning, ali m’manja mwa apolisi kaamba kowaganizira kuti apezeka ndi mayeso a boma a chaka chino a fomu 4. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Mzimba, Sub Inspector Peter Botha watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati ophunzirawa ndi Dominic Ngala komanso Vincent Sakala onse a zaka 19 zakubadwa. Iwo ati apolisiwa anatsinidwa khutu ndi m’modzi mwa ogwira ntchito ku bungwe lolembetsa mayeso mdziko muno la Malawi National Examinations Board (MANEB) amene anafika m’bomalo kudzayendera momwe mayesowa akuyendera. Apolisiwa atatsatira nkhaniyi ndi pomwe dzulo (lachinayi) amanga awiriwa pa nthawi yomwe amalemba mayeso a practical a phunziro la Chemistry. Awiriwa akuti anapanga magulu awiri pa tsamba la mchezo la WhatsApp pomwe amagawana mayesowa ndipo malinga ndi a Botha, maphunziro ena omwe alembedwa kale monga Agriculture ndi Biology anagawidwanso pa gululo. Anthuwa akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku bwalo la milandu ndi kukayankha mlandu wopezeka ndi mayeso a boma popanda chilorezo omwe ndi otsutsana ndi gawo 14 ya malamulo oyendetsera mayeso mdziko muno. Dominic Ngala amachokera m’mudzi mwa Mankhambira mdera la mfumu yaikulu Chikulamayembe m’boma la Rumphi ndipo Vincent Sakala ndi ochokera m’mudzi mwa Zikhole mdera la mfumu yaikulu M’mbelwa m’boma la Mzimba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Mchitidwe Wopha Anthu Opalamula Milandu Ikuluikulu Ukuyenera Kutha
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati m’chitidwe wopha anthu omwe apha anzawo kapena kupalamula milandu ikuluikulu, ukuyenera kuthetsedwa. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi mu uthenga wake posinkhasinkha cholinga cha mapemphero ake mwezi uno wa September. Mwezi uno wa September Papa Francisco akupemphera kuti m’chitidwe wopha anthu omwe apha anzawo kapena kupalamula milandu ikuluikulu ukuyenera kuthetsedwa. “Tiyeni tipemphere kuti m’chitidwe wopha ena ngati chilango chifukwa choti apha anzawo kapena chifukwa chopalamula milandu ikuluikulu uthe chifukwa kupereka chilango chotero ndi kupepusa ulemelero wa moyo wa munthu,” watero Papa Francisco. Pamenepa iye wapempha anthu akufuna kwabwino kuti athandize kuthetsa m’chitidwewu. Papa Francisco wati ali ndi chikhulupiliro kuti m’chitidwewu utha kaamba koti tsiku ndi tsiku anthu ambiri m’maiko osiyanasiyana akubwera ndi kunena poyera kuti m’chitidwewu ndi woipa ndipo oyenera kuthetsedwa imene wati ndi nkhani yodzetsa chimwemwe ku mpingo. Iye wafotokoza kuti kupha anthu ngati chilango chifukwa choti apha anzawo kapena chifukwa choti apalamula milandu ikuluikulu ndi m’chitidwe wosathandiza chifukwa choti lamuloli silipereka mwayi kuti anthu omwe apalamula milanduyi athe kulapa ndi kukhala osinthika. Pa 28 April m’chaka cha 2021 bwalo lalikulu loweruza milandu ku Malawi lidagamula kuti chilangochi chithe koma patapita ka nthawi kochepa lamuloli adalibwenzeretsanso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wadandaula ndi Kupitilira Kwa Kuwonongeka Kwa Chilengedwe
news: Mu uthenga wake wa chaka chino wa tsiku loganizira kufunika kosamala chilengedwe komanso kuyamika Mulungu kaamba ka mphatsoyi, World Day of Prayer for the Care of Creation, Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri kuti m’chitidwe owononga chilengedwe ukupitirabe. Iye wati poyang’ana chilengedwe, pali zinthu ziwiri zomwe munthu sangaziphonye. Poyamba kuyamika Mulungu kaamba ka mphatso ya chilengedwe komanso pa nthawi yomweyo kumva chisoni kaamba ka m’mene anthu akuwonongera chilengedwe. Papa Francisko kusonyeza chitsanzo chabwino pothilira mtengo Mu uthengawu, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kowona chilengedwe ndi maso a uzimu. Iye wati kuwonongeka kwa chilengedwe kwachititsa kuti nyama za ku tchire zisowe malo okhala komanso wati mvula ikumabwera yochepa kapena yowononga. Koma si pokhapo iye wati kuwonongeka kwa chilengedwe kwabweretsa nyengo yotentha yomwe anthu mmbuyomu sadayiwonepo. Papa Francisco wati nthawi yakwana yoti maiko achitepo kanthu zinthu zisadafike poyipa. Iye adakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira chilengedwe ndi loyamika Mulungu kaamba ka mphatsoyi m’chaka cha 2015 ndipo m’chaka chomwechi pomwe adalemba kalata yotchedwa Laudato Si yofotokoza za kufunika kosamala chilengedwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Gogo Wa Zaka 100 Wanjatidwa Atapezeka Ndi Chamba
news: Apolisi m’boma la Mzimba amanga bambo wina wa zaka 100 zakubadwa kaamba komuganizira kuti wapezeka ndi chamba opanda chilorezo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo, Sub Inspector Peter Botha wati mkuluyu Stanely Gondwe wamangidwa lachitatu, kunyumba kwake. Iye wati apolisi anatsinidwa khutu ndi anthu ena ndipo atapita ku nyumba kwa mkuluyo ndi pomwe anakapeza ndowa ziwiri zodzadza ndi chamba. Bamboyu anamangidwa pa malo pomwepo ndipo amutsekulira mulandu wopezeka ndi chamba popanda zikalata zomuyenereza. Stanely Gondwe amachokera m’mudzi mwa Jam Kalua mdera la mfumu yaikulu M’mbelwa m’boma lomwelo la Mzimba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe Ili ndi Parishi Yatsopano M’boma la Kasungu
news: Kunali chisangalalo loweruka pa 27 August, 2022 m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Njombwa m’boma la Kasungu pomwe akhristu kuphatikizapo anthu osiyanasiyana ochokera m’madera osiyanasiyana anasonkhana pamodzi kuchitira umboni kukhazikitsidwa kwa parishi ya tsopano ya mpingo wa katolika ya St. Francis de Sales Manyani mu arkidayosizi ya lilongwe. Amene anatsogolera mwambowu ndi arkiepiskopi wa arkidayosiziyo Ambuye George Desmond Tambala. Bambo mfumu a parishiyo bambo Sebastian (kumanzere) ndi Ambuye Tambala Poyankhulapo pa mwambowu, Ambuye Tambala omwenso ndi wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mdziko muno, apempha akhristu a m’parishyo kuti akhale pa ubale wabwino ndi Ansembe awo. Iwo anati mpingo wa katolika umadziwika ndi masakramenti ake ndipo izi kuti zifikire akhristu pakuyenera kukhala kuti pali ubale wabwino pakati pa wansembe ndi akhristu ake. “Ubale wa pakati pa wansembe ndi akhristu si pongoyendetsa parishi ayi koma maziko ake ndi pa Misa pa kulandira ma sakramenti,” anatero Ambuye Tambala. M’awu ake woyimira akhristu eni ake m’parishyo a Joseph Kapatuka anathokoza Mulungu kuti pempho lawo lomwe lakhalapo kwa nthawi yaitali tsopano lakwaniritsidwa. Nayo mfumu yaikulu m’deralo Senior Chief Njombwa inagwirizana ndi a Kapatuka ponena kuti kubwera kwa parishiyi ku derali kuthandiza kukweza chitukuko kaamba koti mpingo wa katolika umabwera ndi zitukuko zosiyanasiyana. Tchalitchi la Manyani linakhazikitsidwa m’chaka cha1930 motsogozedwa ndi malemu Village Headman Benedicto Kacheta kufikira pano pomwe tsopano yakhazikitsidwa kukhala parishi. Pakadali pano parishiyi ili ndi matchalitchi ang’ono ang’ono okwana 22. Bambo Sebastian Susairaji a chipani cha St. Francis de Sales ndi omwe asankhidwa kukhala bambo mfumu oyamba a parishiyi. Chiwerengero cha maparishi omwe akupezeka mu arkidayosizi ya Lilongwe tsopano chafika pa 44 koma pali chiyembekezo choti chisanathe chaka chino maparishi ena awiri atsopano akhazikitsidwanso.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Lundu Athetsa Gulu La Bwalo La Achewa
news: Mfumu yaikulu ya Achewa mdziko muno Paramount Chief Lundu yati yathetsa gulu lina lomwe limati limayimira Achewa lotchedwa Bwalo la Achewa, ati kaamba koti limabweretsa m’gawaniko pakati pa Achewa mdziko muno. Lundu: Ine ndi Gawaundi ndife amodzi Poyankhula pa nsonkhano wa olemba nkhani omwe anachititsa mu mzinda wa Blantyre lachitatu, mfumuyi inati yakhala ikuchita manyazi kaamba ka zomwe gululi likhala likuchita pomagwiritsa ntchito dzina lake kupempha ndalama popanda iye kudziwa zomwe ndi zonyozetsa mtundu wa Achewa komanso utsogoleri wake. Pamenepa iwo anati apempha magulu onse omwe ali pansi pa mtundu wa Achewa kuti akhale pambuyo pa bungwe la Chewa Heritage Foundation (CHEFO), lomwe ndi lalikulu mdziko muno. Mfumuyi yatinso pali magulu ena omwe akhala akufuna kubweretsa m’gawaniko pakati pa iye ndi Kalonga Gawa undi ndi cholinga chofuna kugawa Achewa. ” Ine ndi Gawa Undi ndife amodzi ndipo kuyambira lero sindikufuna kumva kuti Bwalo la Achewa kapena Nkumano wa Amang’anja ndi Asena ayi, dziko lino likufunika umodzi ndi mtendere monga pali unduna owona za umodzi ndi kuphunzitsa anthu,” anatero Paramount Chief Lundu. Pansonkhanowu mfumuyi inaperekezedwa ndi mafumu a mtundu wa Achewa ndi a Mang’anja monga Chimaliro, Thomasi, Khwethemule a boma la Thyolo, Chapananga ya m’boma la Chikwawa, Govati ya m’boma la Mwanza, Dzoole kuchokera ku Dowa ndinso Mwansambo wa boma la Nkhotakota.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Nkhondo Ndi Yoipa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati nkhondo ndi yoipa kaamba koti imabweretsa mavuto ambiri pa moyo wa anthu. Iye wayankhula izi pano pomwe tsopano nkhondo pakati pa maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine yatha miyezi isanu ndi umodzi. Pamenepa iye wati akupitiriza kupempherera anthu ankhaninkhani kuphatikizapo ana a masiye omwe akuvutika m’dziko la Ukraine angakhale m’dziko la Russia. Papa Francisco wati kuchuluka kwa ana a masiye m’maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine ndi umboni wokwanira kuti nkhondo ndi yopanda pake. Iye wati anthu amene amavutika kawiri-kawiri nthawi ya nkhondo amakhala anthu osalakwa. Papa Francisco wadzudzula onse omwe amapindula ndi nkhondo ngati imeneyi popeza zofuna zao Iye wati sakuyiwalanso m’mapemphero ake a kaidi onse a nkhondo, prisoners of war. Papa Francisco wati kupatula nkhondo pakati pa maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine, dziko la pansi likuyenera kukumbukiranso anthu ankhaninkhani omwe akuvutika m’maiko a Syria, Yemen ndi Myanmar. Iye watsiriza ndi kuyikiza maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine m’manja mwa Amayi Maria.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walengeza Chizindikiro Cha Ulendo Wake wa ku Kazakhstan
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walengeza chizindikiro komanso mawu omutsogolera pa ulendo wake wokacheza m’dziko la Kazakhstan. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa walengeza izi pano pomwe zokonzekera za ulendowu zili mkati. Chizindikiro cha ulendowo Ulendo wa Papa Francisco wokacheza m’dziko la Kazakhstan udzachitika kuyambira pa 13 mpaka pa 15 September. Ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican, Holy See Press Office, yati Papa Francisco akacheza mu mzinda wa ukulu wa dzikolo wa Nur-Sultan kuti akakhale nao pa msonkhano wa atsogoleri a zipembedzo zosiyanasiyana za dziko lonse la pansi, the VII Congress of Leaders of World and Traditional Religions. Msonkhanowu womwe umachitika kamodzi mzaka zitatu zilizonse nthumwi zikakambirana pa mutu woti: udindo wa atsogoleri a zipembedzo wokhudza moyo wa anthu pa mbuyo pa mliri wa corona virus, the Role of Leaders of World and Traditional Faiths in the Socio-Spiritual Development of Humanity after the Pandemic. Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera ndi yemwe adayamba kukakhala nao pa msonkhano wotere m’chaka cha 2001.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ana a Ulumali Akukumana ndi Mavuto Ochuluka – APDM
news: Bungwe la anthu a ulumali la Association of People with Physical Disabilities in Malawi (APDM) lapempha boma ndi magulu okhudzidwa kuti atengepo gawo pa mavuto omwe ana a ulumali akukumana nawo mdziko muno. Mkulu wa bungweli a Charles Khaula ndi omwe anena izi lachiwiri pa msonkhano wa atolankhani omwe bugweli linachititsa mu mzinda wa Blantyre. Khaula: Sakuthandizidwa mokwanira ayi Iwo ati kusowa kwa aphunzitsi omwe angathe kuphunzitsa ana a ulumali ndinso kuchepa kwa zipangizo zomwe anawa amagwiritsa ntchito, ndi zina mwa zifukwa zomwe zikuchititsa kuti ana ambiri a ulumali alephere kupitiriza maphunziro awo. “Ana a ulumali ali ndi ufulu monga wina aliyense alili koma mavuto omwe anawa akukumana nawo sakuthandizidwa mokwanira ayi. M’sukulu zambiri za boma mulibe aphunzitsi ambiri omwe angathe kuphunzitsa anawa, zipangizonso monga midadada yophunzilira, zimbudzi ndi zina zambili sizikumangwidwa mwa makono kuti ana a ulumali atha kugwiritsa ntchito,” anatero a Khaula. Pamenepa iwo ati ndi kofunika kuti magulu onse okhudzidwa agwirane manja pothandiza anawa. “Ife lathu ndi pempho ku boma komanso ena onse okhudzidwa kuti tigwirane manja ndi kuthandiza anawa kuti nawo azitha kukhala moyo osangalala, ndi kumapitiriza maphunziro awo kufikira pomwe angafune,” anatero a Khaula. Padakalipano bungweli layambapo zokambirana ndi magulu ena omwe amathandizira kuyendetsa sukulu zomwe ndi za boma monga a Parents Teachers Association ndi Area Development Committee a m’maboma a Salima ndi Chikwawa kuti nawo azitha kuwonetsetsa kuti ana a ulumali akulandira chisamaliro chokwanira msukulu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: NAC Yadandaula ndi Kuchuluka kwa Mchitidwe Wogonana Msukulu za Ukachenjede
news: Bungwe la National AIDS Commission (NAC) ladandaula kaamba ka kuchuluka kwa mchitidwe wogonana msukulu za ukachenjede zambiri za mdziko muno. Mkulu owona za kapewedwe ka HIV ku bungweli Dr. Hendrina Mwansambo ndi omwe anena izi mu mzinda wa Blantyre pa maphunziro a achinyamata a msukulu za ukachenjede ophunzitsa anzawo za matenda a Edzi. Mchitidwe wogonana akuti wakula kwambiri m’malo ngati amenewa – MUBAS Pamene Dr. Mwansambo amalangiza ophunzirawa za ubwino wochepetsa mchitidwewu omwe akuti ukukolezera kufala kwa kachilombo ka HIV mdziko muno, iwo ati bungwe la NAC liwonetsetsa kuti achinyamata akulandira thandizo loyenera la ku chipatala. “Tikufuna achinyamata azithandizana okhaokha kuti azimasuka ndipo azitha kupeza PEP ndi PrEP mosavuta kuti akhale otetezeka ku matenda amenewa a Edzi. Pamene tikunena izi sikuti tikuwalimbikitsa kuti azigonana ayi koma chifukwa tikudziwa kuti mchitidwe ogonana ndi ochuluka kwambiri msukulu zimenezi ndiye tikuwauza kuti ndondomeko zopewera Edzi sizinasinthe ayi, ofunika kudziletsa kapena kukhala okhulupirika kwa munthu m’modzi,” anatero mayi Mwansambo. Maphunzirowa anayitanitsa pamodzi ophunzira a msukulu za ukachenjede za Malawi University of Business and Applied Sciences (MUBAS), Blantyre International University (BIU), Kamuzu University of Health Sciences (KUHES), DAPP Chilangoma Teachers Training College komanso Millenium University.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akhazikitsa Ma Cardinal 21 Loweruka Likudzali
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kukhazikitsa pa udindo ma Cardinal 21 atsopano. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, mwambowu ulipo loweruka likudzali pa 27 August. Pa 29 May chaka chino Papa Francisco adalengeza maina a ma Cardinal atsopanowa. Papa Francisko ndi ma Cardinal Polengeza mainawa iye adafotokoza kuti ma Cardinal’wa adzawakhazikitsa pa udindowu pa 27 August chaka chino ndipo adapempha mapemphero owapempherera kuti athe kuyendetsa bwino mpingo. Iwo akuchokera mbali zosiyana-siyana za dziko la pansi kusonyeza kuti mpingo wa katolika ndi mpingo wa pa malo ponse. Asanu ndi atatu mwa Cardinal’wa ndi ochokera ku ulaya, asanu ndi m’modzi kuchokera ku Asia, m’modzi wochokera ku North America, anayi ochokera ku Central America ndi Latin America ndipo awiri akuchokera ku Africa ku maiko a Nigeria ndi Ghana. Kukhala Cardinal ndi udindo waukulu kwambiri ndipo zimatanthauza kuti munthuyo amasanduka nduna yothandiza Papa kuyendetsa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse. Ntchito ina yaikulu ndiye kusankha Papa watsopano ngati Papa yemwe adalipoyo wamwalira kapena kutula pansi udindo wake.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Mkangano Wa Mpingo Ndi Boma Mdziko La Nicaragua
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri ndi mavuto omwe alipo pakati pa mpingo wa Katolika ndi boma m’dziko la Nicaragua. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco wayankhula izi ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri kuti boma la dziko la Nicaragua likupitiriza kutseka pakamwa mpingo wa Katolika m’dzikolo komanso kuti mpingowo usathe kugwira ntchito zake zina momasuka. Ngakhale zinthu zili chomwechi, Papa Francisco wati akukhulupilira kuti kukambirana ndi njira yokhayo yomwe ingadzetse chimvano pakati pa mbali ziwirizi. “Mokhudzidwa kwambiri ndikutsatira mavuto a m’dziko la Nicaragua pakati pa boma ndi Mpingo wa Katolika. Ine ndikukhulupirira kuti mavuto onsewa angathe pochita zokambirana koma momasukirana,” watero Papa Francisco. Nkhani yomwe yautsa mapiri pa chigwa ndi yakuti maepiskopi ndi ansembe a mpingo wa Katolika, nyumba zofalitsa nkhani, mabungwe omwe si a boma akuganiziridwa ndi boma la dzikolo kuti akuthandiza zipani zotsutsa. Pa chifukwa ichi, boma la dziko la Nicaragua latseka wayilesi zingapo za mpingo wa Katolika komanso kumanga Bishop Rolando Álvarez wa mpingowu, ansembe asanu, msemino m’modzi komanso mtolankhani wa wailesi ya kanema ya mpingowu. Padakali pano bungwe la maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika ku Latin America, Conference of Latin American Bishops, ladzudzula boma la dziko la Nicaragua. Nalo bungwe la United Nations ladzudzula boma la dziko la Nicaragua ndipo lati likugwirizana kwathunthu ndi Bishop Álvarez amene boma la dziko la Nicaragua lamumanga. Kuwonjezera apa bungwe lomenyera ufulu wa anthu la Inter-American Commission on Human Rights ladzudzulanso boma la dzikolo ndi kupempha kuti onse omwe amangidwa amasulidwe
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapepesa Mpingo Wa Coptic Mdziko La Egypt
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watumiza uthenga wopepesa ku mpingo wa Coptic Orthodox m’dziko la Egypt. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa watumiza uthengawu potsatira ngozi ya moto pa tchalitchi lina la mpingowu m’dzikolo pomwe panafa anthu okwana 41. Tchalitchi lomwe lapsa ndi motowo Papa Francisco watumiza uthengawu kwa mkulu wa mpingo wa Coptic Orthodox kudzera mwa mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Cardinal Pietro Parolin. Mu uthengawu iye wati ali ndi chisoni chachikulu kaamba ka ngoziyi yomwe yaphetsa anthu ochuluka kuphatikizapo episkopi wa mpingo wa Coptic Orthodox ndi ana ochuluka. Iye wati ali pafupi ndi anamfedwa onse pa nthawi yovutayi ndipo wati akufunira onse ovulala kuchira kwa msanga. Akhristu a mpingo wa Coptic kukhudza maliro a episkopi wawo Iye watsiriza ndi kuyikiza m’manja mwa Mulungu mizimu ya onse omwe afa pa ngoziyi. Malipoti akuti vuto la magetsi lidapangitsa kuti moto owopsa ubuke pa tchalitchi la mpingo wa Coptic Orthodox ku dera la Giza lamulungu lapitali pomwe mapemphero adali mkati ndipo izi zidachititsa kuti pakhale chipwirikiti maka pothawa motowu mtchalitchili. Pa chipwirikitichi anthu 41 adafa ndipo mwa anthu omwe adafawa ndi episkopi wa mpingo wa Coptic Orthodox komanso ana ochuluka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapereka Thandizo la Ndalama Ku Sri Lanka
news: Likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza za thandizo la ndalama zokwana 150 million Kwacha zomwe Papa Francisco wapereka kwa mabanja 400 omwe abale awo adafa komanso kuvulala mabomba ataphulika pa matchalichi ena m’dziko la Sri Lanka m’chaka cha 2019. Pa mkumano wake Papa Francisko ndi Cardinal Ranjith waku Sri Lanka M’mawu ake atalandira thandizoli Cardinal Malcolm Ranjith wa m’dziko la Sri Lanka wati ndi woyamika Papa Francisco kaamba ka thandizoli. Cardinal Ranjith wafotokoza kuti pa mkumano wake ndi Papa Francisco, Papa’yu adafuna kudziwa za momwe moyo wa mabanja omwe adakhudzidwa ndi kuphulika kwa m bombawa  ukuyendera ndipo apa ndi pomwe Papa Francisco adaganiza zothandiza mabanjawa. Malinga ndi malipoti, anthu ena osadziwika adaphulitsa mabomba a tinke nawo pa tchalitchi la mpingo wa Katolika komanso tchalitchi la Mpingo wa Evangelical m’dziko la Sri Lanka mchaka cha 2019. Anthu okwana 269 anafa pa chiwembuchi ndipo ena ambiri anavulala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Watsindika Za Kufunika Kwa Malamulo Oteteza Miyala Ya Mtengo Wa Patali
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wati ndi kofunika kuti pakhale malamulo oyenera othandiza kuti miyala ya mtengo wa patali yomwe yapezeka m’dziko muno ipindulure a Malawi eni ake. Chakwera kulandiridwa ndi wachiwiri wake Saulosi Chilima pa bwalo la ndege la Kamuzu President Chakwera waankhula izi lachinayi pa bwalo la ndege la Kamuzu International mu mzinda wa Lilongwe pomwe amafika m’dziko muno kuchokera m’dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo komwe anakachita nawo msonkhano wa atsogoleri a mu bungwe la za chitukuko m’mayiko a ku mmwera kwa Africa la Southern Africa Development Community (SADC). Iye wati malamulo ndi ndondomeko zoyenera pa nkhaniyi zingathandize kuti ndalama zopezeka kuchokera ku miyala ya mtengo wa patali zithandize pa zitukuko za m’dziko muno. “Tiwonetsetse kuti zinthu zomwe chauta anatipatsazi, pakhale malamulo oyenera okomera a Malawi. Ndondomeko zotsatidwa zikhalenso zokwanira kuti kagwiritsidwe ntchito ka chumachi kakhalenso koyenera,” anatero a Chakwera. Pamenepa iwo anati kusamalitsa kwa ndalamazi kutha kuthandiza kuti dziko lino lichite zitukuko zosiyanasiyana monga kumanga sukulu, zipatala ndi zinthu zina zomwe zingapindulire anthu onse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mphunzitsi Anjatidwa Kaamba Kogwilira Ophunzira
news: Mphunzitsi wina wa sukulu ya pulayimale ali m’manja mwa apolisi kaamba komuganizira kuti wagwililira msungwana wa zaka khumi ndi zisanu m’boma la Nkhotakota. Malinga ndi wachiwiri wa wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sergeant Chisomo Chuma, woganiziridwayu ndi Lusungu Musumba wa zaka 36 yemwe ndi mphunzitsi pa sukulu ya Mwalawambira m’bomalo ndipo wapalamula mlanduwu pa 14 August chaka chino. Woganiziridwayu akuti anayitana mtsikanayo ku nyumba kwake komwe anamuwumiriza kuti agone naye. Atapita kwawo msungwanayu yemwe ndi wophunzira wa kalasi ya sitandade 7 pa sukulu yomweyo, anafotokozera makolo ake zomwe mkuluyu anamuchita zomwe sizinasangalatse makolowo ndipo anakanena ku polisi. Zotsatira za ku chipatala zasonyeza kuti mtsikanayo anagwiliridwadi. A Lusungu Musumba omwe ndi a m’mudzi mwa Kapolo m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Kilipula m’boma la Karonga, akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku khothi komwe akayankhe mlandu wogwirira mwana.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Uneneri Wa Amayi Maria Kuti Akhristu Adziyika Patsogolo Yesu Khristu
news: Poyankhula lachitatu kwa akhristu ochokera ku Poland omwe adali nawo mu Hall ya Papa Paulo wa 6, Papa Francisco wapempha Amayi Maria kuti apitirize kutsogolera akhristu a m’maiko a ku ulaya ndi dziko lonse la pansi ndi cholinga choti aziyika patsogolo Yesu Khristu komanso mawu a Mulungu omwe  ndi Uthenga wa Chipulumutso. Iye sadayiwalenso kupempha Amayi Maria kuti athandize anthu a m’dziko la Ukraine omwe wati akuvutika kwambiri. Papa Francisco wayikizanso m’manja mwa Amayi Maria achinyamata onse, anthu achikulire ndi onse omwe ayamba moyo wa banja posachedwapa. Iye wati ndi pemphero lake kuti anthu onsewa aziyika patsogolo m’moyo wawo Yesu Khristu komanso Mau a Mulungu. Pa mwambowu pa tsikuli, panachitika zinthu zosangalatsa ndi zopatsa chidwi. Chomwe chinachitika ndi chakuti pamene Papa Francisco amayankhula za kufunika kwa mgwirizano pakati pa anthu achikulire ndi achichepere, kamwana kena ka zaka zinayi kadawasiya makolo ake ndi kuthamangira ku stage komwe Papa Francisco adakhala ndi akuluakulu ena. Mwanayu anayenda mpaka kukayima pafupi penipeni ndi Papa Francisco. Papa Francisco anaoneka wokondwa ndipo anamuyankhula mwanayu ndi kukhala naye ka nthawi asanabwerere komwe makolo ake anakhala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu Atatu Anjatidwa Kaamba Kotchula Wina Kuti Ndi Mfiti
news: Apolisi m’boma la Dowa amanga anthu atatu kaamba kowaganizira kuti amaloza chala mkulu wina kuti ndi mfiti. Nkhaniyi yachitika lachiwiri m’mudzi wa Matekenya mdera la mfumu yaikulu Msakambewa m’boma la Dowa pomwe a Mickness Moses Luka, Maliko Green Chibwe ndi a Dickson Green Chibwe onsewa a m’mudzi mwa Kachinga m’dera la mfumu yaikulu Msakambewa m’bomalo akhala akunena bambo Daniel Keliasi kuti ndi mthakati. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’bomalo Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha wati anthuwa akhala akunena a Kelias kuti ndi omwe anapha mwana wawo yemwe anamwalira masabata atatu apitawo. Anthuwa akuti amaganizira kuti mwana wawo wam’muna yemwe dzina lake ndi Brenda Luka yemwe anamwalira pa ngozi ya njinga kumeneko, akuti ali moyo ndipo akusungidwa mu chigayo cha mkuluyo ponena kuti ena mwa iwo akhala akumuona m’nyumbamo. Potsatira izi anthuwo anapita kunyumba kwa mkuluyo komwe anayamba chisokonezo pofuna kuthana ndi mwini chigayoyo koma achitetezo cha kumudzi ndi omwe anapulumutsa bamboyu. Oganiziridwawa omwe ndi pachibale, awononga katundu osiyanasiyana pa nyumbapo kuphatikizapo zigayo ziwiri za mkuluyo ndipo katunduyo ndi wa ndalama zoposa 5.4 million kwacha. Anthuwa awatsekulira mlandu wonena munthu kuti ndi mfiti, kuwononga katundu wamwini ndiponso wa kuba ndipo akuyembekezeka kukawonekera ku khothi komwe akayankhe milanduyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Msonkhano Wa Maiko A M’bungwe La SADC Wayambika
news: Msonkhano wa nambala 42 wa atsogoleri a mu bungwe la za chitukuko m’mayiko a ku mmwera kwa Africa la SADC wayamba m’dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). President Chakwera wa Malawi ndi President Tshisekedi wa DRC Pa msonkhanowu mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera yemwe adali wapampando wa bungweli kwa chaka chimodzi wapereka udindowu kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo, Felix Tshisekedi. M’mawu ake popereka udindowu, President Chakwera wapempha maiko a bungweli kuti agwirane manja popititsa patsogolo chitukuko cha maiko awo ndipo iye wati maiko a mu bungweli akusowa ndalama zokwana 57 billion dollars za ku America zothandiza pa chitukuko. Atsogoleri omwe akuchita nawo msonkhanowu ndi mtsogoleri wa dziko la South Africa, Cyril Ramaphosa; mtsogoleri wa dziko la Zambia, Hakainde Hichilema, mtsogoleri wa dziko la Namibia, Hage Geingob, mtsogoleri wa dziko la Tanzania, Samia Suluhu Hassan, mtsogoleri wa dziko la Mozambique, Filipe Nyusi, mtsogoleri wa dziko la Botswana, Mokgweetsi Masisi komanso mtsogoleri wa dziko la Eswathini, King Mswati wachitatu. Bungwe la SADC adalikhazikitsa m’chaka cha 1992.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsindika Kufunika Kwa Mgwirizano wa Anthu Achikulire, Achinyamata
news: Poyankhula lachitatu ku Vatican, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kwa mgwirizano pakati pa anthu achikulire ndi achinyamata. Iye wati ndi zinthu zosakhala bwino kuona anthu achikulire akuchita zawo nawonso achinyamata akuchita zao. Pamenepa Papa Francisco wati zinthu zambiri zingamayende bwino komanso kupita patsogolo ngati pali mgwirizano pakati pa magulu awiriwa omwe wati sakuyenera kukhala pa mpikisano wina uliwonse. Iye wati ndi kofunika ndi koyenera kuti achinyamata azikhala pafupi ndi anthu achikulire kuti aziphunzira luntha ndi luso la anthu achikulire. Pa mwambowu Papa Francisco wakambaponso za imfa ponena kuti imfa ndi yowawa ndipo yosazolowereka. Komabe iye wati imfa ndi chiyambi cha moyo wina watsopano pamene mavuto onse a moyo uno sakhalanso ndi mphamvu ina iliyonse pa munthuyo
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Aliyense Akhale ndi Chiphaso cha Unzika – Nduna
news: Nduna yowona chitetezo cha m’dziko mayi Jean Sendeza apempha anthu mdziko muno kuti aliyense ayesetse kukhala ndi chiphaso cha unzika. Iwo amayankhula izi lachiwiri ku Chigodi kwa Santhe m’boma la Kasungu pa mwambo wokumbukira kalembera osiyanasiyana wa m’dziko muno. Sendeza: Aliyense akhale ndi chiphaso Kuno ku Africa, mwambowu umachitika pa 10 August chaka chilichonse koma kuno ku Malawi, chaka chino mwambowu wachitika pa 16 August. “Tikufunitsitsa kuti aliyense mdziko muno akhale ndi chiphaso. Aliyense kuyambira amene wangobadwa kumene, amene ali pa banja, mpaka amene wafa,” anatero mayi Sendeza. Pamenepa ndunayi yalamula mlembi wamkulu ku nthambi yowona za kalembera wa unzika mdziko muno ya National Registration Bureau (NRB) kuti atsekule positi ofesi ya Santhe m’boma la Kasungu kukhala malo olembetserako ziphaso za unzika kuti anthu asamapite madera a kutali. Polankhulapo mkulu wa bungwe a United Nations (UN) ku nthambi ya United Nations Development Programme (UNDP)m’dziko muno a Shigeki Komatsubara anati ndi okondwa ndi momwe dziko la Malawi likuchitira pa ntchito ya kalembera makamaka popereka ziphaso za unzika kwa anthu. Iwo anati ndi cholinga cha mabungwe a UNDP ndinso UNICEF kuti ntchito ya kalembera wa ana yomwe boma likugwira pano ifikire mwana aliyense. Mwambowu unasonkhanitsa magulu a anthu osiyanasiyana kuphatikizapo nduna za boma zitatu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Maiko, Mabungwe Athandize Dziko la Somalia ndi Chakudya
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha maiko ndi mabungwe kuti athandize dziko la Somalia ndi chakudya. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wapereka pempholi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Iye wati dziko la Somalia komanso maiko oyandikana nalo, akusowa thandizo la chakudya kaamba ka ng’amba. Anthu a mdziko la Somalia akuvutika ndi njala Iye wati maikowa ali pa mavuto owopsa ndipo kuti akusoweka thandizo la msangamsanga. “Ndikukhulupilira kuti maiko ndi mabungwe achitapo kanthu kuthandiza maiko amenewa ngakhale kuti nkhondo imayiwalitsanso za mavuto aakulu ngati amenewa koma ndi zofunika kwambiri kuti maiko ndi mabungwe achitepo kanthu,” watero Papa Francisco. Nthambi ya bungwe la United Nations yowona za chakudya ndi ulimi ya Food and Agriculture Organization (FAO) yati njala yowopsa ikuyembekezeka kuyambira mwezi wa September ngati vuto la ng’ambali lipitilire monga m’mene ziliri padakali pano. Nthambi ya bungwe la United Nations yowona za anthu othawa kwawo ya UNHCR komanso bungwe la Norwegian Refugee Council (NRC), ati anthu pafupifupi 1 million athawa m’makwawo kupita madera ena a dziko lomwelo la Somalia kupita kumasaka chakudya.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ACB Yamanga A Mwanamvekha
news: Senior Resident Magistrate Wanangwa Nyirenda wapereka belo kwa nduna yakale ya zachuma a Joseph Mwanamvekha omwe masanawa anamangidwa ndi bungwe lolimbana ndi katangale ndi ziphuphu mdziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB). Watuluka pa belo – Mwanamvekha Malinga ndi kalata yomwe bungwe la ACB latulutsa ndipo yasayinidwa ndi mneneri wa bungweli mayi Egritta Ndala, a Mwanamvekha akuwaganizira kuti anagwiritsa ntchito udindo wawo molakwika povomereza ndalama zoposa 18 million dollars zopita ku unduna owona za chitetezo cha mdziko zomwe anagulira uniform komanso zipangizo zina za nthambi ya ndende. Bungwe la ACB akuti linalandira dandaulo pa 16 October m’chaka cha 2020 kuti unduna owona za chitetezo cha mdziko muno wagula zinthuzi mosatsata ndondomeko ndipo kafukufuku wawo ndi yemwe wachititsa kuti bungweli limange a Mwanamvekha. Padakalipano bungweli latsekulira a Mwanamvekha mlandu wogwiritsa ntchito udindo wawo molakwika komanso kusasamala pa ntchito zomwe ndi zotsutsana ndi gawo 25b ndime 1 ya buku lowona za milandu ya katangale komanso gawo 121 ya bukhu loperekera zilango mdziko muno.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mzika yaku Rwanda Ilipira Chindapusa Kaamba Kopezeka ndi Chamba
news: Mzika ina ya mdziko la Rwanda, ayilamula kuti ipereke chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 100 sauzande kwacha kulephera apo akakhale ku ndende kwa miyezi 9 kaamba kopezeka ndi chamba. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sergeant Joseph Banda anawuza bwalo la milandu kuti mkuluyu, Isaac Byamungu anamangidwa pa 2 mwezi uno ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka m’boma la Dowa, atapezeka ndi chamba komanso kuti amagulitsa chambachi kwa anthu ena mderalo. Atawonekera mu bwaloli mkuluyu anauvomera mlanduwu omwe ndi otsutsana ndi gawo 4 la malamulo oyendetsera za mankhwala ozunguza bongo. First Grade Magistrate Robert Botha anati wapereka chigamulo cha mtunduwu kuti ena atengerepo phunziro. Byamungu ndi mzika ya dziko la Rwanda koma amakhala ku malo osungira anthu othawa kwawo a Dzaleka m’boma la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha a Katolika Adzikonda Kupita ku Malo Oyera a Amayi Maria
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha a Katolika kuti azikonda kupita ku malo oyera a Amayi Maria aliwonse omwe ali nao pafupi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi dzulo ku likulu la mpingo ku Vatican pamene mpingowu umachita chaka cha kukwera kwa Amayi Maria kumwamba. Papa kudalitsa chithuzni cha Amayi Maria Iye wati ndi koyenera kumapita ku malowa kukapemphera maka pa masiku akuluakulu a chaka cha Amayi Maria. “Pa tsiku lalikulu ngati ili la chaka cha kukwezedwa kwa Amayi Maria kumwamba ndi kukulimbikitsani kuti muzikonda kupita ku malo oyera aliwonse a Amayi Maria kukapemphera,” wayankhula motero Papa Francisco. Iye watsindika za kufunika kopemphera kwambiri ndi kudzikhuthula m’manja mwa Amayi Maria ndi kumawapempha kuti mtendere ukhazikike pa dziko la pansi makamaka m’maiko momwe muli nkhondo. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokondwa kuti anthu ambiri ku Rome pa tsiku la chaka cha kukwezedwa kwa Amayi Maria kumwamba amakapemphera mu tchalichi chachikulu cha Amayi Maria. Iye anamaliza ndi kupempha anthu okwana 10,000 omwe adali pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square kuti azimupempherera.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Amayi Maria Amayenda ndi Akhristu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse, Papa Francisco wati Amayi Maria amayenda limodzi ndi akhristu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi lolemba pomwe mpingo umachita chaka cha kukwezedwa kwa Amayi Maria kumwamba chomwe chimachitika pa 15 August chaka chilichonse. Monga chaka chachikulu mu Mpingo wa Katolika nthawi ya 12 koloko masana a lolemba, Papa Francisco adatsogolera anthu omwe adasonkhana pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican ponena pemphero la Uthenga wa Mnjelo kwa Amayi Maria, Angelus. M’mawu ake iye wati Amayi Maria sawasiya akhristu okha koma amawagwira pa makono ndi kumayenda nao limodzi. Koma si pokhapo iye waonjezeranso kuti monga Amayi a Mpingo, Amayi Maria amayitanira akhristu ku chisangalalo chosatha. Papa Francisco walimbikitsa akhristu kuti atengere chitsanzo cha Amayi’wa pokhala anthu odalira ndi kukhulupilira Mulungu. Mpingo wa Katolika umakhulupirira kuti monga Amayi Maria ali amayi a mpulumutsi Yesu Khristu yemwe ndi Mulungu Mwana, adakwezedwa kumwamba ali ndi thupi komanso mzimu wawo. Papa Pio wa 12 ndi yemwe adakhazikitsa maphunzitso amenewa otchedwa dogma pa 1 November m’chaka cha 1950 kudzera m’kalata yotchedwa Munificentissimus Deus. Dogma ndi maphunzitso amene mkatolika aliyense ayenera kuvomereza ndi kukhulupilira.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apolisi Anjata Mzika 81 Za Mdziko La Ethiopia
news: Mzika za mdziko la Ethiopia zokwana 81 zili mchitolokosi cha apolisi m’boma la Karonga poziganziira kuti zalowa mdziko muno opanda chilorezo. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Karonga, George Mulewa watsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo wati apolisiwa amanganso anthu ena awiri omwe ndi mzika za dziko lino powaganizira kuti ndi omwe anathandizira kuti mzika za ku Ethiopia-zo zilowe mdziko muno. Anthuwa akuti amangidwa ndi asilikali a Malawi Defence Force (MDF) amene anayika roadblock pa Chilumba m’bomalo. “Anthuwa alipo 81 ndipo anakwera mu galimoto ya van. Anagwidwa ndi anzathu a MDF omwe anayika roadblock pa malo ena otchedwa Chilumba kunoko ku Karonga,” anatero a Mulewa. Padakalipano a Mulewa ati anthuwa akuwafunsa mafunso ndipo pambuyo pake akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu komwe akayankhe mlandu wolowa mdziko muno popanda chilorezo pamene awiriwo akayankha mlandu wothandizira anthu kulowa mdziko muno mozembera boma.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Amayi Sakupikisana Nawo pa Chisankho Chapadera
news: Bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) ladandaula kaamba ka kusowa kwa amayi pa mndandanda wa anthu omwe akupikisana nawo pa chisankho chapadera chomwe chikuyembekezeka kuchitika pa 23 August 2022, m’madera atatu a makhansala mdziko muno. Mwafulirwa: Palibe mayi amene wadzapereka zikalata zake Wofalitsa nkhani za bungweli a Sangwani Mwafulirwa ati izi zili chomwechi ngakhale bungweli linayika njira zolimbikitsira amayi kupikisana nawo m’maudindo kuphatikizapo kutsitsa ndi theka ndalama yomwe opikisana amayenera kulipira ku bungweli. Iwo ati ngakhale izi zili zomwechi amayi amene analembetsa kuti adzaponya voti pa chisankhochi, ndi ochuluka kuposa abambo. “Madera onse atatu palibe mayi amene wadzapereka zikalata zake kuti apikisana nawo ngati khansala. Koma ifeyo a MEC m’mbuyomu takhala tikumapereka discount kuti amayi amene akufuna kuyima nawo pa chisankho apereke half ya ndalama yomwe amuna amapereka. Iyi inali njira yowalimbikitsira amayi kuti adzipikisana nawo m’maudindowa,” anatero a Mwafulirwa. Pamenepa a Mwafulirwa ati ndi kofunika kufufuza ndi kupeza chimene chikupitilira kulepheretsa amayi kupikisana nawo pa maudindo ngakhale boma ndi mabungwe akulimbikitsa za izi. Malinga ndi bungwe la MEC, anthu atsopano amene alembetsa mkaudnula wa voti m’madera atatu a komwe kuchitike chisankhochi a Shire ku Balaka, Wenya ku Chitipa komanso Lupembe ku Karonga alipo 1,070. Mwa anthuwa 409 ndi aamuna pamene 661 ndi aakazi. Anthu amene anakawona maina awo mkaundula wa voti ndi 10,110 omwe 3, 753 ndi amuna ndipo 6,357 ndi akazi. Ngakhale izi zili chomwechi, mwa anthu 15 omwe apereka zikalata zawo kuti apikisane nawo pa udindowu, palibepo munthu wa mkazi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati ndi Wokhudzidwa ndi Imfa ya Anthu Ochuluka pa Ngozi ya Bus mdziko la Croatia
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa ndi imfa ya anthu ochuluka pa ngozi ya bus m’dziko la Croatia. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco wayankhula izi ku likulu la mpingowu ku Vatican. Bus yomwe inachita ngoziyo Iye wati kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria, wayikiza m’manja mwa Mulungu mizimu ya anthu onse omwe afa pa ngoziyi komanso wati waikiza m’manja mwa Mulungu anamfedwa onse ndi ovulala onse. “Ndine munthu wodzadzidwa ndi chisoni kumva za ngozi yowopsayi yomwe yakhudza anthu omwe adali pa ulendo wokapemphera ku malo oyera ku Medjugorje. Kudzera mu uneneri wa Amayi Maria ndikupemphera kuti Mulungu alandire mu ufumu wake mizimu ya onse omwe afa ndipo sindikuyiwala kupempherera anamfedwa onse ndi omwe avulala,” watero Papa Francisco. Malipoti akuti anthu khumi ndi awiri (12) adafa pa ngoziyi ndipo ena 32 adavulala. Ngoziyi yachitika loweruka lapitali nthawi ya ku m’mawa bus yomwe anthuwa adaakwera itasiya msewu ndi kukalowa ku phompho. Ena mwa omwe adali mu bus’yi ndi ansembe atatu komanso asisitere asanu ndi m’modzi (6). Anthuwa adali pa ulendo wokapemphera ku malo oyera ku Medjugorje m’dziko la Bosnia-Herzegovina kumene akuti Amayi Maria adawonekera kwa ana ena mzaka za m’ma 1980.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MERA Ikuwunguza za Mitengo Yatsopano ya Magetsi
news: Bungwe lowona za mphamvu za m’bwezera lati likufuna kukhazikitsa mitengo yatsopano yogulira magetsi kudzera mu ndondomeko yomwe ikutchedwa Tsinde la Magetsi. Watsimikiza za nkhaniyi – Khonje Malingana ndi chikalata chomwe bungweli latulutsa, ndondomeko ya Tsinde la Magetsi lomwe akutsatira pano linakhazikitsidwa mchaka cha 2018 ndipo limayenera kutha mu zaka zinayi zomwe zifike kumapeto mwezi wa September 2022. Malingana ndi mneneri wa bungweli Fitina Khonje, kukhazikitsa mitengo yatsopano ya magetsi kumathandiza kuti magetsi adzipezeka moyenera kaamba koti nthambi zonse zokhudzidwa ndi kupanga magetsi, kugulitsa ndinso kupereka magetsi kwa makasitomala, imayenda bwino potsatira kumvana pa mtengo oyenera. Motero Khonje wati kuyambira mwezi wa October, bungwe la MERA likhala likuchita mikumano ndi magulu okhudzidwa pa nkhani za magetsi kuti amvane pa mulingo woyenera kugulira ndinso kugulitsa magetsi kwa zaka zina zinayi zikubwerazi. Ndondomekoyi ikakhazikitsidwa imathandiza kuti mabungwe okhudzidwa ndi kupanga, kupereka ndi kugulitsa magetsi azitha kukweza mitengo ya magetsi pa nyengo ya zaka zinayi pa mulingo omwe anapatsidwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Watsindika Za Kufunika Kwa Chikhulupiliro Mwa Mulungu
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koyika chikhulupiliro mwa Mulungu komanso chisamaliro chake. Malinga ndi malipoti a Catholic News Agency, Papa wayankhula izi lamulungu ku likulu la mpingo wa katolika ku Vatican. Iye wati palibe chifukwa chochitira mantha popeza Mulungu amayenda ndi anthu ake nthawi zonse. Iye walimbikitsa anthu pa za kufunika kochotsa mantha ndi kupewa kumangodandaula ponena kuti Mulungu amayenda ndi anthu ake nthawi zonse. Papa Francisco wati kawiri-kawiri anthu ambiri amadziyika okha mu ndende posamadzikhulupirira okha ndi kumangodandaula. Iye wati kuchita mantha kumalepheretsa anthu kuyenda chitsogolo komanso kumalepheretsa kupeza mayankho a mavuto osiyanasiyana ndipo wati mapeto ake anthu ambiri amayesa kuti angathe kupeza mayankho mu chuma ndi zinthu zina koma pa mapeto pake anthu ambiri amakhalabe okhumudwa ndi osakhutitsidwa. Papa Francisco wati kudzera mu Uthenga Wabwino wa tsiku lamulungu la 19 mu nyengo ya pa chaka Ambuye Yesu akutsimikizira anthu ndi mawu oti: Musaope.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Walimbikitsa Akhristu Kugwiritsa Ntchito Njira za Makono Polalika Uthenga wa Chipulumutso
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco walimbikitsa akhristu za kufunika kogwiritsa ntchito njira za makono zotumizira mauthenga polalika uthenga wa chipulumutso. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema kwa nthumwi za ku msonkhano m’dziko la Mexico wokambirana za kufunika kwa njira za makono zofalitsira ma uthenga polalika uthenga wa chipulumutso. Iye wati njira za makono zofalitsira mauthenga zingathandize kwambiri kufikira anthu omwe sadamvebe za uthenga wa chipulumutso. Iye wati kugwiritsa ntchito makina a intaneti pofalitsa uthenga wa chipulumutso ndi njira ya mphamvu yothandiza kufikira anthu ankhaninkhani. “Ndafuna mudziwe kuti kulalika Mawu a Mulungu kudzera pa makina a intaneti ndi utumiki wina wa paderadera ndipo mudziwe kuti ndinu a mishonare a Mpingo ndipo ndinu gawo lina la Mpingo lofunika kwambiri polalika za chikondi ndi chifundo cha Mulungu,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Iye wati kudzera mu ulendo wake wa posachedwapa wa m’dziko la Canada adalimbikitsa akhristu za kufunika kopeza njira zatsopano zothandiza kufikira anthu omwe sadamvebe uthenga wa chipulumutso. Papa Francisco wati ndi chikhulupiriro chake kuti kudzera mu utumiki umenewu, masamba a mchezo akhala malo omwe anthu angamawonetserane chikondi komanso chifundo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akupitilira Kupemphelera Anthu a Mdziko la Lebanon
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati akupitiriza kuyikiza m’mapemphero anthu a m’dziko la Lebanon. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco walankhula izi pano pomwe tsopano papita zaka ziwiri kuchokera pomwe m’dzikolo mudachitika ngozi yowopsa kwambiri. Pa 4 August m’chaka cha 2020 ku Beirut m’dziko la Lebanon kudachitika ngozi yowopsa kwambiri potsatira kuphulika kwa katundu wina yemwe amagwiritsidwa ntchito popanga feteleza komanso mabomba ndipo katunduyu anamulanda mu sitima ina yonyamula katundu m’chaka cha 2014 ndipo amamusunga pa doko lina la nyanja ya Mediterranean m’dzikolo. Iye wati sakuyiwala makamaka mabanja omwe abale awo adataya miyoyo pa ngoziyi. “Ndikupempherera onse omwe adakhudzidwa ndi ngoziyi kuti Mulungu apitirize kuwathunzitsa mtima kudzera mu chikhulupiriro komanso kudzera mu chilungamo ndi choona pa nkhaniyi. Ndikukhulupirira kuti ndi thandizo la maiko osiyanasiyana zinthu zipitirira kubwerera mchimake ndipo kuti dzikoli lipitirira kulandira bwino anthu ochokera maiko ena,” watero Papa Francisco. Malipoti a bungwe la United Nations akuti ngoziyi idaononga nyumba 77,000, kupha anthu oposa 200 ndipo kuvulaza anthu oposa 7,000.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha a Katolika Apemphelere Anthu Ochita Bizinesi Zing’onozing’ono
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati akupemphelera anthu onse ochita bizinesi zing’onozing’ono. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu uthenga wake wa pa kanema posinkhasinkha cholinga cha mapemphero ake a mwezi uno wa August. Mu uthengawu, iye wapempha a Katolika onse kuti mwezi uno apempherere anthu onse a ma bizinesi ang’onoang’ono. “Tiyeni tipempherere onse ochita ma bizinesi makamaka ma bizinesi ang’onoang’ono kuti mkatikati mwa mavuto a za chuma, nkhondo, mliri wa corona virus apeze njira zopititsira patsogolo ma bizinesi awo,” watero Papa Francisco mu uthengawu. Iye watchula magolosale, malo okonzera zinthu zosiyanasiyana, malo otsukira galimoto ngati zitsanzo za ma bizinesi ang’onoang’ono. Papa Francisco watsiriza ndi kuyamikira anthu a ma bizinesi ang’onoang’ono kaamba ka khama lawo komanso kudzipereka kwawo pochita bizinesizi zomwe zimatumikira anthu a nkhaninkhani.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mkulu Wakale wa ACB Anjatidwa pa Nkhani za Katangale
news: Bungwe lolimbana ndi katangale ndi ziphuphu mdziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) lamanga mkulu wakale wa bungweli a Reyneck Matemba powaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi nkhani za katangale ndi mkulu wina ochita malonda otchedwa Zuneth Sattar. Wanjatidwa-Matemba Malinga ndi kalata yomwe yasainidwa ndi mneneri wa bungwe la ACB mayi Egritta Ndala, bungweli lamanganso yemwe anali wapampando wa board ya bungwe lowona zogula komanso kugulitsa katundu wa boma ya Public Procurement and Disposal of Assets (PPDA) a John Suzi Banda. Kumangidwa kwa awiriwa akuti kukukhudzana ndi nkhani yogula zakudya za ku nthambi ya apolisi yomwe inali ya ndalama zokwana 875,000 US Dollars. Kalatayi yati kafukufuku wa bungweli wapeza kuti a Matemba analandira ndalama pafupifupi 10 000 US Dollars zomwe ndi pafupifupi 10 million Malawi kwacha kuchokera kwa a Zuneth Sattar pamene a Suzi- Banda analandira ndalama zokwana 3 million kwacha kuchokeranso kwa mkulu yemweyu. Padakalipano awiriwa akufunsidwa mafunso ndi bungwe la ACB ndipo pambuyo pake akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu. A Matemba awatsekulira mlandu ogwiritsa ntchito mphamvu zawo molakwika ndipo a Suzi Banda awatsekulira mlandu wolandira ndalama mwachinyengo. Padakalipano Chief Resident Magistrate Madalitso Chimwaza wapereka belo kwa a Matemba.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Achita Mkumano ndi Ana aku Vatican
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita mkumano ndi ana a anthu omwe amagwira ntchito ku Vatican. Papa kucheza ndi ena mwa ana ku msonkhanowo Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa nkumanowu wachitika lachitatu ku Vatican padakalipano pamene anawa akuchita msonkhano wawo omwe umakonzedwa ndi likulu la mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse. Awa ndi ana a anthu ogwira ntchito zosiyanasiyana ku Vatican. Mwa njira yapadera Papa Francisco wawalandira anawa ku Vatican pano pomwe akucheza limodzi, kusewera masewero osiyanasiyana olimbitsa thupi komanso kupemphera limodzi. Iye wayamikira makolo a anawa komanso aphunzitsi awo kaamba ka ntchito yotamandika yomwe akugwira ndipo mwa njira yapadera Papa Francisco wayamikira bambo mlangizi wa anawa bambo Franco Fontana a chipani cha ansembe cha Salesian kaamba ka chidwi chawo pa anawa. Chaka chino ana 230 ndi amene akuchita nawo mkumanowu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Atsiriza Lero Ulendo Wake wa Mdziko la Canada
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco lero akuyembekezeka kutsiriza ulendo wake wocheza m’dziko la Canada. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio mwa zina lero Papa Francisco achita mkumano ndi ansembe a chipani cha ma Jesuit komanso mkumano ndi achinyamata a m’dzikolo. Ndege ya Papa Francisco ikuyembekezeka kunyamuka pa bwalo la ndege la Iqaluit kupita ku Rome m’dziko Italy nthawi ya 18:45 madzulo nthawi ya kumeneko ndipo ikuyembekezeka kutera pa bwalo la ndege la Fiumicino International ku Rome mawa nthawj ya 7:50 m’mawa. Ulendo wa Papa Francisco m’dziko la Canada kwambiri udali ulendo wokapepesa kaamba ka m’chitidwe woipa wochitira ana nkhanza womwe umachitika msukulu za m’dzikoli zomwe mzaka za m’ma 1900 zimayendetsedwa ndi Mpingo wa Katolika. M’malo mwa mpingo wonse wa Katolika, iye wapepesa kwa eni nthaka a dzikolo kaamba ka m’chitidwe woipawu. Papa Francisco adautchula ulendowu kukhala ulendo wa uzimu omwe cholinga chake chinali kulapa, Pilgrimage of Penance
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe La CWO Ku Chilomoni Parish Likukonza Zokathandiza Chipatala Cha Zomba Mental
news: Bungwe la amayi a chikatolika la Catholic Women Organization (CWO) ku tchalitchi cha Saint James ku Chilomoni mu arkidayosizi ya Blantyre lati potsatira baibulo, ndi chinthu chabwino kuyendera anthu omwe ndi osowa. Thawe: Takonza zakudya ndi zakumwa zogulitsa Wapampando wa bungweli mayi Selina Thawe ayankhula izi pano pomwe amayiwa akukonzekera ntchito yomwe iwathandize kupeza ndalama kuti akathandizire anthu odwala ku Zomba Mental Hospital. Iwo ati ndi cholinga chawo kuthandiza anthu omwe kawiri-kawiri safikiridwa ndi chithandizo. “Takonza zakudya ndi zakumwa zosiyanasiyana zomwe tidzagulitse lachisanu sabata ya mawa ku hall ya tchalitchilo pofuna kupeza ndalama zoti tipite nazo ku Zomba Mental Hospital tikathandize anzathu omwe amapezeka kumeneko,” anatero mayi Thawe. Mlendo wolemekezeka adzakhala nduna yowona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi a bambo, chisamaliro cha anthu komanso chitukuko cha m’madera, olemekezeka mayi Patricia Kaliati.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: IBAM Yati Malawi Ipindula Pa Chiwonetsero Cha Za Malonda
news: M’modzi mwa a mkhalakale pa nkhani za malonda m’dziko muno a Mike Mlombwa ati chiwonetsero cha za malonda chomwe chayamba lachinayi pa 28 mwezi July, ku Chichiri Trade Fair grounds mu mzinda wa Blantyre, chithandiza a malonda a m’dziko muno kupita patsogolo ndi malonda awo. Chiwonetsero cha za malonda ku Blantyre Mlombwa yemwenso ndi mkulu wa bungwe la Indeginous Business Association of Malawi (IBAM) anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo anati kudzera mu chiwonetsero chimenechi, a malonda awonetsa katundu yemwe akhala akulephera kumuwonetsa zaka ziwiri zapitazi kaamba ka mliri wa COVID-19. “Monga mukudziwa kuti takhala pafupifupi zaka ziwiri tisakuchita chiwonetsero cha za malonda chimenechi kaamba ka mliri wa COVID-19. Ndiye tikukhulupilira kuti chiwonetsero chimenechi chithandiza kufula ntchito za malonda zina zomwe zinakwilirika kamba ka mliriwu,”anatero a Mlombwa. Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera ndi yemwe watsekulira chiwonetserochi lachinayi, ndipo amalonda a mdziko muno komanso maiko a kunja atenga nawo pa chiwonetserchi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Nhlangano Wa Angoni Uliko Mwezi Wa September
news: Zokonzekera za mwambo wa Nhlangano wa chikhalidwe cha angoni, zayambika m’madera onse omwe angoniwa akupezeka mdziko muno. Poyankhulapo mneneri wa angoni okhala m’chigawo chakumwera kwa dziko lino, a Hastings Jumbe ati mwambo wa chaka chino ukuyembekezeleka kukhala wa mtengo wapatali kaamba koti akhala asakuchita mwambowu kwa zaka ziwiri chifukwa cha matenda a Covid-19. Angoni aku Ntcheu Iwo ati mwambowu ukuyembekezeka kudzachitika kuyambira pa 4 mpaka pa 6 September chaka chino ku Nkolimbo m’boma la Ntcheu. “Tinakhala zaka ziwiri tisanapange mwambowu kaamba ka mliri wa COVID-19 ndipo chamukomera Ngwenyama kutipatsa masiku atatu amenewa kuti tidzachite mwambo umenewu,” anatero a Jumbe. Iwo ati mwambowu umapereka mpata oti mafumu akuluakulu a mtunduwu akhale ndi anthu awo ndi kukambirana zinthu zofunika polimbikitsa chikhalidwe chawo. “Mwambowu umathandizira makosi athu kukumana ndi Ngwenyama ndi kumufotokozera zinthu zina zomwe akuchita m’madera mwawo komanso Ngwenyama amakhala ndi danga lokumana ndi anthu ndi kuwafotokozera zomwe wawatengera,” anatero a Jumbe. Pamenepa a Jumbe apempha anthu a mitundu yosiyanasiyana kuti adzakhale nawo pa mwambowu ponena kuti mwambowu ndi wa aliyense osati angoni okha.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Msonkhano wa SECAM Ukambirana za Anthu Othawa Kwawo
news: Msonkhano wa mabungwe a maepiskopi a mpingo wa katolika mchigawo cha Africa ndi chilumba cha Madagascar wotchedwa Symposium Episcopal Conference of Africa and Madagascar (SECAM) uli mkati mu mzinda wa Accra mdziko la Ghana. Wachiwiri kwa wapampando wa bungwe la maepiskopi mdziko muno la Episcopal Conference of Malawi (ECM) Ambuye Montfort Stima ndi omwe ayimira dziko lino ku msonkhanowu. Ena mwa maepiskopi omwe ali ku msonkhanowu Iwo ati msonkhanowu omwe ndi wa sabata imodzi, ukuwunika nkhani zokhudza chitetezo komanso anthu othawa mayiko a kwawo mu Africa ndi zilumba zina. “Posinkhasinkha za mutu umenewu tikuwona kuti mayiko ambiri zinthu sizikuyenda bwino chifukwa anthu akumakangana zomwe zikuchititsa kuti anthu athawe nkupita ku mayiko ena. Choncho tikhala tikukambirana ndi kuwona momwe tingawathandizire chifukwa aliyense anabadwa mchifanizo cha Mulungu ndipo ndi udindo wa mpingo kuwonetsetsa kuti anthu akusamalidwa bwino,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Iwo ati msonkahnowu ukambirananso zokhudza sinodi ya maepiskopi yomwe a Papa anayikhazikitsa. “Tiwona kuti mayiko a mu Africa tili potani pa nkhani imeneyi ndipo ngati ena akutsalira, tithandizana kuti tiyendere limodzi,” anatero Ambuye Stima. Msonkhanowu unatsekuliridwa ndi nsembe ya Misa ndipo mtsogoleri wa dzikolo Nana Akufo-Addo anali nawo pa mwambowo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ng’anga Akagwira Ukayidi Kaamba Kogwilira Kasitomala Wake
news: Bwalo la Senior Resident m’boma la Mangochi lalamula sing’anga wina kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka khumi atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu wogwilira mayi wina yemwe anali kasitomala wake. Woyimira boma pa mlanduwu Sub Inspector Maggie Chibulire anauza bwaloli kuti mayiyu yemwe ndi wa zaka 30 zakubadwa anayamba nthenda ya mu ubongo atapita padera mwezi wa October chaka chatha zomwe zinachititsa kuti makolo ake amutengere kwa sing’angayu yemwe dzina lake ndi Chiko Vasco wa zaka 70 zakubadwa. Patatha miyezi inayi, mayiyu anayamba kupeza bwino ndipo ng’angayu anauza makolowo kuti amupatse ndalama zokwana 80 sauzande kwacha. Makolowo anati adzipereka ndalamayo pang’onopang’ono zomwe sizinasangalatse mkuluyu ndipo anasamutsa mayiyu ndi kukamusiya ku malo ena komwe anamusandutsa mkazi wake wachiwiri. Pa 13 July chaka chino, pamene makolowo anapeza ndalama yonse ndi kupita kuti akatenge mwana wawo, anali odadwa kumupeza kuti ndi oyembekezera ndipo atamufunsa ndi pomwe amafotokoza za nkhaniyi. Popereka chigamulo chake pa nkhaniyi, Senior Resident Rodrick Michongwe anati wapereka chilango chotere kuti ena atengerepo phunziro ponena kuti sing’angayu anapezerapo mwayi pa kuvutika kwa mayiyu. Vasco amachokera m’mudzi mwa Kadango mfumu yaikulu Namabvi m’boma la Mangochi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MEC Yati Kalembera Wayenda Bwino
news: Bungwe loyendetsa chisankho mdziko muno la Malawi Electoral Commission (MEC) lati ntchito yolemba komanso kuwunika mayina mkaundula wa voti pa chisankho chapadera, yayenda bwino. Mneneri wa bungweli a Sangwani Mwafulirwa anena izi potsatira kutha kwa nthawi ya kalemberayu m’madera atatu a makhansala omwe muchitike chisankhochi a Shire ku Balaka, Wenya ku Chitipa komanso Lupembe ku Karonga. Iwo ati ntchitoyi yayenda popanda vuto lililonse. “Ntchitoyi yayenda bwino ndipo ndi chifukwa chake sitinawonjezere masiku a kalemberayu,” anatero a Mwafulirwa. Iwo ati anthu asayembekezere kukwera kwa chiwerengero cha anthu omwe alembetsa mkaundulayu kaamba koti ambiri analembetsa kale. “Amene amalembetsa ndi okhawo amene akwanitsa zaka 18 kapena analembetsa zaka 18 mbuyomu koma analibe mwayi oti angalembetse mkaundula wa voti,” anapitiriza motero a Mwafulirwa A Mwafulirwa ati bungweli litulutsa mndandanda wa mayina onse omwe ali mu kaundulayu posachedwapa. Mwazina iwo ati nyengo yokopa anthu ikupitilirabe choncho amene akupikisana nawo pa udindowu akuyenera kutero koma motsata malamulo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Katangale Ndi Mdani Wa Dziko – Chakwera
news: Mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wati katangale ndi mdani wamkulu wa dziko lino. President Chakwera wanena izi lachiwiri ku Blantyre pa mwambo wotsekera msonkhano wokambirana za kuthetsa katangale. Potsekera mwambowu, iye wakhazikitsanso kampeni ya sabata makumi awiri (20) yolimbana ndi katangale yomwe idzathe pa 9 November. “Katangale ndi mdani wathu wamkulu ndipo kuno sitikumulandira. Zokamba zathu tigwirizana kuti ndi katangale ndipo sitimpatsa mpata paliponsepo,” anatero a Chakwera. Poyankhula pa mwambo omwewu, mtsogoleri wa dziko linoyu wayamikira ntchito yomwe mkulu wa bungwe lothana ndi katangale m’dziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) a Martha Chizuma akugwira poyetsetsa kuthana ndi m’chitidwewu. Iye wati a Chizuma akugwira ntchito yotamandika ndipo akugwira ntchitoyi modzipereka. “Ndithokoze onse amene akuyesetsa kuthana ndi mchitidwewu ndipo makamaka mayi Chizuma omwe akudzipereka kwambiri pa ntchito imeneyi,” anatero a Chakwera. Iwo ati mayiyu akuyesetsa kwambiri ngakhale ntchitoyi ili yovuta kwambiri.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: EGENCO Izimitsa Magetsi Kwa Maola 16
news: Bungwe lopanga magetsi mdziko muno la Electricity Generation (EGENCO) lati lizimitsa makina ake aku Nkula B kwa maola 16 kumathero a sabatayi. Mneneri wa bungweli a Moses Gwaza atsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo ati izi zichitika pofuna kukonza makina ochotsera zinyalala pa malowa, omwe awonongeka. Kuzimitsidwa kwa makinawa kukhudza 100 megawatts ya magetsi yomwe imapangidwa ku malowa yomwe ndi 40 percent ya magetsi a dziko lino. “Ndizoona kuti pa 30 komanso pa 31 mwezi uno tizayimitsa kupanga magetsi kwa maola 8 tsiku lililonse. Izi zili chomwechi chifukwa makina omwe timachotsera zinyalala sakugwira bwino ntchito ndiye tikufuna kuti akadaulo athu olowa m’madzi alowe ndi kukachotsa makinawa komanso akakonze ma intake screens kuti malo opangira magetsi asalowe zinyalala kapena zoyipa zilizose,” anatero a Gwaza. Iwo anati kuzimitsa makinawa kuthandiza kuti akadaulo a bunweli adzagwire ntchitoyi popanda chiwopsezo chilichonse. A Gwaza ati ntchitoyi ndi yofunika kwambiri ponena kuti vutoli akalilekelera libweretsa mavuto ena. “Tikangosiya osagwira ntchitoyi tiwononga zinthu zambiri chifukwa choti ku makina kwathu kutha kulowa zinyalala kapena zinthu zian zimene sizoyenera kuti ziloweko,” anatsindika motero a Gwaza. Dziko la Malawi lakhala likukumana ndi vuto la kuthimathima kwa magetsi kuchokwera pomwe namondwe wa Anna anakhudza dziko lino kumayambiliro a chaka chino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Anthu Adzikumbukira Mbiri Yawo
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti anthu asamaiwale mbiri yawo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa wayankhula izi mu malaliko ake pa Misa yomwe adatsogolera pa bwalo la za masewero la Commonwealth mu mzinda wa Edmonton m’dziko la Canada pa tsiku lomwe Mpingo umachita chaka cha Joachim ndi Anna Oyera omwe ndi agogo a Ambuye Yesu. Papa kucheza ndi m’modzi mwa anthu achikulire Iye wati anthu achikulire ndi ofunika kwambiri kaamba koti ndi nkhokwe ya malangizo komanso chikhulupiriro. Papa Francisco wati anthu akuyenera kusunga ndi kulemekeza mbiri yao ponena kuti munthu aliyense amabadwa pakati pa anthu ndipo wati ndi anthu amenewo omwe amapanga munthu aliyense kukhala chomwe ali. Iye wati palibe amene amasankha kobadwira kotero pa chifukwa ichi anthu akuyenera kulemekeza ndi kunyadira komwe akuchokera chifukwa zonse zopezeka komwe munthu adabadwira ndi zomwe zimapanga munthuyo kukhala chomwe ali. Papa Francisco wamaliza ndi kupempha uneneri wa Joachim ndi Anna Oyera kuti azithandiza akhristu kunyadira mbiri yao ndi komwe achokera komanso kuti azikonda ndi kulemekeza anthu achikulire.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akupita ku Quebec
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco lero akuyembekezeka kupita ku Quebec dera la ku m’mawa kwa dziko la Canada. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco apita ku deralo pochokera ku Edmonton komwe adafikira laMulungu lapitali. Akafika ku deralo mwa zina Papa Francisco achita mkumano ndi nduna yaikulu ya dzikolo. Ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican, Holy See Press Office yati Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kunyamuka pa bwalo la ndege la Edmonton nthawi ya 9 koloko m’mawa nthawi ya kumeneko. Ofesiyi yati akafika ku Quebec, Papa Francisco akalandiridwa ndi mkulu wa boma wa deralo Governor General ndipo kenako awiriwa akachita zokambirana. Pambuyo pa mkumanowu, Papa Francisco akuyembekezekanso kuchita zokambirana ndi nduna yaikulu ya dziko la Canada, Justin Trudeau. Kenako Papa’yu alankhula kwa a kazembe oimira maiko awo m’dziko la Canada, members of the diplomatic corps. Dziko la Malawi likusiyana kwambiri pa nkhani ya nthawi ndi dziko la Canada. Dziko la Canada likusalira m’mbuyo ndi maola asanu ndi atatu (8).
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapepesa Kwa Eni Nthaka a Dziko la Canada
news: Lolemba m’mawa Papa Francisco adali ku dera la ku m’mawa kwa mzinda wa Edmonton m’dziko la Canada makamaka ku sukulu yodziwika kuti Ermineskin Indian Residential School. Iyi ndi imodzi mwa sukulu zazikulu zomwe zidali kuyendetsedwa ndi a mishonale a mpingo wa Katolika zaka za m’mbuyomu kuyambira pomwe sukuluyi adayikhazikitsa m’chaka cha 1895 koma kenako m’chaka cha 1969 sukuluyi idayamba kuyendetsedwa ndi boma ndipo patangopita zaka zisanu ndi chimodzi (6) sukuluyi adayitseka. Papa Francisko (pakati) pa mwambo omwe anapepesa mdziko la Canada Ali ku sukuluyi Papa Francisco adachita mkumano ndi ena mwa omwe adaphunzira pa sukuluyi ndipo omwe adachitiridwapo nkhanza ali achichepere kaamba koyankhula chiyankhulo cha makolo awo komanso kaamba kochita ndi kutsatira zina za chikhalidwe chawo. Amenewa ndi eni nthaka a dzikoli omwe amadziwika kuti the Indigenous people of Canada. M’mawu ake kwa anthuwa, Papa Francisco wapepesa kuchokera pansi pa mtima wake eni nthaka a dziko la Canada kaamba ka m’chitidwe oyipa ochitira ana nkhanza omwe udali kuchitika msukulu za m’dzikoli. Iye wati ndi wa chisoni chachikulu ndipo m’malo mwa mpingo wonse wa Katolika wapempha chikhululukiro cha anthuwa komanso wapempha chikhululukiro cha Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati ndi cholinga cha mpingo kuti mwazina ana aziwonetseredwa chikondi komanso azilemekedwa. Asadayambe ulendo wokacheza m’dziko la Canada iye adafotokoza kuti uwu ndi ulendo wa uzimu omwe cholinga chake ndi kulapa ndi kupempha chiyanjano (Pilgrimage of Penance) kaamba ka m’chitidwe woipa wochitira ana nkhanza omwe umachitika msukulu za m’dzikolo zomwe mzaka za m’ma 1900 zimayendetsedwa ndi mpingo wa Katolika.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Makhansala ku Mangochi Asankha Mtsogoleri Wawo Watsopano
news: Makhansala a boma la Mangochi asankha khansala Ivy Sande wa chipani cha Democratic Progressive (DPP) kukhala wapampando wa khonsolo ya bomalo. Sande: Ndigwira ntchito molemekeza aliyense Poyankhula pambuyo pa kusankhidwa kwawo, mayi Sande omwe ndi khansala wa ward ya Maiwa ku dera la Mangochi Malombe, ati awonetsetsa kuti pali mgwirizano pakati pa makhansalawa ndi akuluakulu a khonsolo ya bomalo. Iwo ati awonetsetsa kuti chitukuko chikuyenda bwino m’bomalo. “Ndigwira ntchito molemekeza aliyense koma mosaopa. Niwonetsetsa kuti pali mgwirizano pakati pa ife a ndale ndi akuluakulu a khonsolo,” anatero mayi Sande. Poyankhulapo yemwe anali wapampando wa khonsoloyi a Alexander Scott afunira zabwino zonse mayi Sande pa udindo wawo watsopanowu. “Ndiwafunire zabwino zonse anzanga amene apambana ndipo ife tigwira nawo ntchito limodzi. Ndi momwe chisankho chimakhalira kupambana komanso kugonja,” anatero a Scott. Pamenepa a Scott ati ndi kofunika kuti mayi Sande apitirize zitukuko zomwe iwo akhala akuchita pamene anali pa udindowu kuti khonsoloyo ipitilire kuyenda bwino.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wafika M’dziko la Canada
news: Ulendo wa Papa Francisco wa nambala 37 kunja kwa dziko la Italy wayamba dzulo. Ulendo wochoka ku Rome m’dziko Italy kufika m’dziko la Canada udatenga maola oposa khumi. Papa kulandiridwa ndi akauluakulu a dziko la Canada Atafika pa bwalo la ndege la Edmonton International, Papa Francisco adalandiridwa ndi maepiskopi a mpingo wa Katolika komanso akuluakulu a boma omwe adatsogoleredwa ndi nduna yaikulu ya dziko la Canada, Justin Trudeau. Papa Francisco wautchula ulendowu kukhala ulendo wa uzimu omwe cholinga chake ndi kulapa popeza iye apepesa kwa eni nthaka kaamba ka m’chitidwe woipa wochitira ana nkhanza omwe umachitika msukulu za m’dzikolo mzaka za m’ma 1900. Iye apepesa kaamba koti sukulu zambiri za dzikolo pa nthawiyo zimayendetsedwa ndi mpingo wa Katolika. Papa Francisco ali ndi chikhulupiriro kuti ulendowu uthandiza kubweretsa chimvano ndi kukhululukirana pakati pa mpingo wa Katolika ndi eni nthaka.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Mawa Ayamba Ulendo wa ku Canada
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco mawa (lamulungu) ayamba ulendo wokacheza m’dziko la Canada. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa akacheza m’dziko la Canada atayitanidwa ndi boma la dzikolo, maepiskopi a mpingo wa Katolika komanso eni nthaka a dzikolo. Ulendowu udzafika ku mapeto lachisanu pa 29 July, 2022. Ndege yomwe Papa Francisco akwere pa ulendo wake wokacheza m’dziko la Canada ikuyembekezeka kunyamuka pa bwalo la ndege  la Fiumicino International mu mzinda wa Rome nthawi ya 9 koloko m’mawa ndipo ikuyembekezeka kutera pa bwalo la ndege la Edmonton International m’dziko la Canada nthawi ya 11:20 ndi kulandiridwa ndi akuluakulu a boma komanso maepiskopi a mpingo wa Katolika a mdzikolo. Zina mwa zochitika za Papa Francisco ndi mkumano wake ndi eni nthaka a dzikoli, mkumano ndi akuluakulu a boma, kuyankhula kwa a kazembe oyimira maiko awo, kuchita Misa, kucheza ndi achinyamata komanso anthu achikulire, kupemphera limodzi ndi maepiskopi, ansembe, asisitere, a bulazala ndi asemino komanso kucheza ndi ansembe a chipani cha ma Jesuit. Pokonzekera ulendowa monga momwe achitira nthawi zonse pamene akupita kunja kwa dziko la Italy, lachisanu nthawi ya ku m’mawa Papa Francisco adapita kukapemphera mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Amayi Maria mu mzinda wa Rome, Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore. Ali mu tchalitchi m’menemu Papa’yu anapemphera pafupi ndi chithunzi cha Amayi Maria mtetezi wa anthu a mu mzinda wa Rome, Maria Salus Populi Romani kupempha uneneri wa Amayi Maria kuti ayende bwino komanso kuti ulendowu ukhale wopambana. Kumayambiriro a mwezi uno Papa Francisco amayembekezeka kukacheza m’maiko a Democratic Republic of Congo komanso South Sudan koma ulendowu adayamba awuyimitsa kaye kaamba koti pa nthawiyo Papa Francisco amavutika kwambiri mayendedwe kaamba ka vuto la bondo koma pano zinthu zili bwino. Mwa zina maulendowa amathandiza kuyatsa moto wa chikhulupiriro mu mitima ya akhristu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chakwera Wasankha Mkulu wa Apolisi Watsopano
news: M’tsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Lazarus Chakwera wasankha mkulu wa apolisi watsopano. Malinga ndi chikalata chomwe wasayina ndi mlembi wamkulu mu ofesi ya president ndi nduna, mayi Colleen Zamba, mtsogoleriyu wasankha mayi Merlyn Nachulu Yolamu kukhala mkulu wa apolisi m’dziko muno. Mkulu wa apolisi watsopano – mayi Yolamu Malinga ndi chikalatachi m’tsogoleri wa dziko linoyu wasankha mayiwa ndipo nyumba ya malamulo ndi yomwe ikuyenera kuwunika ndi kuvomereza mayiwa ngati kuli koyenera kuyamba kugwira ntchito zawo. Mayi Yolamu akulowa m’malo mwa Dr. George Kainja omwe mtsogoleriyu anawachotsa pa udindowu potsatira lipoti la bungwe la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) lomwe linasonyeza kuti a Kainja akuganiziridwa kuti akukhudzidwa ndi nkhani za katangale ndi mkulu wina ochita malonda otchedwa Zuneth Sattar. Mayi Yolamu omwe anabadwa mchaka cha 1965 ndi ochokera m’boma la Mchinji. Iwo ali ndi Masters degree of science in public policy and management yomwe anaipeza mchaka cha 2012.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Wokhudzidwa Ndi Kuwonongeka Kwa Chilengedwe
news: Mu uthenga wake wa chaka chino wa tsiku loganizira kufunika kosamala chilengedwe komanso kuyamika Mulungu kaamba ka mphatsoyi, World Day of Prayer for the Care of Creation, Papa Francisco wati ndi wokhudzidwa kwambiri kuti m’chitidwe owononga chilengedwe ukupitirabe. Iye wati poyang’ana chilengedwe pali zinthu ziwiri zomwe munthu sangaziphonye; poyamba kuyamika Mulungu kaamba ka mphatso ya chilengedwe komanso pa nthawi yomweyo kumva chisoni kaamba ka m’mene anthu akusakazira chilengedwe. Mu uthengawu, Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kowona chilengedwe ndi maso a uzimu. Iye wati kuonongeka kwa chilengedwe kwachititsa kuti nyama za ku tchire zisowe malo okhala komanso wati mvula ikumabwera yochepa kapena yowononga koma si pokhapo iye wati kuonongeka kwa chilengedwe kwabweretsa nyengo yotentha yomwe anthu mmbuyomu sadayiwonepo. Papa Francisco wati nthawi yakwana yoti maiko achitepo kanthu zinthu zisadafike poyipa. Iye adakhazikitsa tsiku loganizira chilengedwe ndi loyamika Mulungu kaamba ka mphatsoyi m’chaka cha 2015 ndipo m’chaka chomwechi ndi pomwe adalemba kalata yotchedwa Laudato Si yofotokoza za kufunika kosamala chilengedwe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alhomwe Apempha Chakwera Achitepo Kanthu Pa Mavuto Omwe Akukumana Nawo
news: Gulu la anthu a mtundu wa chilhomwe m’boma la Phalombe, lachiwiri linachita ziwonetsero zodandaula pa mavuto omwe akukumana nawo mdziko muno. Yemwe anatsogolera ziwonetserozi yemwenso ndi m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a bungwe la Mulhakho wa Alhomwe m’chigawo chakummwera kwa dziko lino, Blessings Makwinja, wati mchikalatacho muli madando atatu; loyamba lopempha mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera, kuti achitepo kanthu pa za uthenga omwe mzika ina ya dziko lino inatulutsa masiku apitawa,  wonyoza anthu a mtundu wa chilhomwe, kumanga Alhomwe pa nkhani zosadziwika bwino komanso kudandaula kuti boma la Tonse alliance likusala anthu a mtundu wa Chilhomwe posamawapatsa mwayi wochita nawo ntchito za malonda. Makwinja wati gulu lawo lidikira yankho kuchokera kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino, ndipo ngati saatero gulu lawo likachititsa ziwonetsero zina mu mzinda wa Blantyre masiku akubwerawa, asanakachite m’bindikiro ku nyumba ya mtsogoleri wa dziko lino mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Ndipo polankhula atalandira chikalatacho, bwanamkubwa wa boma la Phalombe Rhodrick Mateauma, wati chikalata chomwe walandirachi, achitumiza ku ofesi yoyenelera mwamsanga. Ziwonetserozi zinayambira pa malo ochitira malonda a Migowi kukafika ku ofesi za khonsolo ya Phalombe, omwe ndi mtunda wa ma kilomita khumi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Matenda a Nsomba Abuka ku Lilongwe
news: Unduna wa zaulimi waletsa kuweza komanso kugulitsa nsomba zochokera m’madera ena a m’boma la Lilongwe kutsatira nthenda ya nsomba yomwe yabuka m’bomalo. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu owona za umoyo wa ziweto ku unduna za zaulimi mdziko muno Dr. Gilson Njunga atsimikiza za nkhaniyi ndipo ati matendawa akhudza mtsinje wa Machetche komanso madamu osungira nsomba a mdera la zaulimi la Mitundu m’boma la Lilongwe. Iwo ati matendawa samakhudza umoyo wa anthu komabe alangiza anthu kuti apewe kudya nsomba zokhudzidwa ndi nthendayi kuti apewe nthenda ya kutsekula m’mimba yomwe ingadze chifukwa cha kudya nsomba-zi. “Tayimitsa kupha nsomba komsno kugulitsa m’madera onse okhudzidwa komanso ku malo kwawo kwa nsomba kukhale kwa chitetezo. Tiwapemphenso kuti asatenge zida zawo zomwe amagwiritsa ntchito popha nsomba m’maderawa ndi kukaphera ku madera ena,” anatero Dr. Njunga. Iwo ati kuyandama kwa nsomba, kusambira mofooka komanso zilonda za nsomba ndi zina mwa zizindikiro za matendawa ndipo matendawa akuti amakhudza kwambiri nsomba za mlamba komanso za munga umodzi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Mbava Zaba 60 Million Kwa Mzika Ya Mdziko la China ku Lilongwe
news: Anthu ena omwe sakudziwika aba ndalama zokwana 60-million-kwacha pa kampani ya Sino Sky ku Nathenje m’boma la Lilongwe. Wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi m’boma la Lilongwe, Inspector Hestings Chigalu wati umbavawu wachitika ku nyumba kwa mkulu wa kampaniyi yomwe imapanga miyala ya kwale ndipo mwini wake ndi mzika ya mdziko la China. Chigalu: Abanso mfuti yaing’ono Iye wati kupatula ndalamazi, mbavazi zabanso mfuti yomwe inali ndi zipolopolo 6 komanso lamya za m’manja ndi katundu wina. “Ndi zoonadi ife kuno ku Lilongwe tikusakasaka mbava zina zomwe zaba 60-million-kwacha komanso mfuti yaing’ono ndi zinthu zina kwa mzika ya dziko la China omwe ndi a Yizhong Cai. Umbava umenewu wachitika usiku wa pa 20 July 2022 cha mma 11 koloko,” anatero Inspector Chigalu. Mbavazi akuti zabanso hardrive yomwe mumasungidwa zojambulidwa za camera ya CCTV. Pamenepa mneneri wa apolisiyu wapempha anthu mdizko muno kuti apewe mchitidwe wosunga ndalama zochuluka mnyumba zawo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Anthu 76 Anjatidwa pa Ziwonetsero
news: Apolisi amanga anthu okwana 76 powaganizira kuti ndi omwe anayambitsa chipolowe pa ziwonetsero zomwe zinachitika lachitatu mu mzinda wa Lilongwe. Mneneri wa apolisi m’boma la Lilongwe Inspector Hestings Chigalu watsimikiza za nkhaniyi. Iye wati anthuwa amangidwa pa milandu ya umbava, kusonkhana mosatsata malamulo komanso kusamvera chigamulo cha bwalo la milandu. Ena mwa anthu omwe anachita ziwonetserozo “Ndi zoona tamanga anthu amenewa kaamba koti anachita zinthu zomwe ndi zosemphana ndi malamulo a dziko lino ndipo tikuwasuga mchitokosi chathu,” anatero Inspector Chigalu. Pamenepa iye wati kuchita ziwonetsero ndi ufulu wa munthu aliyense yemwe ndi mzika ya dziko lino koma kuti zimenezi zikuyenera kuchitika mosawononga katundu wa ena. Iye wati anthuwa akawonekera ku bwalo la milandu posachedwapa ndi kukayankha milandu yomwe apalamula. Padakalipano magulu ena komanso mabungwe omwe si a boma adzudzula kumangidwa kwa anthuwa ndipo apempha apolisi kuti atulutse anthuwa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Ntchito Yokonzanso Ulimi Wa Mthirira Kunsi Kwa Mtsinje Wa Shire Yayamba
news: Unduna wa za chuma ndi mapulani a chitukuko wati wakondwa ndi m’mene ikuyendera ntchito yobwezeretsa ngalande yodutsa madzi a Ulimi wa mthilira yomwe ikuchitika ndi bungwe la Shire Valley Transformation Programme m’maboma a Chikwawa ndi Nsanje. Poyankhula atayendera ntchito yomanganso gawo loyamba la ngalandeyi ku Kapichira m’boma la Chikwawa, mlembi wamkulu mu unduna owona za mapulani a chitukuko Winford Masanjala anati ali ndi chiyembekezo kuti ndalama zomwe boma lapeza kudzera ku abwenzi a pologalamuyi zithandiza kuti ntchitoyi iyende mwachangu komanso mwaukadaulo. Iye wati posatira namondwe wa Ana yemwe anawononga mbali ina ya gawo la ngalande ya madziyi, ntchitoyi ichedwerapo ndi chaka chimodzi komanso isowa ndalama zina zowonjezera zomwe akuti zipezeka mu nthawi yake. Ndipo poyankhula m’malo mwa akuluakulu owona za ntchito yomanga ngalandeyi Martin Chizalema anati padakali pano ntchitoyi yayambanso kuyenda bwino maka mu ngalande yodutsira madzi yomwe ndi yotalika mtunda wa makilomita 6 kuchokera mu mtsinje wa Shire. Motero Chizalema anati chatsala pano ndi kukonzanso khoma lotchinga damu la Kapichira pomwe atengere madzi yomwe akugwira limodzi ndi kampani yopanga magetsi ya EGENCO. Padakali pano ntchito zina zophunzitsa alimi ang’onoang’ono za m’mene angazapindulire ndi ntchito za ulimi m’madera omwe mudutse ngalandeyi, komanso umwini wa malo ndinso kusamalira chilengedwe zikupitirira ku derali. Ntchitoyi igwiridwa magawo atatu ndipo ikulandira thandizo la ndalama kuchokera ku banki yayikulu pa dziko la pansi (World bank), banki ya mu Afrika, bungwe lowona za mafuta OPEC fund ndinso boma la Malawi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akupemphelera Anthu a Mdziko la Sri Lanka
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco watsimikizira anthu a m’dziko la Sri Lanka za mapemphero ake pomwe dzikolo likudutsa m’mavuto aakulu. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wati akugwirizana ndi atsogoleri a mipingo m’dzikolo omwe apempha anthu kuti apewe kuchita zipolowe ndi kulimbikitsa kukambirana. Papa Francisco wapempha atsogoleri a dzikolo kuti apeze njira yabwino yothetsera mavuto a za chuma a m’dzikolo odza kaamba ka m’chitidwe wa katangale ndi kusakaza chuma omwe achititsa kuti kwa nthawi yaitali anthu akhale akuchita zipolowe zosonyeza kusakondwa kwao. Masiku apitawa mtsogoleri wa dzikolo Gotabaya Rajapaksa adathawa m’dzikolo ndipo lachisanu lapitali nyumba ya malamulo m’dzikolo idatsimikiza ndi kuvomereza kuti mtsogoleriyu watuladi pansi udindo wake. Nyumba ya malamuloyi ikuyembekezeka kusankha mtsogoleri wa tsopano wa dzikolo posachedwapa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wauza Anthu Apemphelere Ulendo Wake waku Canada
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha mapemphero opempherera ulendo wake wokacheza m’dziko la Canada. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco wapereka pempholi lamulungu ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican. Iye wapempha a Katolika pa dziko lonse kuti amuikize m’mapemphero. “Pano pomwe kwangotsala masiku ochepa kuti ndipite m’dziko la Canada ndi kupempha mapemphero anu kuti ulendowu uthandize kubweretsa machiritso ndi kukhululuka m’mitima ya eni nthaka a m’dzikolo,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati sakukayika za chiyanjano ndi kukhululuka kwa eni nthaka a dzikolo chifukwa cha zokambirana zomwe zakhala zilipo pakati pa iwo ndi Mpingo wa Katolika. Ali m’dzikolo Papa Francisco akacheza m’mizinda ya Edmonton, Québec ndi Iqaluit. Zina mwa zochitika za Papa Francisco ndi nkumano wake ndi eni nthaka a dzikolo, nkumano ndi akuluakulu a boma, kulankhula kwa a kazembe oimira maiko awo, diplomatic corps, kuchita Misa, kucheza ndi achinyamata komanso anthu achikulire, kupemphera limodzi ndi ma episkopi, ansembe, asisitere, a bulazala ndi a semino ndipo monga ambiri akudziwa kuti Papa Francisco ndi Papa woyamba wa chipani cha ma Jesuit iye akachitanso nkumano ndi ansembe a chipani cha ma Jesuit, Society of Jesus. Chikhalireni pa mpando wa u Papa, Papa Francisco wayenda ma ulendo 34 kunja kwa dziko la Italy komanso wacheza kale m’maiko 54.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: MAWU A LAMULUNGU LA 16 PA CHAKA
news: Tizionetsa chikondi choona pa zochita zathu Chaka C Psalter Week IV Liturgical Vestment: G 17 July 2022 NYIMBO YOLOWERA Salimo 54: 4, 6 Komatu Mulungu ndiye amandithandiza, Ambuye ndiwo amachirikiza moyo wanga. Ndidzapereka nsembe kwa Inu mwaufulu. Ndidzatamanda dzina lanu, Inu Chauta, popeza ndinu abwino.
