PEMPHERO LOYAMBIRIRA Inu Ambuye, onetsani ubwino wanu kwa atumiki anu, ndipo mwachifundo chanu, muchulukitse mphatso za chaulere chanu, kuti atalimbikitsidwa m’chiyembekezo, chikhulupiriro ndi m’chikondi, akhale tcheru nthawi zonse posunga malamulo anu. Mwa Yesu Khristu, Ambuye ndi Mulungu wathu, amene ali ndi moyo ndi ufumu limodzi nanu ndi Mzimu Woyera, tsopano ndi panthawi zosatha. MAU OYAMBA Genesesi 18: 1-10a Mau a m’Buku la Genesesi Mbuyanga, chonde musapitirire pakhomo pa mtumiki wanu. Chauta adaonekera Abrahamu ku mitengo ya thundu ya ku Mamure ija. Abrahamuyo atakhala pa khomo la hema lake nthawi yamasana kutatentha, mwadzidzidzi adangoona anthu atatu ataimirira potero. Atangowaona, adanyamuka mwamsanga kukawalonjera. Adaweramitsa mutu, nati, “Mbuyanga, ngati ndapeza kuyanja pamaso panu, chonde musapitirire pakhomo pa mtumiki wanu. Ndikupatseni madzi kuti mutsuke mapazi. Mungathe kubapuma patsinde pa mtengo pano. Ine tsopano ndikatenga chakudya, kuti mukadya mupeze mphamvu zopitirizira ulendo wanu. Mwabwera pakhomo panga pano, motero ndiyenera kukutumikirani.” Anthuwo adayankha kuti, “Chabwino, uchite monga waneneramo.” Abrahamu adalowa msangamsanga m’hema, nauza Sara kuti “Utenge msanga nsengwa zitatu za ufa wosalala, uukande ndi kupanga buledi.” Pamenepo Abrahamu adathamanga nakatenga mwanawang’ombe wonenepa, nampereka kwa wantchito kuti akonze mwamsanga. Kenaka adatenga chambiko ndi mkaka wokama chatsopano, ndi nyama yokonzakonza ija nawapatsa zonsezo. Iye adakhala potero pamene anthuwo analikudya patsinde pa mtengo. Tsono anthuwo adafunsa Abrahamu kuti, “Kodi mkazi wako Sara ali kuti?” Abrahamu adayankha kuti, “Ali m’hemamu.” Chauta adati, “Ndikukulonjeza kuti pakapita miyezi isanu ndi inai ndidzabweranso, ndipo mkazi wako adzakhala ali ndi mwana wamwamuna.” Sara ankangomvetsera ali kuseri kwa chitseko cha hema. Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu. Nyimbo ya Salimo Sal 15:2-5 Ch. Anthu olungama adzayenda pamaso pa Mulungu. Ndi munthu amene amayenda mosalakwa, amene amachita zolungama nthaŵi zonse, amene amalankhula zinthu ndi mtima woona. Ch. Anthu olungama adzayenda pamaso pa Mulungu. Ndi amene sasinjirira ndipo sachita anzake zoipa, kapena kumafalitsa mbiri yoipa ya anzake. Ndi amene amanyoza munthu womkana Mulungu, koma amalemekeza anthu omvera Chauta. Ndi amene amachitadi zimene walonjeza, ngakhale zikhale zoŵaŵa chotani. Ch. Anthu olungama adzayenda pamaso pa Mulungu. Ndi amene sakongoza ndalama zake kuti alandire chiwongoladzanja, amene salandira chiphuphu kuti azunze munthu wosalakwa. Ch. Anthu olungama adzayenda pamaso pa Mulungu. MAU ACHIWIRI Akolose 1:24-28 Mau a m’Kalata ya Paulo Woyera kwa Akolose Mauwo ndi chinsinsi chozama chimene chinali chobisika chikhalire kwa mibadwo yonse Tsopano ndakondwa kuti ndikukuvutikirani. Pakuti pakumva zoŵaŵazo, ndikutsiriza m’thupi mwanga zotsala za masautso a Khristu kuthandiza thupi lake, ndiye kuti Mpingo. Ndipo ine ndine mtumiki wa Mpingowu, pakuti Mulungu ndiye adandipatsa ntchitoyi yoti ndikulalikireni kwathunthu mau ake. Mauwo ndi chinsinsi chozama chimene chinali chobisika chikhalire kwa mibadwo yonse, koma tsopano Mulungu wachiwululira anthu ake. Cholinga cha Mulungu ndi cha kudziŵitsa anthuwo kukoma kwake kwa chinsinsicho ndi ulemerero wake pakati pa anthu akunja. Chinsinsicho nchakuti Khristu ali mwa inu, ndipo Iye amakupatsani chiyembekezo cha kudzalandira ulemerero. Khristuyo ndiye amene timamlalika. Timachenjeza ndi kuphunzitsa munthu aliyense ndi nzeru zonse zimene tili nazo. Pakuti tikufuna kusandutsa munthu aliyense kuti akhale wangwiro mwa Khristu. Mau a Ambuye. Tithokoze Mulungu Nyimbo ya Mthenga Woyera Alleluia. Ngodala anthu amene amamva mau a Mulungu, nawasunga mu mtimwa woona ndi wabwino, ndipo amalimbikira mpaka kubereka zipatso. Aleluya. MTHENGA WOYERA Luka 10:38-42 Mau a Mthenga Woyera monga adalembera Luka Marita adamlandira Yesu kunyumba kwake. Maria ndiye wasankhula chinthu chopambana. Pamene Yesu ndi ophunzira ake anali pa ulendo wao, Iye adalowa m’mudzi wina. Tsono mai wina, dzina lake Marita, adamlandira kunyumba kwake. Iyeyu anali ndi mng’ono wake, dzina lake Maria, amene adaadzakhala pansi ku mapazi a Ambuye, namamva mau ake. Koma Marita ankatanganidwa ndi ntchito zambiri. Choncho adapita kwa Yesu nati, “Ambuye, kodi simukusamalako kuti mng’ono wangayu akundilekera ndekha ntchito? Muuzeni adzandithandize.” Ambuye adati, “Iwe Marita iwe, ukutekeseka nkuvutika ndi zinthu zambiri, koma chofunika nchimodzi chokha. Maria ndiye wasankhula chinthu chopambana, ndipo chimenechi palibe wina angamlande ai.” Mthenga wa Ambuye. Ulemu kwa Inu Ambuye Yesu Khristu ULALIKI Abale ndi alongo okondedwa mwa Ambuye. Lero ndi lamulungu la nambala 16 pa chaka. Pali mitu yambiri imene tikhoza kusankha potsata mfundo zosiyanasiyana zopezeka m’mau a Mulungu amene tawerenga. Koma ife lero tasankha mutu wakuti: Tizikonda kukhala pafupi ndi Yesu. Mutu umenewu tausankha kuchokera mu Mthenga Wabwino walero pomwe tikumva Ambuye Yesu akuyamikira Maria chifukwa chosankha kukhala pansi pamapazi ake. Mau oyamba ochokera m’buku la Genesesi, tamva za mmene Abrahamu adasamalira alendo atatu. Panthawi ya Abrahamu, kusamalira alendo chidali chinthu chopambana kwambiri, koma iye adazindikira kuti ndi Mulungu amene adabwera ku nyumba kwake. Abrahamu adawasamalira bwino powapatsa chakudya ndiponso malo oti apumule. “Mbuyanga, ngati ndapeza kuyanja pamaso panu, chonde musapitirire pakhomo pa mtumiki wanu. Ndikupatseni madzi kuti mutsuke mapazi. Mungathe kubapuma patsinde pa mtengo pano. Ine tsopano ndikatenga chakudya, kuti mukadya mupeze mphamvu zopitirizira ulendo wanu” (Genesesi 18:4-5). Chifukwa cha chimenechi, Mulungu adalonjeza mphatso ya mwana kwa Sara mkazi wake amene adali opanda mwana mpaka mu ukalamba wake. Mau oyamba akutilimbikitsa kuti tizilandira alendo bwino bwino popanda kusankha. Abrahamu ndi Sara mkazi wake analandira madalitso chifukwa chakulandira alendo bwino kunyumba kwawo. Anthu ambiri timalephera kulandira madalitso chifukwa chakusalandira bwino alendo kunyumba kwathu. Gwero lakusalandira bwino alendo limakhala kudzikonda ndiponso umbombo. Mau achiwiri a m’kalata ya Paulo Woyera yolembera a Kolose, iye adalembera akhristuwa ali mu ndende. Iye sakutaya mtima chifukwa cha masautso amene akukomana nawo ayi, koma akusangalala chifukwa akumva zowawa chifukwa cha chikhulupiriro chake mwa Yesu Khristu. Iye akuchita ngati kuchitira umboni masautso amene Yesu adakomana nawo mpaka kutifera pa mtanda ndipo pakuuka kwa akufa, adatipulumutsa ife tonse pa dziko lino lapansi. Paulo akuona masautso amene akukomana nawo potumikira Ambuye Yesu ngati njira imodzi yogawana naye Ambuye Yesuyo masautso ake. Ifenso titakhala ndi maso a chikhulupiriro monga amene anali nawo Paulo Woyera, titha kumaona mavuto amene timakomana nawo ngati njira imodzi yolumikizana ndi masautso a Ambuye Yesu. Papa Yohane Paulo adalemba kalata yotchedwa Salvifici Doloris kuthanthauza kuti Masautso Odzetsa Chipulumutso. Monga momwe masautso a Ambuye Yesu adatsetsa chipulumutso kwa ife tonse, ifenso masautso athu ngati tiwalandira ndi mtima wachikhulupiriro, chiyembekezo ndi chikondi, amabweretsa chipulumutso kwa ife eni komanso kwa anthu ena. Mau oyamba, taona mmene Abrahamu adamulandirira Mulungu ngati mulendo wake kudzera nkulandira bwino anthu osadziwika. Mthenga Wabwino taonanso mmene Maria ndi Marita adamulandirira Yesu ngati mulendo wao. Choncho mu njira yapadera, mau oyamba ndi mau a m’Mthenga Wabwino akugwirizana pa nkhani yolandira bwino alendo koma koposaposa pa nkhani yolandira Mulungu pomutsekulira zitseko za mitima yathu. Mulungu nthawi zonse amafuna kukhala nafe. Koma samatikakamiza kuti alowe m’nyumba mwathu momwe muli mu mtima mwathu. Amatipatsa ufulu wochuluka wosankha kumutsekulira iye zitseko za mitima yathu kapena ayi. Mphunzitsi wina wa za mau a Mulungu adanena kuti, chotsekulira chitseko cha mtima wathu chimakhala m’kati. Motero Yesu akagogoda sangathe kutsekula ndikulowa kuchokera kunja ngati ifeyo eniake sitimtsekulira chitsekocho chifukwa chotsekulira chake chili m’kati. Mthenga Wabwino lero tikumva kuti Yesu ali paulendo wochokera ku Galilea kupita ku Yerusalemu ku chaka cha Pasaka. Mzinda wa Galilea uli ku mpoto ndipo mzinda wa Yerusalemu uli ku mmwera kwa dziko la Israele. Choncho mukamayenda kuchokera ku mpoto kupita ku Mmwera mumachita ngati kutsetsereka koma mukatengera mapu muona kuti mumakwera mtunda popita ku Mmwera kumene ndi ku Yerusalemu. Ku Kafaranao kumene Yesu amakhala ndi pafupifupi ma mitala 208 below sea level pamene ku Yerusalemu ndi pafupifupi mamitala 780 above sea level. Mtunda wochokera ku Kafaranao kupita ku Yerusalemu ndi wa makilomitala 136. Fanizo la Msamaria wachifundo lomwe tinamva Lamulungu latha ndi nkhani ya Marita ndi Maria yomwe tikumva mu Mthenga Wabwino walero, zikupezeka mu Mthenga Woyera monga adalembera Luka basi. Mateo, Marko ondi Yohane sanalembe nkhani zimenezi. Nkhani ya Mfarisi wachifundo ikutilimbikitsa kuti tizitanganidwa ndikugwira ntchito zachifundo. Ndipo nkhani ya Marita ndi Maria ikutilimbikitsa kuti tizitanganidwa ndikupemphera. Njira zonsezi nzofunika m’moyo wa mkhristu aliyense tsiku ndi tsiku. Lero tamva kuti Maria adakhala pansi kumvetsera Mau a Mulungu. “Tsono mai wina, dzina lake Marita, adamlandira kunyumba kwake. Iyeyu anali ndi mng’ono wake, dzina lake Maria, amene adaadzakhala pansi ku mapazi a Ambuye, namamva mau ake” (Luka 10: 38-39). Inu ndi ine moyo wathu wauzimu kuti ukule pafunika nthawi zambiri kumapeza nthawi ndikukhala pansi kumapazi a Ambuye Yesu nkumamvetsera mau ake. Ichi chikuthanthauza kuti tiyenera kumapeza nthawi ya kusinkhasinkha mau a Mulungu. Vuto lathu masiku ano ndikuti chifukwa chakuti mitima yathu ndi yodzadza ndi phokoso losiyanasiyana, timalephera kukhala phee ife tokha ndi Ambuye athu. Zimaoneka nthawi zina kuti pambuyo pakulandira Ukaristia, ansembe athu akatipempha kuti tikhale chete pakanthawi kuti tisinkhesinkhe ndipo ticheze ndi Ambuye Yesu, timalephera ndipo a kwayala kenaka amayambitsa nyimbo. Anthu ambiri timachita mantha ndi kukhala chete kumamvetsera zimene Mulungu akutiuza chifukwa timaopa kuti mwina atiuza zoti tisiye makhalidwe akutiakuti amene timawakonda kwambiri. Komanso koposaposa ife atumiki a Mulungu ndi alaliki tiyenera kawirikawiri kumachita ngati Maria pakukhala pafupi ndi Ambuye Yesu kumvetsera zoti atiuze kuti tikalalike. Kawirikawiri tilibe nthawi yosinkhasinkha mau a Mulungu ndipo zotsatira zake mmalo mwake timangokabwebweta maganizo athu ndi nthano kapena nkhani zosiyanasiyana zopanda pake ndi zosagwirizana konse ndi mau a Mulungu amene awerengedwa tsikulo. Yesu adali osangalala kwambiri ndi Maria chifukwa adasankha chinthu chopambana kwambiri, ndiko kumvetsera Mau a Mulungu. Nafenso tiyenera kusankha kumvetsera Mau a Mulungu ndi kuwagwiritsa ntchito. Sikuti Marita adalakwa potanganidwa ndi ku khitchini ayi, koma phunziro ndilakuti, sitiyenera kutanganidwa ndi zinthu zapansi pano zokha ayi koma tiyeneranso kutanganidwa ndi zinthu za Kumwamba monga Maria adachitira. Tamva kuti, “Ambuye adati, “Iwe Marita iwe, ukutekeseka nkuvutika ndi zinthu zambiri, koma chofunika nchimodzi chokha. Maria ndiye wasankhula chinthu chopambana, ndipo chimenechi palibe wina angamlande ai” (Luka 10: 40). Momwemonso inu ndi ine tiyenera kusankha chinthu chopambana kwambiri, ndiye kukhala pafupi ndi Mulungu nthawi zonse za moyo wathu, pamavuto kapena pa mtendere. Kukhala pansi kumapazi a Ambuye Yesu ndiye kukhala munthu wokonda kupemphera. Kukhala pansi ku mapazi a Ambuye Yesu ndiye kukhala munthu wokonda kukhazikitsa ubale weniweni ndi Ambuye Yesu ngati bwenzi lathu lenileni la pa mtima tsiku ndi tsiku osangodalira kanthawi kochepa kamene ife timakhala kumvetsera mau a Mulungu kutchalitchi pa tsiku la Mulungu ayi. Koma tsiku lililonse kupeza mpata nkumakhala pansi kumapazi a Ambuye Yesu nkumamva mau ake. Ndibwino ndithu kumapeza mpata wokhala phe pawekha kusinkha nkumadzifunsa kuti ndine ndani? Ndikuchokera kuti? Ndikupita kuti? Mu mtima mwanga muli nkhondo kapena mtendere? Munthu wanzeru kwambiri wachigriki dzina lake Socrates adanena mau amphamvu akuti, “Moyo wosasinkhasinkha ndi moyo wopanda phindu.” Ambiri mwa ife moyo wathu watsiku ndi tsiku ndi moyo wosakhazikika koma womangodzithawa wekha basi!! Tinenetse pano kuti Ambuye Yesu poyamikira Maria kuti anasankha chinthu chopambana sizikuthanthauza kuti Marita analakwa potekeseka ndi za moyo wa thupi ndipo Maria anapambana potekeseka ndi moyo wauzimu ayi. Mwa njira ina tithanso kuyerekeza asisitere kapena ansembe amene amabindikira ndi amene sali obindikira poganiza kuti obindikira aja ndi amene akuchita bwino kuposa amene sabindikira. Maria ndi Marita onsewa akuchita ntchito yabwino koma vuto limene liri ndi Marita ndi kutanganidwa kwambiri ndi zinthu zapansi pano mpakana kufika pomuchitira nsanje mbale wake amene anatekeseka ndi zinthu zauzimu. Katikisimu wa Katolika amatiphunzitsa kuti munthu ndi thupi ndi mzimu pamodzi. Choncho zonse ziwiri ziyenera kusamaliridwa moyenera ndi mokwanira. Chofunika kwambiri m’moyo wa munthu ndikuchita chotheka kuti Marita ndi Maria azipezeka m’oyo mwake. Azitanganidwa inde posamalira moyo wake wathupi, koma asamayiwalenso kutanganidwa ndikusamalira moyo wake wauzimu. Vuto ndilakuti nthawi zina timatanganidwa zedi ndi za Mulungu koma kuyiwala kutanganidwa ndi Mulungu mwini wakeyo. Pakati pa zinthu zabwino zochuluka, tiyenera kusankhula Mulungu yekha basi. Mulungu yekha azikhala patsogolo nthawi zonse!! Chidwi chathu cha tsiku ndi tsiku chiyenera kukhala chofunafuna Ufumu wa Kumwamba. Ngwazo wathu sabata ino ukhale woyankha mafunso awa: Kodi ndimapeza mpata wokwanira kucheza ndi Mulungu ndikusinkhasinkha za moyo wanga wathupi ndi wauzimu? Kodi ndimapeza mpata kupemphera mapemphero a m’mawa ndi madzulo? Kodi ndimapemphera pakudya? Kodi ndikalandira Ukaristia, ndimapeza mpata womupembedza Ambuye Yesu wokhala mu Ukaristia? Kodi pa chaka chathunthu ndimapeza mpata wokhala nawo pa mbindikiro wauzimu ku parish kwathu kapena ku mphakati kwathu? Kodi ndimapeza mpata wokasonkhana nawo ku mphakati kwathu? Kodi ndimapeza mpata wophunzitsa ana anga moyo wamapemphero? Kodi kunyumba kwanga munthu aliyense ali nalo buku la Malembo Oyera? Nanga ineyo kapena banja langa timawerenga buku Loyeralo? Amen Ine ndimvera Mulungu mmodzi yekha… Mapemphero a Akhristu Abale, Mulungu walankhula nafe kudzera mwa Mwana wake. Ifenso tsopano timuuze mau athu ndi madandaulo athu, kudzera mwa Yesu Khristu yemweyo: 1. Tipempherere ansembe ndi akulu a mpingo onse, kuti asaleke kusinkhasinkha mau a Mulungu motero apeze mphamvu zosenzera ntchito yao molimbika. Tikupemphani, mutivomereze. 2. Tipempherere anthu onse amene sadamvebe za Yesu Khristu, kuti atsekule mitima yao ndi kumamvera zimene Mulungu awauza kudzera mwa Mzimu Woyera. Tikupemphani, mutivomereze. 3. Tipempherere anyamata ndi atsikana amene Mulungu awaitana ku unsembe kapena ku zipani, kuti akhale ndi mtima wokonda kucheza ndi Ambuye Yesu kawirikawiri. Tikupemphani, mutivomereze. 4. Tidzipempherere ife tomwe, kuti tizolowere kumawerenga Mthenga Wabwino m’mabanja mwathu, tizilandira Ambuye kunyumba kwathu tsiku lililonse. Tikupemphani, mutivomereze. Atate okoma mtima, mutiphunzitse kuchita chidwi ndi mau onse amene mulankhula, ndipo mutithandize kuwagwiritsa ntchito, kuti mayendedwe athu akhale okomera Inu. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. PEMPHERO LOPEREKERA Inu Mulungu, podzera m’nsembe yanu yangwiro imodzi yokha, mudafikitsa pake penipeni nsembe zosiyanasiyana za m’Chipangano Chakale; tikukupemphani, mulandire nsembe iyi, yochokera kwa atumiki anu okhulupirika, ndipo muiyeretse monga mudadalitsira zopereka za Abele, kuti zonse zimene aliyense wapereka ku ulemerero wa dzina lanu, zimpindulire chipulumutso. NYIMBO YOLANDIRIRA Salimo 111: 4-5 Chauta, wokoma mtima ndi wachifundo, amakumbukira chipangano chake nthawi zonse. Amapatsa chakudya anthu womuopa. Kapena: Chivumbulutso 3: 20 Ndaima pakhomo panu, ndipo ndikugogoda. Wina akamva mau anga, nkutsekula chitseko, ndilowa ndipo Ine ndi iye tidyera limodzi. PEMPHERO LOTHOKOZERA Inu Ambuye, tikukupemphani kuti mukhale pafupi ndi anthu anu, ndi kuwatsogolera iwo amene mwawadalitsa ndi misteri za kumwamba kuti asiye makhalidwe awo akale ndi kuyamba moyo watsopano. Mwa Khristu Ambuye athu. PEMPHERO LOTSIRIZA (Pa msonkhano wamapemphero) Mulungu Atate anthu, mwatikumbutsa lero kuti tiyenera kupeza nthawi yocheza nanu, ngakhale mwina timakhala otanganidwa ndi ntchito zambiri. Mutiphunzitse kukhazika bata m’mitima mwathu, makamaka pa nthawi yopemphera, kuti mau anu alowe ndi kugwira ntchito m’mitima mwahu masiku onse. Mwa Yesu Khristu Ambuye athu. title: Mabungwe Ayikira Kumbuyo Boma Pokhwimitsa Chilango pa Milandu Yowononga Chilengedwe
news: Mabungwe omwe si a boma omwe amagwira ntchito yoteteza zachilengedwe, ayikira kumbuyo ganizo la boma lakuti anthu amene apalamula milandu yokhudza kuwononga chilengedwe adzilandira chilango chokhwima. Polankhula pa msonkhano wa atolankhani mu mzinda wa Blantyre m’malo mwa mabungwe omwe akugwira ntchitoyi m’dziko muno, a Herbert Mwalukomo omwe ndi mkulu woyendetsa bungwe la Centre for Environmental Policy and Advocacy (CEPA), ati malamulo omwe adasindikizidwa ndi boma m’chaka cha 2020 a Forestry Amendment Act omwe akhala akuzungulira m’masamba a mchezo masiku apitawa akulimbikitsa kwambiri kuti zilango zomwe anthu angapatsidwe powononga chilengedwe popanda chilolezo zikhale zofanana ndi kukula kwa milandu yomwe anthu angapalamule. Anthu ngati awa akapezeka akuti adzilipira 5 million kwacha Mabungwewa ati sizoona kuti boma laletsa anthu m’dziko muno kugwiritsa ntchito makala koma kuti makalawa azipangidwa ndi anthu okhawo omwe ali ndi chilorezo komanso iwo ati ndi cholinga chawo kuti boma lilimbikitse njira zina zomwe zingathandize kuteteza chilengedwe. Pothilirapo ndemanga pa maganizo oti boma likanayamba lapeza kaye kapena kulimbikitsa njira zina zomwe anthu angamagwiritse ntchito pofuna kuphika lisanayambe kugwiritsa ntchito malamulowa, mabungwewa ati ndi zoona njira zina zomwe anthu angamagwiritse ntchito pofuna kuphika ndi zochepa koma sikuti njirazi palibe. Masiku apitawa m’masamba a mchezo munadzadza nkhani yokhudza malamulo omwe boma linapanga mchaka cha 2020 omwe tsopano akufuna akhazikitsidwe ndi kuyamba kugwira ntchito. Zina mwa zilango zomwe zili m’malamulo atsopanowa ndi monga akuti munthu amene wapezeka akugula kapena kuguloitsa Makala adzilipira chindapusa cha ndalama zokwana 5 million kwacha kapena kukakhala ku ndende kwa zaka khumi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Amayi Atatu Kukhala Mamembala a Bungwe Lowunika za Maepiskopi
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wasankha amayi atatu kukhala mamembala a bungwe lomwe limaunika anthu oyenera kukhala ma episkopi. Polankhula ndi mtolankhani wina masiku apitawa, Papa Francisco adati asankha amayi angapo kukhala mamembala a bungwe la ku likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ku Vatican lomwe limaunika anthu oyenera kukhala a episkopi pa dziko lonse la pansi. Amayi omwe asankhidwa m’maundindowa Ndipo lero lachitatu pa 13 July, Papa Francisco wakwaniritsa zomwe adanenazi posankha amayi atatu kukhala mamembala a bungweli. Amayiwa ndi Sister Raffaella Petrini omwe amagwira ntchito ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican, Sister Yvonne Reungoat omwe adakhalapo mkulu wa chipani cha asisitere cha Daughters of Mary Help of Christians pa dziko lonse la pansi komanso Papa’yu wasankha Dr. Maria Lia Zervino yemwe ndi President wa World Union of Catholic Women. Aka ndi koyamba mu mbiri ya Mpingo wa Katolika kuti Papa Francisco asankhe amayi kukhala ma membala a bungwe lomwe limaunika anthu omwe ali ndi zowayenereza kukhala a episkopi. Koma si pokhapo aka ndi koyamba kuti Papa Francisco asankhe m’modzi mwa akhristu eni ake, the laity, koma yemwe ndi mayi kukhala membala wa bungweli. Awa si amayi oyamba omwe Papa Francisco wawasankha mu ma udindo akuluakulu ku Vatican. Iye adasankha mayi Cristiane Murray yemwe ndi wachiwiri kwa mkuiu woyendetsa ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican, Holy See Press Office komanso Francesca di Giovanni yemwe ndi wachiwiri kwa mlembi mu ofesi yoona za ubale wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika ndi maiko ena, Secretariat for Relations with States and International Organizations pongotchula zitsanzo zochepa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wasankha Episkopi Watsopano Wa Dayosizi Ya New Ulm Ku America
news: Lachiwiri, likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza kuti Papa Francisco wasankha episkopi watsopano wa dayosizi ya New Ulm ku Minnesota m’dziko la America. Zadziwika kuti episkopi watsopanoyu ndi Ambuye Chad Zielinski omwe adali kutsogolera dayosizi ya Fairbanks. Ambuye Zielenski pa mkumano wawo wa m’mbuyomu ndi Papa Francisko Dayosizi ya New Ulm yakhala yopanda episkopi kuyambira mwezi wa August m’chaka cha 2020 pomwe Ambuye John LeVoir adapuma. Ambuye Zielinski omwe ali ndi zaka 57 zakubadwa akhala ali episkopi wa dayosizi ya Fairbanks kuyambira m’chaka cha 2014. Iwo adzawakhazikitsa kukhala episkopi wa dayosizi ya New Ulm pa 27 September chaka chino. Kwa zaka khumi ndi ziwiri (12) asadakhale episkopi, Ambuye Zielinski adali woyang’anira asilikali owulutsa ndege, Air Force Chaplain. Dayosizi ya New Ulm ili ndi ma parish 59 ndipo ili ndi a Katolika osachepera 51,000. Ambuye Zielinski omwe adabadwa m’chaka cha 1964 ku Detroit, Michigan adadzodzedwa kukhala wansembe m’chaka cha 1996. Ku Malawi, mpingo wa katolika ku dayosizi ya Zomba ukudikirira za yemwe Papa Francisco angamusankhe kukhala episkopi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Njovu Zolusa Zapha Anthu Atatu ku Kasungu
news: Njovu zolusa zapha anthu atatu okhala m’madera ozungulira nkhalamgo ya Kasungu National Park m’boma la Kasungu. Mkulu wa nthambi yowona za nyama zakutchire a Brighton Kumchedwa atsimikiza za nkhaniyi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi. Iwo ati njovuzi zomwe zilipo ziwiri, zikuganiziridwa kuti ndi zina mwa zomwe zasamutsidwa posachedwapa kuchokera ku nkhalango ya Liwonde National Park. Njovu mu nkhalango ya Kasungu “Njovuzi zilipo ziwiri. Ina inalowera mbali yaku Nkhamenya komwe yapha anthu awiri ndipo ina yalowera mbali yaku Mchinji komwe yapha munthu m’modzi,” anatero a Kumchedwa. Iwo ati padakalipano njovu yomwe inalowera mbali yaku Nkhamenya yaphedwa ndipo yatsala imodziyo. Pdakalipano iwo apempha anthu amene akukhala madera oyandikira nkhalangoyi kuti akhale tcheru ponena kuti njovuzi zidakalia ndi chilendo ku malowa. “Njovu ndi zovuta choncho akaziwona asazitahmangire kuti aziphe okha ayi atiwuze ifeyo chifukwa m’mene zateremu zili ndi chilendo ndipo zikufuna zitabwelera komwe zachokera,” anatsindika motero a Kumchedwa. Posachedwapa nthawi yowona za nyama zakutchire inayamba ntchito yosamutsa njovu kuchokera ku Liwonde National Park kupita nazo ku Liwonde National Park ndipo ntchito siyinathe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ACB Iwuza Anthu Atenge Udindo Olimbana ndi Katangale
news: Bungwe lothana ndi mchitidwe wa katangale mdziko muno, la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) lati ndi udindo wa aliyense kutengapo mbali pothetsa katangale mdziko muno. Wachiwiri kwa mkulu wa bungweli a Eliah Bodole anena izi lolemba m’boma la Dedza pa mwambo wokumbukira tsiku lothana ndi mchitidwe wa katangale muno mu Africa limene pachingerezi akulitcha Africa Anti-Corruption Day). Ena mwa anthu omwe anatenga nawo gawo pa tsikuli Iwo ati nthambi zonse za boma komanso mabungwe akuyenera kugwira ntchito zawo moyenera posayembekera kulandira chiwongola dzanja, komaso kuti mzika sizikuyenera kupereka dipo lililonse pa ntchito imene adindo akuyenera kuyigwira mwaulere. “Tikuyenera kusintha kaganizidwe kuti ntchito za boma zipitilire kuyenda bwino chifukwa mchitidwe wa katangale ukubwezeretsa chitukuko m’mbuyo,” anatero a Bodole. Poyankhulapo bwanankubwa wa boma la Dedza a Emmanuel Bambe ati khonsolo yawo iwonetsetsa kuti nthambi zonse za boma zikutumikira anthu moyenera ndi mosakondera pofuna kuthana ndi mchitidwe wa katangale. Tsiku la Africa Anti-corruption day linakhazikitsidwa ndi atsogoleri a maiko a muno mu Africa ndi cholinga choti aziganizirapo nkhani za katangale ndi kutengapo gawo pofuna kuthana ndi mchitidwewu. Tsikuli limakumbukiridwa pa 11 July chaka chilichonse.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akuyembekezeka Kukhazikitsa Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba Kukhala Wodala
news: Likulu la mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse, lalengeza kuti Papa Francisco adzakhazikitsa Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba kukhala wodala, pa mwambo wa Misa omwe adzatsogolere pa bwalo la Saint Peter’s Square ku Vatican lamulungu pa 4 September chaka chino. Ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican, yafotokoza kuti pa mwambo wa Misa’yi Bishop Renato Marangoni ndi omwe adzapemphe Papa Francisco kukhazikitsa Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba kukhala wodala.  Anakhala Papa kwa masiku 33 okha -Papa Yohane Paulo woyamba Ofesi’yi yati Ambuye Marangoni adzachita izi moperekezedwa ndi Cardinal Beniamino Stella komanso Dr. Stefania Falasca ndipo kuti atatuwa adzapereka kwa Papa Francisco zidutswa za wodalayu. Kwa onse omwe akufuna kudzakhala nawo pa mwambo wa Misa’yi, ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican yati ma tiketi akupezeka ku ofesi yomwe imayendetsa zochitika za a Papa. Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba yemwe anali kudziwika kuti the Smiling Pope adali Papa kwa masiku 33 okha basi kuyambira pa 26 August m’chaka cha 1978 mpaka pa 28 September m’chaka chomwecho. Adali Papa woyamba kumatchulidwa ndi maina awiri oti Yohane Paulo omwe ndi maina a Papa a m’mbuyo mwake. Iye adachita izi pofuna kulemekeza a Papa awiri omwe ndi Papa Yohane wa nambala 23 komanso Papa Paulo wa 6. Kutchulidwa wodala ndi sitepe yomaliza munthu asadatchulidwe kukhala woyera. Papa Yohane Paulo Woyamba yemwe adabadwa pa 17 October m’chaka cha 1912 ndipo dzina lake leni-leni adali Albino Luciani adali wochokera ku dera la ku mpoto kwa dziko la Italy.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Atsogoleri A Dziko La Sri Lanka Amve Kulira Kwa Anthu
news: Potsatira mavuto aakulu a za chuma m’dziko la Sri Lanka omwe sanachitikeposo m’dzikolo kwa zaka 70 zapitazo, Papa Francisco wapempha atsogoleri a m’dziko la Sri Lanka kuti amve kulira kwa anthu a m’dzikolo omwe padakali pano akuvutika kwambiri. Iye wati akumva chisoni kaamba ka mavuto a za chuma komanso a ndale m’dzikolo. “Ndine munthu wa chisoni kwambiri ndipo ndili limodzi ndi anthu a m’dziko la Sri Lanka omwe akuvutika kaamba ka mavuto a za chuma komanso mpungwepungwe pa ndale,” watero Papa Francisco. Iye wati molumikizana ndi maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika a m’dziko la Sri Lanka, wapempha kuti bata libwelerenso m’dzikolo kuti adindo achitepo kanthu pomva kulira kwa anthu osauka. Mtsogoleri wa dziko la Sri Lanka, Gotabaya Rajapaksa walengeza lamulungu kuti atula pansi udindo wake ngati mtsogoleri wa dzikolo potsatira zionetsero zomwe anthu m’dzikolo akhala akuchita kwa miyezi ingapo tsopano zosonyeza kusakondwa ndi momwe nkhani za chuma zakhala zikuyendera. Padakali pano dziko la Sri Lanka lilibe ndalama zina zilizonse za kunja, ndalama ya dzikolo yagwa mphamvu ndipo ikupitirira kugwa mphamvu zomwe zikuchititsa kuti dzikolo lizikanika kugula mafuta a galimoto, chakudya ndi mankhwala.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Lilangiza Anthu Atenge Udindo Wosamala Nyama Zakutchire
news: Mlembi wamkulu mu unduna wa zokopa alendo, chikhalidwe ndi nyama zakutchire a Chauncy Simwaka apempha anthu a m’boma la Kasungu kuti akhale ndi udindo wosamalira zachilengedwe. Iwo amayankhula izi lachinayi pa mwambo wolandira nyama zakutchire kuchokera ku Liwonde National Park kupita ku Kasungu National Park. Iwo adzudzulanso mchitidwe wopha nyama zakutchire omwe akuti umabweretsa m’mbuyo ntchito zokopa alendo mdziko muno. “Anthu a kuno ku Kasungu mukhale patsogolo kuteteza nyama zimenezi osati kuzipha ayi. Nyama zimenezi ndi zomwe zimakopa alendo a m’maiko ena kuti adzibwera kwathu kuno,” anatero a Simwaka. M’mawu ake president wa bungwe la International Fund for Animal Welfare (IFAW) a Izzedine Downes ati anthu ozungulira derali asade nkhawa ponena kuti chitetezo chawo ku nyamazi ndi chokwera kwambiri. Nyama zokwana 500 ndi zomwe zikuyembekezeka kusamutsidwa kuchoka ku nkhalango ya Liwonde m’boma la Machinga kupita ku nkhalango ya Kasungu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bambo Wina Ku Dowa Anajatidwa Kaamba Kogwilira Msungwana Wa Zaka 13
news: Bambo wina wa zaka 36 zakubadwa m’boma la Dowa ali mu chitolokosi cha apolisi kaamba komuganizira kuti anagwililira mtsikana wa zaka 13 zakubadwa. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za apolisi mboma la Dowa Sub Inspector Gladson M’bumpha, izi zinachitika usiku wa 5 ndi 6 July chaka chino mdera la Mayadi. Patsikuli m’chemwali wa msungwanayo anapita kukagwira ntchito nthawi ya utsiku pa chipatala cha boma la Dowa ndipo apa ndi pomwe mkuluyo anapezerapo mwayi wopita kunyumba kwa mtsikanayo ndi kukagonana naye. Malinga ndi Sub Inspector M’bumpha, bamboyo Kaifi Mafuta anawopseza mwanayo kuti akangokuwa amupha koma m’mawa kutacha iye anauza makolo ake omwe anatengera nkhaniyi ku apolisi. A chipatala atapima msungwanayo anatsimikiza kuti wagwiridwa, zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu amangidwe. A Kaifi Mafuta amachokera m’mudzi mwa Moya mfumu yayikulu Msakambewa m’boma lomwelo la Dowa.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akuyembekezeka Kukacheza Ku Assisi, Matera M’dziko La Italy
news: Likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse lalengeza za ulendo wa Papa Francisco wopita mtauni ya Assisi komanso mzinda wa Matera m’dziko la Italy, ku mapeto a mwezi wa September chaka chino. Malinga ndi ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican, pa 24 September Papa Francisco adzapita mtauni ya Assisi kukakhala nawo pa msonkhano wa achinyamata owathandiza kutukula miyoyo yawo pa nkhani za chuma ndipo tsiku lotsatira pa 25 September Papa’yu adzapita mu mzinda wa Matera ku dera la Basilicata m’chigawo cha kumwera kwa dziko la Italy kukatsekera msonkhano wokambirana za Ukaristia, National Eucharistic Congress. Padakali pano President wa bungwe la ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika m’dziko la Italy lodziwika kuti Conferenza Episcopale Italiana (CEI) wayamikira Papa Francisco polengeza kuti akhala nawo pa misonkhano iwiriyi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Boma Layimitsa Chikondwelero cha 6 July
news: Boma lati chikondwelero chokumbukira kuti tsopano papita zaka 58 kuchokera pomwe dziko lino lidalandira ufulu chidzachitika pochita mapemphero popanda zisangalalo zilizonse. Kawale: Tikufuna kuchepetsa chuma chomwe tikanagwiritsa ntchito Nduna ya za malo a Sam Kawale omwenso ndi wapampando wa chikonzerochi ayankhula izi lero ku Lilongwe pa msonkhano wa atolankhani ndipo ati mwambowu udzachitikira ku BICC mu mzinda wa Lilongwe osati ku Blantyre monga momwe chikonzero chinalili mbuyomu. Iwo ati izi zili chomwechi ngati njira yofuna kuteteza chuma cha dziko lino malinga ndi mavuto a za chuma omwe dziko lino likukumana nawo. “Tikufuna kuchepetsa chuma chomwe tikanagwiritsa ntchito pa chisangalalo chimenechi,” anatero a Kawale. Izi zikudza patangopita tsiku limodzi mtsogoleri wotsutsa boma ku nyumba ya malamulo a Kondwani Nankhumwa atapempha boma kuti liganizire zosachita chikondwelerochi. Iwo anati ndi kosamveka kuti boma likonze chikondwelerochi pamene anthu mdziko muno akuvutika pa chuma. Pamenepa a Nankhumwa analangiza boma kuti lichite mapemphero okha patsikuli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Akacheza Mdziko la Canada Mwezi wa July
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco akuyembekezeka kukacheza m’dziko la Canada mwezi wa July chaka chino. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio ulendowu udzachitika kuyambira pa 24 mpaka 29 July. Papa Francisco akacheza m’dziko la Canada atayitanidwa ndi boma komanso ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika a m’dzikolo. Ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican yafotokoza kuti Papa Francisco akacheza m’dzikolo kuyambira pa 24 mpaka pa 29 July atayitanidwa ndi boma, ma episkopi a Mpingo wa Katolika komanso eni nthaka a dziko la Canada, Canada’s indigenous peoples. Malinga ndi mlozo womwe likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika latulutsa, Papa Francisco akacheza m’mizinda ya Edmonton, Québec ndi Iqaluit. Ali m’dzikolo mwa zina iye akuyembekezeka kukachita zokambirana ndi eni nthaka a dzikolo, nkumano ndi atsogoleri a dzikolo, kulankhula kwa a kazembe oimira maiko awo m’dziko la Canada, kuchita Misa, kucheza ndi achinyamata komanso anthu achikulire, kupemphera limodzi ndi ma episkopi, ansembe, asisitere, a bulazala ndi a semino, kuchita nkumano ndi ansembe a chipani cha ma Jesuit, Society of Jesus.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CAMA Idzudzula Boma Polekelera Kukwera Kwa Mitengo ya Zinthu
news: Usiku wa lachitatu, bungwe la Malawi Energy Regulatory Authority (MERA) lalengeza kuti mafuta a petrol akwera kuchoka pa 1,380 kufika pa 1,999 kwacha, dizilo wakwera kuchoka pa 1,470 kufika pa 1,920 ndipo parrafin wakwera kuchoka pa 956-kwacha kufika pa 1,236 kwacha. Poyankhula pa msonkhano wa atolankhani ku Lilongwe, mkulu wa bungweli a Henry Kachaje anati mafutawa akwera kaamba ku kuchepa kwa mphamvu ya ndalama ya kwacha komanso kukwera kwa mitengo ya mafuta ku maiko dziko lino limagulako mafutawa. Kapito: Angoyang’anira anthu akuvutika “Zimenezi zikuchititsa kuti tizigwiritsa ntchito ndalama zochuluka pogula mafuta kuposa ndalama zomwe timagwiritsa ntchito poyamba pamene 1 dollar inali 850 kwacha chifukwa pano 1 dollar ndi 1000 kwacha,” anatero a Kachaje. Koma poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi, mkulu wa bungwe lowona za anthu ogula mdziko muno la Consumers Association of Malawi (CAMA) a John Kapito ati kukwera mtengo kwa mafutawa ndi kosamveka kaamba koti kukubwera pamene anthu akudandaula ndi kale za kukwera kwa mitengo ya zinthu zofunikira pa miyoyo yawo. Iwo ati mafutawa akwera pamene anthu amaganiza kuti boma libwera ndi ndondomeko zambiri zochepetsera kuwawa komwe anthu akukumva kaamba ka mavuto a zachuma ndipo iwo ati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti boma lasankha kukhala chete pa mavuto omwe anthu mdziko muno akukumana nawo. “M’malo moti boma libwere ndi ndondomeko zothandizira kuti anthu asamve kuwawa ndi kukwera kwa mitengo ya zinthu ndi pomwe akuwonjezeranso kuwawako chifukwa iwowo kuwawaku sakukumva nawo. Angoyang’anira anthu akuvutika kukhala ngati sakuwona,” anatero a Kapito. A Kapito atinso ndi zosamveka kuti boma likubweretsa misonkho ina kuwonjezera pa mavuto omwe anthu ali nawo kale ndipo atinsokukwera mtengo kwa mafutawa kuchititsa kuti mitengo ya minibus ikwere zomwenso zichititse kuti katundu osiyanasiyana apitilire kukwera mtengo. Mkulu wa bungwe la CAMA-yu wati zikuwonetsa kuti boma likuchita zinthu pofuna kusangalatsa bungwe la International Monetary Fund (IMF) lomwe akuti ndi lomwe linakakamiza boma la dziko lino kuti lichepetse mphamvu ya ndalama ya dziko lino ndi 25 percent sabata zapitazo zomwe zachititsa kuti mafuta a galimoto komanso zinthu zina zikwere mtengo. Pamenepa a Kapito awopseza kuti anthu mdziko muno achitapo kanthu pofuna kusonyeza kukwiya kwawo ndi zomwe boma likuchita polekelera kuti zinthu zizingokwera mtengo tsiku ndi tsiku.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Chilima Watsutsa Zoti Akukhudzidwa ndi Katangale
news: Wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Dr. Saulos Chilima watsutsa zoti akukhudzidwa ndi nkhani za katangale ndi mkulu wina ochita malonda otchedwa Zuneth Sattar. Chilima wanena izi kudzera mu kalata yomwe wasaina ndi mneneri wake Pilirani Phiri ndipo wati iye ndi wokonzeka kuyankhapo pa nkhanizi ngati atapatsidwa mwayi otero. Komabe a Chilima ati ndi odabwa ndi momwe bungwe la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) likuyendetsera nkhaniyi pamene likumutchula kuti akukhudzidwa ndi nkhani za katangale popanda kupereka umboni komanso tsatanetsatane wa za katangale zomwe iye anachita ndipo wati akudabwa kuti kufikira lero bungweli silinamufunseko kanthu ndi kumupatsa mwayi woyankhulapo pa nkhaniyi. Wakanitsitsa – Chilima Pamenepa iye wauza bungwe la ACB kuti ntchito yolimbana ndi katangale ikuyenera kugwiridwa motsatira malamulo ndipo isagwiritsidwe ntchito molakwika pofuna kuyipitsa mbiri za anthu ena pa zifukwa za ndale kapena zina. Lachianyi lomweli bungwe lolimbana ndi katangale ndi ziphuphu mdziko muno la Anti-Corruption Bureau (ACB) linamanga yemwe anali mkulu wa apolisi mdziko muno Dr. George Kainja. Kumangidwa kwawo kunadza patangopita masiku ochepa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino atawachotsa ntchito kaamba koti anatchulidwa mu lipoti la bungwe la bungwe la ACB lomwe linanena kuti a Kainja akuganziiridwa kuti amachita za katangale ndi mkulu ochita malonda otchedwa Zuneth Sattar. Padakalipano a Kainja atuluka pa belo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Akatswiri Apempha Chilima Atule Pansi Udindo
news: M’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani za malamulo mdziko muno wati wachiwiri kwa mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Saulos Chilima akuyenera atule pansi udindo wake potsatira kutchulidwa kwake kuti akukhudzidwa ndi nkhani za katangale ndi mkulu wina wochita malonda, Zuneth Sattar. Watchulidwa mu lipoti la ACB-Chilima Katsiwiriyu Professor Garton Kamchedzera wanena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi potsatira zomwe mtsogoleri wa dziko lino Lazarus Chakwera wanena dzulo (lachiwiri) pamene wati wayimitsa ntchito zonse zomwe amapereka kwa wachiwiri wake kaamba koti watchulidwa pa mndandanda wa anthu omwe akukhudzidwa ndi nkhaniyi. Iwo ati padakalipano chikhulupiliro cha anthu mwa a Chilima chachepa ngakhale kuti akufufuzidwabe choncho akuyenera kutula pansi udindo kapena nyumba ya malamulo ichite kuwachotsa. Kamchedzera: Chikhulupiliro cha anthu mwa a Vice President athu chatha “Chikhulupiliro cha anthu mwa a Vice President athu chatha kapena chachepa ndipo choyenera chomwe iwo angachite ndi kusunthapo pa udindopo kupereka mpata kuti nkhaniyi iyende bwinobwino koma ngati sangatero ndiye kuti mwina a parliamenet awachite impeach apo ayi akhala Vice President uja wa dzina lokha kumangokhala osagwira ntchito iliyonse,” anatero  Professor Kamchedzera. Koma poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa akatswiri pa nkhani za ndale mdziko muno a Ernest Thindwa pamene amagwirizana ndi a Kamchedzera, iwo atsindika kuti mtsogoleri wa dziko lino komanso adindo ena m’boma asalowetse ndale pa lipoti lomwe bungwe la ACB latulutsa. Pamenepa iwo apempha bungwe la ACB kuti libwere ndi maumboni okwanira pa nkhaniyi ndipo iwonetsetse kuti nkhaniyi iyende mwachangu ku mabwalo a milandu a dziko lino kuti chilungamo chidziwike. Lachiwiri madzulo, mtsogoleri wa dziko lino analengeza kuti wachotsa pa ntchito mkulu wa apolisi mdziko muno George Kainja, wayimitsa ntchito zomwe amamutuma wachiwiri wake komanso wayimitsa kaye pa ntchito mkulu wa ogwira ntchito ku nyumba ya mtsogoleriyu komanso mkulu wa bungwe la Public Procurement and Disposal of Assets (PPDA) kaamba koti onsewa atchulidwa mu lipoti la bungwe la ACB powaganizira kuti akukhudzidwa ndi nkhani za katangale ndi a Sattar.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Akufunitsitsa Mabanja Azikondana
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa wati ndi pemphero lake kuti mabanja azikondana. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, Papa Francisco walankhula izi mu uthenga wake wa mafuno abwino wopita kwa ma banja onse a pa dziko la pansi omwe akuchita msonkhano wawo ku Rome m’dziko la Italy. Iye wathokoza ma banja onse omwe afika ndipo wati ndi pemphero lake kuti kudzera m’moyo wa banja akhristu athe kukhala anthu oyera pa maso pa Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati moyo wa banja ndi chiitanidwe komanso njira yothandiza akhristu kukhala anthu oyera pa maso pa Mulungu. Nthumwi ku msonkhano wa ukulu wa ma banjawu zikambirana pa mutu woti: Chikondi cha m’banja ndi njira yothandiza akhristu kukhala anthu oyera. Msonkhanowu womwe wayamba lero ufika ku mapeto laMulungu likubwerali ndipo nthumwi zikuchita msonkhanowu pokondwerera kalata ya Papa Francisco yotchedwa Amoris Laetitia yofotokoza za moyo wa banja.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Ndi Zotheka Kukhala Ndi Dziko Lopanda Zida Za Nyukiliya
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi zotheka kukhala ndi dziko lopanda zida zowopysa za nyukiliya. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco walankhula izi mu uthenga wake omwe watumizira maiko a mu mgwirizano woletsa maiko kusunga zida zowopysa za nyukiliya. Kudzera mu uthengawu, iye wapitiriza kupempha maiko kuti athandize kuthetsa nkhondo zosiyana-siyana zomwe zikuchitika pa dziko la pansi. Papa Francisco wafotokoza mwa mve mve mve kuti kugwiritsa ntchito angakhale kusungira kumene zida zoopysa za nyukiliya ndi kulakwa ndipo ndi zosavomerezeka. Iye wati maiko akuyenera kuzindikira za kuopysa kosungira komanso kugwiritsa ntchito zida zoopysazi. Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika kothetsa mikangano ndi nkhondo pakati pa maiko kudzera mu njira yokambirana. Iye wamaliza ponena kuti Mpingo wa Katolika ndi wodzipereka kulimbikitsa mtendere pa dziko la pansi komanso kulimbikitsa ntchito za maphunziro. Maiko 65 ndi omwe ali mu mgwirizano wa maiko oletsa maiko kusunga zida zowopysa za nyukiliya ndipo bungweli lidayamba mwezi wa January chaka chatha koma mpaka lero palibe dziko olo limodzi mwa maiko omwe ali ndi zida za nyukiliya omwe alowa nao mu bungweli.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wachita Mkumano ndi Maepiskopi a Mpingo wa Katolika waku M’mawa
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wachita mkumano ndi ma episkopi a mpingo wa katolika wa ku m’mawa omwe akuchita msonkhano wawo wa sinodi. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio nkumanowu wachitika lero ku likulu la Mpingo ku Vatican.  M’mawu ake kwa ma episkopi’wa kunyumba ya Vatican Apostolic Palace, Papa Francisco wawapempha kuti asaiwale anthu omwe akuvutika m’dziko la Syria komanso wawalimbikitsa kuti achilimike polimbikitsa umodzi wa akhristu a m’maiko a aluya. Iye wayamikira ma episkopi’wa kaamba kochita chisankho chabwino choti achitire msonkhano wao ku Rome komwe Petulo ndi Paulo Oyera adafera kuti monga awiriwa adachitira umboni Yesu Khristu kudzera mu imfa yao nao ma episkopi’wa athe kupeza za ulere ndi nyonga  zowathandiza kuchitira umboni Yesu Khristu. Papa Francisco watsindika za kufunika koti Mpingo uziyendera limodzi m’chikondi ndi kumasamalirana, sollicitudo Ecclesiarum omnium. Iye wati angakhale kuti nkhani yomwe ili mkamwa ndi ya nkhondo pakati pa maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine, zimenezi zisaiwalitse Mpingo za anthu ankhaninkhani omwe akuvutika m’dziko la Syria ndi maiko ena. Iye wamaliza ndi kuikiza Mpingo wa Katolika wa ku m’mawa m’manja mwa Amayi Maria.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Apereka Maphunziro a Katetezedwe ka Ana ku Sukulu Yosulira Aphunzitsi ya Bembeke
news: Aphunzitsi pa sukulu yosulira aphunzitsi ya St. Joseph Bembeke, awapempha kuti alimbikitse malamulo otetezera maufulu a ana, anthu achikulire komanso a ulumali. Mkulu woyang’anira bungwe lowona za chitetezo komanso maufulu a ana ndi anthu achikulire mu dayosizi ya Dedza, bambo Gerald Bwemba ndi omwe ayankhula izi lolemba ku malo a sukuluyi m’boma la Dedza. Iwo ayankhula izi pambuyo pa maphunziro a tsiku limodzi omwe anakozera onse ogwira ntchito ku sukuluyi. “Maphunziro amenewa ndi ofunikira kwambiri chifukwa choti awa ndi aphunzitsi amene amatiphunzitsira anthu amene amadzakhala aphunzitsi a msukulu zosiyanasiyana mdziko muno ndipo zomwe tawapatsa lero zithandiza pa sukulu pano komanso komwe aphunzitsiwa azikagwirako ntchito,” anatero bambo Bwemba. Poyankhulapo m’modzi mwa akuluakulu a pa sukuluyi a Collen Chilikutali, anati maphunzirowa awapindulira koposa. “Aphunzitsi athu akachoka pano pambuyo pa maphunziro awo adzikakwanitsa kufikira anthu a komwe azikaphunzitsako ndi mauthenga amenewa okhudza kuteteza ana komanso achikulire,” anatero a Chilikutali.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: ESCOM Ipempha Anthu Aneneze Owononga Zipangizo Zothandiza Popereka Magetsi
news: Bungwe lopereka magetsi mdziko muno la Electricity Supply Corporation of Malawi (ESCOM) lapempha anthu kuti akhale ndi udindo woneneza anthu a mbanda omwe akuwononga zipangizo za bungweli. Mkulu wofalitsa nkhani ku bungweli mayi Kitty Chingota ndi omwe anena izi poyankhula ndi Radio Maria Malawi pomwe imafuna kudziwa zomwe bungweli likuchita potsatira kuzima kwa magetsi komwe kunachitika loweruka lapitali ndipo kunakhudza dziko lonse. Mayi Chingota anati bungweli likuyesetsa kugawa magetsiwa kwa makasitomala ake pan’gono pang’ono kaamba ka kuchepa mphamvu kwa magetsi omwe bungweli likulandira. Chingota: Tiyeni timasuke kunena kwa adindo “Ife a ESCOM ntchito yathu ndi yongolandira magetsi kuchoka kwa omwe amapanga ndiye ife timangogawa magetsiwo kwa makasitomala athu. Chifukwa cha mphamvu yochepa ya magetsi yomwe tikupatsidwa zikuvutanso kuti tikwanitse kupereka magetsiwa kwa anthu onse mdziko muno,” anatero mayi Chingota. Iwo anati akuganizira kuti pali anthu ena omwe ali ndi kulumikizana ndi anthu aku bungwe la ESCOM omwe akuwononga zipangizo zothandizira popereka magetsi mdziko muno ndipo ati ndi koyenera kuti anthuwa adzinenezedwa kwa adindo oyenera kuti mchitidwe owononga katundu wa kampaniyi utheretu. “Ngati munthuyo anachoka mu ESCOM ndipo si wa ESCOM nso ayi koma akupanga umbanda uwuwu ndipo tikuwadziwa tiyeni timasuke kunena kwa adindo kuti awa ndi omwe akuwononga katundu wathu wothandiza pa magetsi kuti lamulo ligwire ntchito kaamba koti imeneyi ndi economic sabotage,” anatero mayi Chingota. Mayi Chingota anati mchitidwe owononga katundu wa kampani ya ESCOM ndi osokoneza chitukuko cha dziko lino choncho ukuyenera kutheratu.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wavomereza Bukhu la Misa la Mdziko la DRC
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wavomereza bukhu latsopano logwiritsidwa ntchito pa Misa m’dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC). Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio, iye wavomereza bukhuli kudzera mu mawu oyambirira omwe walemba mu bukhuli lomwe lili mu chiyankhulo cha chifaransa ndipo lalembedwa ndi Sister Rita Mboshu Kongo mothandizana ndi nyumba yosindikizira ma buku ya Vatican Publishing House.  Ntchito yokhazikitsa bukhu la Misa’li mogwirizana ndi chikhalidwe komanso chiyankhulo cha anthu a ku Democratic Republic of Congo kapena kuti Zaire masiku amenewo idayambika utangotha msonkhano wa ukulu wa Vatican Council II motsata maphunzitso a Mpingo pa za chipembedzo, Sacrosanctum Concilium. Papa Francisco wati bukhu la Misa’li lomwe ndi ntchito ya zaka zambiri lithandiza anthu kupemphera bwino ndi kudzamitsa chikhulupiriro chao mogwirizana ndi chikhalidwe cha anthu a m’dziko la Democratic Republic of Congo. Iye wati ntchito yosindikiza bukhuli ndi chitsanzo kwa anthu a m’maiko ena omwe angafune kukhala ndi bukhu la Misa lokonzedwa mogwirizana ndi chikhalidwe chao, inculturation. Papa Francisco amayembekezeka kukacheza ku Democratic Republic of Congo kumayambiriro a mwezi wa mawa koma ulendowu ayamba awuyimitsa kaamba koti padakali pano iye akulandira thandizo la ku chipatala kaamba vuto la bondo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: CFM Ipereka Thandizo Ku Mabanja Okhudzidwa Ndi Namondwe ku Chikwawa
news: Bungwe la mabanja achikhristu la Christian Family Movement (CFM) mu Mpingo wa Katolika lapereka thandizo kwa mabanja 920 omwe anakhudzidwa ndi zotsatira za namondwe wa Ana kwa Nsangwe m’boma la Chikwawa. Mwambo wopereka thandizoli unachitika Loweruka pa 30 April, 2022 pa msasa wa Chidyamanga dera la mfumu yaikulu Ngabu m’bomalo komwe zinthu monga ufa, ndiwo za soya pisesi, mchere, shuga, ziwiya  zophikira ndi zovala zinaperekedwa.  Poyankhula, banja lomwe ndi lapampando la bungwe la CFM ku Malawi, banja la Francis ndi Secondina Matewere lati bungwe lawo linaganiza zopereka thandizolo litakhudzidwa ndi momwe mabanja anzawo okhala ku Chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire anakhudzidwira ndi mvula yamphamvu. “Titamva kuti mabanja anzathu akhudzidwa ndi ngozi ya madzi, tinabwera makamaka kuti tiwathandizire pa kuwapatsa zinthu zoti ziwathandize akabwelera kunyumba kwawo,” anatero mayi Matewere.  M’mawu awo polandira katunduyo, mkulu woyang’anira pa msasa wa Chidyamanga, a Mixon Nguluwe anathokoza kaamba ka thandizolo ponena kuti lafika mu nthawi yake. “Thandizo ili labwera mu nthawi yake chifukwa choti patenga nthawi yayitali tisakulandira chinachilichonse, pwmene Boma lanena kuti tibwerere kunyumba tikakhala ndi poyambira,” anatero a Nguluwe. Katundu wa ndalama zokwana 2.2 million Kwacha ndi yemwe anaperekedwa pa msasawo ndi thandizo kuchokera ku mabungwe a Site Savers, Trocaire, Christian Family Movement ndi bambo Pier Gorgio Gamba a chipani cha Montfort.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Phungu Adzudzula Apolisi Kaamba Kokolezera Mchitidwe wa Uchifwamba Mdera Lake
news: Phungu wa kunyumba ya malamulo ku dera la kumpoto kwa boma la Nsanje, Enock Chizuzu wadzudzula apolisi kuti ndi omwe akukolezera m’chitidwe wa uchifwamba m’dera lake. Izi zikudza pamene m’chitidwe ophana ndi kutengera lamulo m’manja mwawo wakula m’madera ozungulira dera la Fatima ku East Bank, komwe anthu pafupifupi asanu ndi m’modzi akhapidwa ndi achiwembu ndi kuwabera katundu wawo m’sabata yathayi. Chizuzu: Anthu 100 sauzande sangatetezedwe ndi anthu atatu Malingana ndi Chizuzu, dera la Fatima ku East Bank m’boma la Nsanje, lili ndi apolisi atatu okha omwe akupereka chitetezo ku deralo lomwe lili ndi chiwerengero cha anthu opitilira 100 sauzande. Iye waloza chala akuluakulu apolisi m’bomalo polekelera deralo kukhala ndi apolisi atatuwo kopitilira zaka zisanu ndi zitatu (8) zomwe wati zikukolezera m’chitidwe wa ziphuphu ndi katangale ndi kutayilira pa kagwiridwe kawo ka ntchito. “Chiwerengero cha anthu 100 sauzande sichingatetezedwe ndi anthu atatu ndi zosatheka,” anatero a Chizuzu. Poyankhapo pa za nkhawazi, mneneri wa apolisi m’boma la Nsanje, mayi Agnes Zalakoma wati kuyambira mwezi wapitawu, ofesi yawo yakhala ikutumiza apolisi khumi mulungu uliwonse mosinthana pofuna kuwonjezera chitetezo ku deralo. “Loweruka lililonse kukumapita apolisi khumi kukawonjezera chitetezo kumeneko panopa ndi mwezi wachiwiri akupita,” anatero mayi Zalakoma. Poyankhulapo, katswiri owona za chisamaliro cha anthu anthu ku Chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire, a Amade Alide wati ndi zomvetsa chisoni kuti nthambi zoyang’anira chitetezo zikusowekera m’gwirizano ndi ukadaulo pa ntchito. “Kumakhala kufooka kwa nthambi yoyang’anira chitetezo. Pofuna kuthana ndi vuto pakufunika kukambirana ndi nthambi zina zoyag’anira chitetezo osati kugwira ntchito pawokha,” anatero a Alide. Dera la East Bank m’maboma a Chikwawa ndi Nsanje lili ndi mapolisi aang’ono awiri okha, ya Makhwira ku Chikwawa ndi Fatima ku Nsanje komwe umbava ndi umbanda ndi waukulu kuyerekeza ndi madera ena a chigwa cha mtsinje wa Shire.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wati Wakonzeka Kupita Mdziko La Russia
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wati ndi okonzeka kupita m’dziko la Russia kuti akachite zokambirana ndi mtsogoleri wa dzikolo. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio,  Papa wati padakali pano alibe maganizo opita ku Ukraine koma ndi wokonzeka kupita ku Moscow komwe ndi ku likulu la dziko la Russia kuti akachite zokambirana ndi a Putin pa za nkhondo ya pakati pa maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine. Papa Francisco wati chomwe akudikira padakali pano ndi kuti a Putin avomere kuchita zokambiranazi. “Patangopita masiku makumi awiri a nkhondo pakati pa maiko a Russia ndi Ukraine ndidatuma mlembi wa mkulu wa likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika, Vatican Secretary of State Cardinal Pietro Parolin kuti atumize uthenga wopempha za nkumanowu koma za chisoni kuti mpaka pano sitidalandirebe yankho. Tikupitiriza kugogoda pa khomo la dziko la Russia angakhale tikudziwa kuti ndi kovuta kuti pempho lathu limveke,” watero Papa Francisco pouza mtolankhaniyu. Iye waonjezera ponena kuti podikirira yankho pa nkhaniyi zinthu zingapo zothandiza kuti nkhondoyi ithe zachitika. Papa Francisco watchulapo zoti watumizapo kangapo konse nduna zake kupita m’dziko la Ukraine komanso kuti iye mwini adaapita kukamang’ala ku ofesi ya kazembe wa dziko la Russia, Russian embassy, mu mzinda wa Rome ngati njira zothandiza kuti nkhondoyi ithe.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Wapempha Amishonale A Chifundo Cha Mulungu Agwire Ntchito Modzipereka
news: Mtsogoleri wa mpingo wa katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco wapempha ansembe omwe adawasankha kukhala a mishonare a Chifundo cha Mulungu kuti aziwulula za chifundo cha Mulungu kwa akhristu. Malinga ndi malipoti a wailesi ya Vatican, Papa wanena izi poyankhula kwa ansembe okwana 400 ochokera mbali zonse za dziko la pansi omwe Papa’yu adawakhazikitsa mwa njira ya padera pofuna kukondwerera bwino chaka cha Chifundo cha Mulungu odziwika kuti Missionaries of Mercy. Papa Francisko ndi amishonale a chifundo cha Mulungu Iye wawalimbikitsanso kuti azilandira ndi manja awiri anthu onse obwera kwa iwo ndi kumawathunzitsa mtima ndi kuwaonetsera chifundo cha Mulungu. Papa Francisco wati ndi wokondwa kwambiri ndi utumiki wa ansembewa womwe ukuthandiza powafikira anthu ndi chifundo cha Mulungu. Pamenepa iye wati ndi chifukwa chake adaganiza zozindikiritsa anthu za utumikiwu mwa njira ya padera komanso kuti ukhale utumiki wokhazikia mu Mpingo wa Katolika. Iye wati adachita izi kudzera mu kalata yake, Apostolic Constitution on the Roman Curia, Praedicate Evangelium. Papa Francisco adakhazikitsa a mishonare a Chifundo cha Mulungu m’chaka cha 2016 pokondwerera chaka cha Chifundo cha Mulungu. Mwa zina ansembewa ntchito yao ndi kupereka Sakramenti la kulapa komanso kulalikira ndi kuzindikiritsa anthu za chifundo cha Mulungu osaiwala kulapisa anthu kukhululukira akhristu machimo akuluakulu omwe kawiri-kawiri amasowa upangiri wa a episkopi komanso likulu la Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse. M’modzi wa ansembe amenewa ndi bambo Joseph Kimu omwe amatumikira mu dayosizi ya Mangochi komanso ndi mkulu owona za mapologalamu ku Radio Maria Malawi.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Bungwe la OXFAM Lapempha Makhonsolo Achilimike Pa Nkhani Ya Madyedwe Abwino
news: Bungwe la Oxfam lapempha adindo m’makhomsolo komanso mabungwe mdziko muno kuti awonetse chidwi pa nkhani yolimbikitsa madyedwe abwino. Mlangizi pa nkhani za madyedwe abwino ndi ntchito za chitukuko ku bungweli, a Steve Kuliaz, ndi omwe anena izi m’boma la Dedza pa msonkhano wa akuluakulu a makhonsolo a m’maboma a Dowa, Salima ndi Dedza komanso mabungwe ena omwe amadzipereka pa ntchito ya madyedwe abwino mdziko muno. Pa mkumanowu, bungwe la Oxfam limafotokozera masomphenya ake   pa ntchito yolimbikitsa madyedwe abwino kudzera mu gawo lachiwiri la project yowonetsetsa kuti anthu mdziko muno ali ndi mwayi wokhala ndi chakudya chobweretsa thanzi. M’mawu awo a Kuliaz anati chidwi cha makhonsolo ndi mabungwe pa nkhani za madyedwe abwino, chingathandize kuthana ndi matenda ambiri omwe amadza kaamba kosowa chakudya chobweretsa thanzi. Iwo anati boma likuyesetsa kuyika gawo la ndalama zothandizira ntchitoyi komabe anati pali nkhawa kuti ntchito yolimbikitsa madyedwe abwino ikhoza kusafikira anthu onse kaamba ka kuchepachepetsedwa kwa ndalama zomwe boma limayika mu ndondomeko yake ya zachuma kuchoka pa 2.9℅ chakatha kufika pa 1.9℅ chaka chino. Pamenepa iwo apempha makhomsolo, mabungwe ndi atolankhani kuti ayikepo chidwi pa ntchito yokhazikitsa njira zina zopezera thandizo la ntchito yolimbikitsa madyedwe abwino. Gawo lachiwiri la project ya Oxfam lolimbikitsa madyedwe abwino ligwiridwa m’maboma a Dedza, Salima komanso Dowa kuyambira mchaka 2022 mpaka 2023. Pali chiyembekezo chakuti gawo lachiwiri limeneli lipindulira anthu ambiri kuposa gawo loyamba pomwe ndalama yogwilira ntchitoyi yakwera kuchoka pa 50,000 Euros kufika 250,000 Euros. Bungwe la Oxfam likugwira ntchitoyi ndi thandizo la ndalama lochokera ku bungwe la mdziko la Germany la GIZ.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Flames Iyamba Zokonzekera Zake M’mwezi wa May
news: Timu ya mpira wa miyendo mdziko muno ya Flames ikuyembekeza kuyamba zonkonzekera za mpikisano wodzigulira malo mu mpikisano wa 2023 African Cup of Nations, pa 8 mwezi wa mawa. Iyamba zokonzekera pa 8 May-Flames Malinga ndi mkulu owona za mipikisano ku bungweli a Gomezgani Zakazaka, Flames ikhala ndi masewero awiri amu mpikisanowu mwezi wa June, pomwe idzasewere ndi timu ya Ethiopia pakhomo komanso ndi timu ya Guinea koyenda. Zokonzekerazi ziyamba ndi osewera omwe amasewera league yayikulu kuno kumudzi, kenako enanso omwe amasewera maiko a kunja azakhala akubwera pakatha masabata awiri. Ena mwa osewera atsopano omwe akulowa nawo mu camp ndi monga Chiukepo Msowoya, Yamikani Chester, Stanely Sanudi komanso Balikinho Mwakanyongo.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Alamulidwa Kukagwira Ukayidi Kwa Zaka 14 Kaamba Kogwilira Wantchito Wake
news: Bwalo la milandu la First Grade Magistrate ku Monkeybay m’boma la Mangochi lalamula mkulu wina wa zaka 50 zakubadwa kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 14 atapezeka olakwa pa mlandu wogwilira wantchito wake yemwe ndi wa zaka 15 zakubadwa. Mkuluyu John Mpereka anapalamula mlanduwu pa 11 ndi 12 April 2022. Malipoti akusonyeza kuti banja la mkuluyu linatha ndipo mkazi wake anamusiyira mwana wa zaka zisanu zomwe zinachititsa kuti akasake wa ntchito oti adzisamalira mwanayo. Malinga ndi wofalitsa nkhani za polisi ku Monkeybay, Sergeant Alice Sichali, patsikuli,mkuluyu analowa ku chipinda chomwe msungwanayu amagona ndi kumuuza kuti agone naye kulephera apo amuchotsa ntchito. Atachita izi pa tsikuli mkuluyu anachitanso chimodzimodzi mawa lake ndipo kenaka msungwanayu anakanena za nkhaniyi ku polisi ya Monkeybay zomwe zinachititsa kuti mkuluyu amangidwe. Atawonekera ku bwaloli mkuluyu anauvomera mlanduwu zomwe zinachititsa kuti woyimira boma pa mlanduwuSub Inspectpr Mary Mbutuka apemphe bwaloli kuti lipereke chilango chokhwima kaamba koti milandu ya mtunduwu ikuchulukira mderalo. Pamenepa First Grade Magistrate Mtunduwatha Mpasu analamula Mpereka kuti akakhale ku ndende kwa zaka 14 pa mlanduwu. Mpereka amachokera mmudzi mwa Masinde mfumu yaikulu Chigaru m’boma la Blantyre.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Francisko Ayendera Papa Benedicto wa 16 Wopuma
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco anakayendera Papa Benedicto wa 16 wopuma, kunyumba yake. Papa Francisko ndi Papa Benedict wa 16 wopuma Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Papa Francisco lachitatu masana Papa Francisco anapeza nthawi yokacheza ndi Papa Benedicto wa 16 wopuma kunyumba yake ya Mater Ecclesiae ku Vatican. Malinga ndi mkulu wa ofesi yofalitsa nkhani ku Vatican, Director of the Holy See Press Office, Matteo Bruni wati pa nkumanowu Papa Francisco wafunira Papa Benedicto wa 16 mafuno abwino a Pasaka komanso mafuno abwino a tsiku lake lobadwa lomwe ndi loweruka likudzali pa 16 April. Bruni waonjezeranso kuti awiriwa anapemphera limodzi. Papa Francisco wakhala akumapeza nthawi yokacheza ndi Papa Benedicto wa 16 kunyumba yake ya Mater Ecclesiae. Papa Benedicto wa 16 wopuma yemwe kwao ndi Germany akwanitsa zaka 95 loweruka likudzali pa 16 April.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: DVV International Ipereka Lamya Zamakono Msukulu za Kwacha
news: Bungwe la DVV International lapereka katundu wa makono wa ndalama zokwana 24 million kwacha ku bungwe loyendetsa sukulu za kwacha mdziko muno la National Centre for Literacy and Adult Education (NACLEA). Mwambo wopeleka katunduyu wachitika lachitatu pa 13 April 2022 munzinda wa Lilongwe, pamene bungwe la DVV international lapereka katundu monga makina akopyuta komaso mafoni amakono. Poyankhula, mlembi  mu unduna owona kuti pasakhale kusiyana pakati pa amayi ndi abambo, chisamaliro cha anthu komanso chitukuko cha m’madera,  a Isaac Katopola ati katunduyu athandiza kutukula komaso kupititsa patsogolo sukulu za kwacha mdziko muno chifukwa anthu azitha kutumiza mauthenga a momwe zinthu zikuyendera msukulu zakwacha m’dera lawo mosavuta. Iwo apemphanso anthu kuti atengepo gawo pa ntchito yopititsa patsogolo sukulu zakwacha m’dziko muno. M’mawu ake, mneneri wa bungwe la DVV International a Dyson Mthawanji ati katunduyu athandiza kuti adzidziwa m’mene ntchito ya sukulu za kwacha ikuyendera mdziko muno. Iwo atsindikanso kuti khumbo lawo ndi lopanga Malawi woti aliyense akutha kuwerenga ndi kulemba komaso kupanga maluso ena otukula dziko lino. Bungwe la DVV International lakhala likuthandiza boma kuyamba m’chaka cha 2007.
author: Izahaki Mwacha

title: Papa Atsogolera Misa Yodalitsa Mafuta
news: Mtsogoleri wa Mpingo wa Katolika pa dziko lonse Papa Francisco lero lachinayi loyera anatsogolera Misa pomwe anadalitsa mafuta oyera. Malinga ndi malipoti a Vatican Radio Misa’yi inachitikira mu tchalitchi chachikulu cha Saint Peter’s Basilica ku Vatican. Tsiku lachinayi loyera ndi tsiku lalikulu popeza pa tsikuli Ambuye Yesu adapanga Ukaristia komanso mwa njira ina adakhazikitsa Sakramenti la Ukulu kapena kuti Unsembe pamene adanena kuti: Idyani ili ndi thupi langa, imwani awa ndi magazi anga, muzichita izi kuti mundikumbukire, do this in memory of me! Malinga ndi Mpingo wa Katolika Ukaristia ndi thupi leni-leni la Ambuye Yesu ndipo Vinyo ndi magazi enieni a Ambuye Yesu. Mu kalata yake ya m’chaka cha 2004 yomwe adalembera ansembe pa tsiku lachinayi loyera, Papa Yohane Paulo Wachiwiri Woyera adati: popanda Ukaristia palibe ansembe ndipo popanda ansembe palibe Ukaristia,there can be no Eucharist without the priesthood just as there can be no priesthood without the Eucharist.
author: Izahaki Mwacha
